atk-s0501a:14: Imassa dāni atthaṃ paramatthajotikāya khuddakaṭṭhakathāya vivarituṃ vibhajituṃ uttānīkātuṃ idaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0501a:20: Tatheva ca ṭhitaṃ yasmā, navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:26_0: Tattha “khuddakānaṃ karissāmi, kesañci atthavaṇṇana”nti vuttattā khuddakāni tāva
atk-s0501a:26_1: vavatthapetvā pacchā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi. Khuddakāni nāma khuddakanikāyassa ekadeso,
atk-s0501a:26_2: khuddakanikāyo nāma pañcannaṃ nikāyānaṃ ekadeso. Pañca nikāyā nāma –
atk-s0501a:28: Nikāyā pañca gambhīrā, dhammato atthato cime.
atk-s0501a:29_0: Tattha brahmajālasuttādīni catuttiṃsa suttāni dīghanikāyo. Mūlapariyāyasuttādīni
atk-s0501a:29_1: diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni majjhimanikāyo. Oghataraṇasuttādīni satta suttasahassāni
atk-s0501a:29_2: satta ca suttasatāni dvāsaṭṭhi ca suttāni saṃyuttanikāyo. Cittapariyādānasuttādīni
atk-s0501a:29_3: nava suttasahassāni pañca ca suttasatāni sattapaññāsañca suttāni aṅguttaranikāyo.
atk-s0501a:29_4: Khuddakapāṭho, dhammapadaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, suttanipāto, vimānavatthu, petavatthu,
atk-s0501a:29_5: theragāthā, therīgāthā, jātakaṃ, niddeso, paṭisambhidā, apadānaṃ, buddhavaṃso, cariyāpiṭakaṃ,
atk-s0501a:29_6: vinayābhidhammapiṭakāni, ṭhapetvā vā cattāro nikāye avasesaṃ buddhavacanaṃ khuddakanikāyo.
atk-s0501a:30_0: Kasmā panesa khuddakanikāyoti vuccati? Bahūnaṃ khuddakānaṃ dhammakkhandhānaṃ samūhato
atk-s0501a:30_1: nivāsato ca. Samūhanivāsā hi “nikāyo”ti vuccanti. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanikāyampi
atk-s0501a:30_2: samanupassāmi evaṃ cittaṃ, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā. Poṇikanikāyo,
atk-s0501a:30_3: cikkhallikanikāyo”ti evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato lokato ca. Ayamassa khuddakanikāyassa
atk-s0501a:30_4: ekadeso. Imāni suttantapiṭakapariyāpannāni atthato vivarituṃ vibhajituṃ uttānīkātuñca
atk-s0501a:30_7: ācariyaparamparāya vācanāmaggaṃ āropitavasena na bhagavatā vuttavasena. Bhagavatā hi vuttavasena –
atk-s0501a:34: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0501a:36: Idaṃ gāthādvayaṃ sabbassāpi buddhavacanassa ādi. Tañca manasāva vuttavasena, na vacībhedaṃ katvā vuttavasena. Vacībhedaṃ pana katvā vuttavasena –
atk-s0501a:41: Ayaṃ gāthā ādi. Tasmā yvāyaṃ navappabhedo khuddakapāṭho imesaṃ khuddakānaṃ ādi, tassa ādito pabhuti atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ ārabhissāmi.
atk-s0501a:43: Tassa cāyamādi “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti. Tassāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanāya mātikā –
atk-s0501a:52: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva idaṃ saraṇattayaṃ kena bhāsitaṃ, kattha bhāsitaṃ, kadā bhāsitaṃ, kasmā bhāsitaṃ avuttamapicādito tathāgatena kasmā idhādito vuttanti pañca pañhā.
atk-s0501a:53_0: Tesaṃ vissajjanā kena bhāsitanti bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, na sāvakehi, na isīhi, na devatāhi.
atk-s0501a:53_1: Katthāti bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye. Kadāti āyasmante yase saddhiṃ sahāyakehi
atk-s0501a:53_2: arahattaṃ patte ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu bahujanahitāya loke dhammadesanaṃ karontesu.
atk-s0501a:54_0: “Evañca pana, bhikkhave, pabbājetabbo upasampādetabbo. Paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā
atk-s0501a:54_1: kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā
atk-s0501a:54_2: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā ‘evaṃ vadehī’ti vattabbo ‘buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:54_3: gacchāmi, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”’ti.
atk-s0501a:55_0: Kasmā cidhādito vuttanti idañca navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ tīhi piṭakehi saṅgaṇhitvā
atk-s0501a:55_1: vācanāmaggaṃ āropentehi pubbācariyehi yasmā iminā maggena devamanussā upāsakabhāvena
atk-s0501a:55_2: vā pabbajitabhāvena vā sāsanaṃ otaranti, tasmā sāsanotārassa maggabhūtattā idha khuddakapāṭhe
atk-s0501a:59_0: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ, gamakañca vibhāvaye”ti, tattha sabbadhammesu
atk-s0501a:59_2: sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ vā saccābhisambodhimupādāya paññattito sattaviseso buddho. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:60: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto, balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
atk-s0501a:62: Byañjanato pana “bujjhitāti buddho, bodhetāti buddho”ti evamādinā nayena veditabbo. Vuttañcetaṃ –
atk-s0501a:63_0: “Buddhoti kenaṭṭhena buddho? Bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho,
atk-s0501a:63_1: sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, vikasitāya
atk-s0501a:63_2: buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupakkilesasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti
atk-s0501a:63_3: buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho,
atk-s0501a:63_4: ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddho,
atk-s0501a:63_5: abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddho. Buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ, na pitarā
atk-s0501a:63_6: kataṃ, na bhātarā kataṃ, na bhaginiyā kataṃ, na mittāmaccehi kataṃ, na ñātisālohitehi
atk-s0501a:63_7: kataṃ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ, na devatāhi kataṃ, vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:63_8: bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti.
atk-s0501a:64_0: Ettha ca yathā loke avagantā avagatoti vuccati, evaṃ bujjhitā saccānīti buddho. Yathā
atk-s0501a:64_1: paṇṇasosā vātā paṇṇasusāti vuccanti, evaṃ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho. Sabbaññutāya buddhoti
atk-s0501a:64_2: sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti
atk-s0501a:64_3: sabbadhammabodhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti
atk-s0501a:64_4: aññena abodhito sayameva buddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vikasitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavikasanato
atk-s0501a:64_5: padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi
atk-s0501a:64_7: buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddhoti buddhiyatthānaṃ gamanatthapariyāyato
atk-s0501a:64_8: yathā maggaṃ gatopi puriso gatoti vuccati, evaṃ ekāyanamaggaṃ gatattāpi buddhoti
atk-s0501a:64_9: vuccatīti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti
atk-s0501a:64_10: na parehi buddhattā buddho, kintu sayameva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā
atk-s0501a:64_11: buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti
atk-s0501a:64_12: pariyāyavacanametaṃ. Tattha yathā nīlarattaguṇayogato “nīlo paṭo, ratto paṭo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:64_13: evaṃ buddhiguṇayogato buddhoti ñāpetuṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Tato paraṃ buddhoti netaṃ nāmanti
atk-s0501a:64_14: evamādi atthamanugatā ayaṃ paññattīti bodhanatthaṃ vuttanti evarūpena nayena sabbesaṃ
atk-s0501a:67_0: Idāni saraṇagamanādīsu hiṃsatīti saraṇaṃ, saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ
atk-s0501a:67_1: santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiṃ parikkilesaṃ hiṃsati vidhamati nīharati nirodhetīti attho.
atk-s0501a:67_2: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti buddho, bhavakantārā
atk-s0501a:67_3: uttaraṇena assāsadānena ca dhammo, appakānampi kārānaṃ vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena
atk-s0501a:67_4: saṅgho. Tasmā imināpi pariyāyena taṃ ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ. Tappasādataggarutāhi vihataviddhaṃsitakileso
atk-s0501a:67_5: tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto aparappaccayo vā cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṃ. Taṃsamaṅgī satto
atk-s0501a:67_6: taṃ saraṇaṃ gacchati, vuttappakārena cittuppādena “esa me saraṇaṃ, esa me parāyaṇa”nti
atk-s0501a:67_7: evametaṃ upetīti attho. Upento ca “ete mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma,
atk-s0501a:67_8: dhammañca, upāsake no bhagavā dhāretū”ti tapussabhallikādayo viya samādānena vā,
atk-s0501a:67_9: “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī”ti mahākassapādayo viya sissabhāvūpagamanena
atk-s0501a:67_10: vā, “evaṃ vutte brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā
atk-s0501a:67_11: tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi ‘namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
atk-s0501a:67_12: Namo tassa…pe… sammāsambuddhassā”’ti brahmāyuādayo viya tappoṇattena vā, kammaṭṭhānānuyogino
atk-s0501a:67_13: viya attasanniyyātanena vā, ariyapuggalā viya saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena vāti
atk-s0501a:70_0: Idāni “bhedābhedaṃ phalañcāpi, gamanīyañca dīpaye”ti vuttānaṃ bhedādīnaṃ ayaṃ dīpanā,
atk-s0501a:70_1: evaṃ saraṇagatassa puggalassa duvidho saraṇagamanabhedo – sāvajjo ca anavajjo ca.
atk-s0501a:70_2: Anavajjo kālakiriyāya, sāvajjo aññasatthari vuttappakārappavattiyā, tasmiñca vuttappakāraviparītappavattiyā.
atk-s0501a:70_3: So duvidhopi puthujjanānameva. Buddhaguṇesu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇappavattiyā anādarādippavattiyā
atk-s0501a:70_4: ca tesaṃ saraṇaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ hoti. Ariyapuggalā pana abhinnasaraṇā ceva asaṃkiliṭṭhasaraṇā
atk-s0501a:70_5: ca honti. Yathāha “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo
atk-s0501a:70_6: aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyyā”ti. Puthujjanā tu yāvadeva saraṇabhedaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tāvadeva
atk-s0501a:70_7: abhinnasaraṇā. Sāvajjova nesaṃ saraṇabhedo, saṃkileso ca aniṭṭhaphalado hoti. Anavajjo
atk-s0501a:70_8: avipākattā aphalo, abhedo pana phalato iṭṭhameva phalaṃ deti.
atk-s0501a:72: “Yekeci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0501a:74: Tatra ca ye saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena saraṇaṃ gatā, te apāyaṃ na gamissanti. Itare pana saraṇagamanena na gamissantīti evaṃ gāthāya adhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:77_0: Gamanīyadīpanāyaṃ codako āha – “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti ettha yo buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:77_1: gacchati, esa buddhaṃ vā gaccheyya saraṇaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi ca ekassa vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ.
atk-s0501a:77_2: Kasmā? Gamanakiriyāya kammadvayābhāvato. Na hettha “ajaṃ gāmaṃ netī”tiādīsu viya
atk-s0501a:78_0: “Gacchateva pubbaṃ disaṃ, gacchati pacchimaṃ disa”ntiādīsu viya sātthakamevāti ce?
atk-s0501a:78_2: adhippete paṭihatacittopi buddhaṃ upasaṅkamanto buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato siyā. Yañhi
atk-s0501a:78_3: taṃ buddhoti visesitaṃ saraṇaṃ, tamevesa gatoti. “Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttama”nti
atk-s0501a:78_4: vacanato samānādhikaraṇattamevāti ce? Na, tattheva tabbhāvato. Tattheva hi gāthāpade
atk-s0501a:78_5: etaṃ buddhādiratanattayaṃ saraṇagatānaṃ bhayaharaṇattasaṅkhāte saraṇabhāve abyabhicaraṇato
atk-s0501a:78_6: “khemamuttamañca saraṇa”nti ayaṃ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo adhippeto, aññattha tu gamisambandhe
atk-s0501a:78_7: sati saraṇagamanassa appasiddhito anadhippetoti asādhakametaṃ. “Etaṃ saraṇamāgamma,
atk-s0501a:78_8: sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti ettha gamisambandhepi saraṇagamanapasiddhito samānādhikaraṇattamevāti
atk-s0501a:78_9: ce? Na pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgato. Tatrāpi hi samānādhikaraṇabhāve sati etaṃ buddhadhammasaṅghasaraṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:78_10: paṭihatacittopi āgamma sabbadukkhā pamucceyyāti evaṃ pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgo eva
atk-s0501a:78_11: siyā, na ca no dosena atthi atthoti asādhakametaṃ. Yathā “mamañhi, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaṃ
atk-s0501a:78_12: āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī”ti ettha bhagavato kalyāṇamittassa ānubhāvena
atk-s0501a:78_13: parimuccamānā sattā “kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma parimuccantī”ti vuttā. Evamidhāpi buddhadhammasaṅghassa
atk-s0501a:78_14: saraṇassānubhāvena muccamāno “etaṃ saraṇamāgamma, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti vuttoti
atk-s0501a:79: Evaṃ sabbathāpi na buddhassa gamanīyattaṃ yujjati, na saraṇassa, na ubhayesaṃ, icchitabbañca gacchāmīti niddiṭṭhassa gamakassa gamanīyaṃ, tato vattabbā ettha yuttīti. Vuccate –
atk-s0501a:80_0: Buddhoyevettha gamanīyo, gamanākāradassanatthaṃ tu taṃ saraṇavacanaṃ, buddhaṃ saraṇanti
atk-s0501a:80_1: gacchāmi. Esa me saraṇaṃ, esa me parāyaṇaṃ, aghassa, tātā, hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā
atk-s0501a:80_2: adhippāyena etaṃ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi, evaṃ vā jānāmi bujjhāmīti.
atk-s0501a:80_3: Yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gatiattho buddhipi tesaṃ atthoti. Iti-saddassa appayogā ayuttamiti
atk-s0501a:80_4: ce? Taṃ na. Tattha siyā – yadi cettha evamattho bhaveyya, tato “aniccaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ
atk-s0501a:80_5: rūpanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti evamādīsu viya iti-saddo payutto siyā, na ca payutto,
atk-s0501a:80_6: tasmā ayuttametanti. Tañca na, kasmā? Tadatthasambhavā. “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca
atk-s0501a:80_7: saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato”ti evamādīsu viya idhāpi iti-saddassa attho sambhavati, na
atk-s0501a:80_8: ca vijjamānatthasambhavā iti-saddā sabbattha payujjanti, appayuttassāpettha payuttassa
atk-s0501a:80_9: viya iti-saddassa attho viññātabbo aññesu ca evaṃjātikesu, tasmā adoso eva soti.
atk-s0501a:80_10: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajja”ntiādīsu saraṇasseva gamanīyato
atk-s0501a:80_11: yaṃ vuttaṃ “gamanākāradassanatthaṃ tu saraṇavacana”nti, taṃ na yuttamiti ce. Taṃ
atk-s0501a:80_12: nāyuttaṃ. Kasmā? Tadatthasambhavā eva. Tatrāpi hi tassa attho sambhavati, yato pubbasadisameva
atk-s0501a:80_13: appayuttopi payutto viya veditabbo. Itarathā hi pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgo eva siyā,
atk-s0501a:83_0: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ “dhammaṃ saraṇamiccādi, dvayepesa nayo mato”ti ettha vuccate – yvāyaṃ
atk-s0501a:83_1: “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti ettha atthavaṇṇanānayo vutto, “dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0501a:83_2: saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti etasmimpi padadvaye esova veditabbo. Tatrāpi hi dhammasaṅghānaṃ
atk-s0501a:83_3: atthato byañjanato ca vibhāvanamattameva asadisaṃ, sesaṃ vuttasadisameva. Yato yadevettha
atk-s0501a:83_4: asadisaṃ, taṃ vuccate – maggaphalanibbānāni dhammoti eke. Bhāvitamaggānaṃ sacchikatanibbānānañca
atk-s0501a:83_5: apāyesu apatanabhāvena dhāraṇato paramassāsavidhānato ca maggavirāgā eva imasmiṃ
atk-s0501a:83_6: atthe dhammoti amhākaṃ khanti, aggappasādasuttañceva sādhakaṃ. Vuttañcettha “yāvatā,
atk-s0501a:83_7: bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:84: Catubbidhaariyamaggasamaṅgīnaṃ catusāmaññaphalasamadhivāsitakhandhasantānānañca puggalānaṃ samūho diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṃhatattā saṅgho. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a:85_0: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, ānanda, ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā, seyyathidaṃ, cattāro
atk-s0501a:85_1: satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni,
atk-s0501a:85_2: satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, passasi no tvaṃ, ānanda, imesu dhammesu
atk-s0501a:86_0: Ayañhi paramatthasaṅgho saraṇanti gamanīyo. Sutte ca “āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo
atk-s0501a:86_1: añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti vutto. Etaṃ pana saraṇaṃ gatassa
atk-s0501a:86_2: aññasmimpi bhikkhusaṅghe vā bhikkhunisaṅghe vā buddhappamukhe vā saṅghe sammutisaṅghe
atk-s0501a:86_3: vā catuvaggādibhede ekapuggalepi vā bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajite vandanādikiriyāya
atk-s0501a:86_4: saraṇagamanaṃ neva bhijjati na saṃkilissati, ayamettha viseso. Vuttāvasesantu imassa
atk-s0501a:86_5: dutiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa bhedābhedādividhānaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:86_6: Ayaṃ tāva “dhammaṃ saraṇamiccādi, dvayepesa nayo mato”ti etassa vaṇṇanā.
atk-s0501a:88_0: Idāni anupubbavavatthāne, kāraṇañca viniddiseti ettha etesu ca tīsu saraṇavacanesu
atk-s0501a:88_1: sabbasattānaṃ aggoti katvā paṭhamaṃ buddho, tappabhavato tadupadesitato ca anantaraṃ
atk-s0501a:88_2: dhammo, tassa dhammassa ādhārakato tadāsevanato ca ante saṅgho. Sabbasattānaṃ vā
atk-s0501a:88_3: hite niyojakoti katvā paṭhamaṃ buddho, tappabhavato sabbasattahitattā anantaraṃ dhammo,
atk-s0501a:88_4: hitādhigamāya paṭipanno adhigatahito cāti katvā ante saṅgho saraṇabhāvena vavatthapetvā
atk-s0501a:90_0: Idāni yampi vuttaṃ “saraṇattayametañca, upamāhi pakāsaye”ti, tampi vuccate – ettha
atk-s0501a:90_1: pana puṇṇacando viya buddho, candakiraṇanikaro viya tena desito dhammo, puṇṇacandakiraṇasamuppāditapīṇito
atk-s0501a:90_2: loko viya saṅgho. Bālasūriyo viya buddho, tassa rasmijālamiva vuttappakāro dhammo,
atk-s0501a:90_3: tena vihatandhakāro loko viya saṅgho. Vanadāhakapuriso viya buddho, vanadahanaggi
atk-s0501a:90_4: viya kilesavanadahano dhammo, daḍḍhavanattā khettabhūto viya bhūmibhāgo daḍḍhakilesattā
atk-s0501a:90_5: puññakkhettabhūto saṅgho. Mahāmegho viya buddho, salilavuṭṭhi viya dhammo, vuṭṭhinipātūpasamitareṇu
atk-s0501a:90_6: viya janapado upasamitakilesareṇu saṅgho. Susārathi viya buddho, assājānīyavinayūpāyo
atk-s0501a:90_7: viya dhammo, suvinītassājānīyasamūho viya saṅgho. Sabbadiṭṭhisalluddharaṇato sallakatto
atk-s0501a:90_8: viya buddho, salluddharaṇūpāyo viya dhammo, samuddhaṭasallo viya jano samuddhaṭadiṭṭhisallo
atk-s0501a:90_9: saṅgho. Mohapaṭalasamuppāṭanato vā sālākiyo viya buddho, paṭalasamuppāṭanupāyo viya
atk-s0501a:90_10: dhammo, samuppāṭitapaṭalo vippasannalocano viya jano samuppāṭitamohapaṭalo vippasannañāṇalocano
atk-s0501a:90_11: saṅgho. Sānusayakilesabyādhiharaṇasamatthatāya vā kusalo vejjo viya buddho, sammā
atk-s0501a:90_12: payuttabhesajjamiva dhammo, bhesajjapayogena samupasantabyādhi viya janasamudāyo
atk-s0501a:91_0: Atha vā sudesako viya buddho, sumaggo viya khemantabhūmi viya ca dhammo, maggappaṭipanno
atk-s0501a:91_1: khemantabhūmippatto viya saṅgho. Sunāviko viya buddho, nāvā viya dhammo, pārappatto
atk-s0501a:91_2: sampattiko viya jano saṅgho. Himavā viya buddho, tappabhavosadhamiva dhammo, osadhūpabhogena
atk-s0501a:91_3: nirāmayo viya jano saṅgho. Dhanado viya buddho, dhanaṃ viya dhammo, yathādhippāyaṃ
atk-s0501a:91_4: laddhadhano viya jano sammāladdhaariyadhano saṅgho. Nidhidassanako viya buddho, nidhi
atk-s0501a:91_5: viya dhammo, nidhippatto viya jano saṅgho.
atk-s0501a:92_0: Apica abhayado viya vīrapuriso buddho, abhayamiva dhammo, sampattābhayo viya jano
atk-s0501a:92_1: accantasabbabhayo saṅgho. Assāsako viya buddho, assāso viya dhammo, assatthajano
atk-s0501a:92_2: viya saṅgho. Sumitto viya buddho, hitūpadeso viya dhammo, hitūpayogena pattasadattho
atk-s0501a:92_3: viya jano saṅgho. Dhanākaro viya buddho, dhanasāro viya dhammo, dhanasārūpabhogo
atk-s0501a:92_4: viya jano saṅgho. Rājakumāranhāpako viya buddho, sīsanhānasalilaṃ viya dhammo, sunhātarājakumāravaggo
atk-s0501a:92_5: viya saddhammasalilasunhāto saṅgho. Alaṅkārakārako viya buddho, alaṅkāro viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a:92_6: alaṅkatarājaputtagaṇo viya saddhammālaṅkato saṅgho. Candanarukkho viya buddho, tappabhavagandho
atk-s0501a:92_7: viya dhammo, candanupabhogena santapariḷāho viya jano saddhammūpabhogena santapariḷāho
atk-s0501a:92_8: saṅgho. Dāyajjasampadānako viya pitā buddho, dāyajjaṃ viya dhammo, dāyajjaharo puttavaggo
atk-s0501a:92_9: viya saddhammadāyajjaharo saṅgho. Vikasitapadumaṃ viya buddho, tappabhavamadhu viya
atk-s0501a:92_10: dhammo, tadupabhogībhamaragaṇo viya saṅgho. Evaṃ saraṇattayametañca, upamāhi pakāsaye.
atk-s0501a:93: Ettāvatā ca yā pubbe “kena kattha kadā kasmā, bhāsitaṃ saraṇattaya”ntiādīhi catūhi gāthāhi atthavaṇṇanāya mātikā nikkhittā, sā atthato pakāsitā hotīti.
atk-s0501a:98_0: Evaṃ saraṇagamanehi sāsanotāraṃ dassetvā sāsanaṃ otiṇṇena upāsakena vā pabbajitena
atk-s0501a:98_1: vā yesu sikkhāpadesu paṭhamaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ, tāni dassetuṃ nikkhittassa sikkhāpadapāṭhassa
atk-s0501a:99: “Yena yattha yadā yasmā, vuttānetāni taṃ nayaṃ;
atk-s0501a:101: “Pakatiyā ca yaṃ vajjaṃ, vajjaṃ paṇṇattiyā ca yaṃ;
atk-s0501a:111_0: Tattha etāni pāṇātipātāveramaṇītiādīni dasa sikkhāpadāni bhagavatā eva vuttāni, na
atk-s0501a:111_1: sāvakādīhi. Tāni ca sāvatthiyaṃ vuttāni jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0501a:111_2: rāhulaṃ pabbājetvā kapilavatthuto sāvatthiṃ anuppattena sāmaṇerānaṃ sikkhāpadavavatthāpanatthaṃ. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ –
atk-s0501a:112_0: “Atha kho bhagavā kapilavatthusmiṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ
atk-s0501a:112_1: pakkāmi. Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari. Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0501a:112_2: sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tena kho pana samayena …pe…
atk-s0501a:112_3: atha kho sāmaṇerānaṃ etadahosi – ‘kati nu kho amhākaṃ sikkhāpadāni, kattha ca amhehi
atk-s0501a:112_4: sikkhitabba”’nti. Bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṃ
atk-s0501a:112_5: dasa sikkhāpadāni, tesu ca sāmaṇerehi sikkhituṃ, pāṇātipātāveramaṇī…pe… jātarūparajatapaṭiggahaṇā veramaṇī”ti.
atk-s0501a:113_0: Tānetāni “samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti suttānusārena saraṇagamanesu ca dassitapāṭhānusārena
atk-s0501a:113_1: “pāṇātipātā veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmī”ti evaṃ vācanāmaggaṃ āropitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0501a:113_2: Evaṃ tāva “yena yattha yadā yasmā, vuttānetāni taṃ nayaṃ vatvā”ti so nayo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0501a:115_0: Ettha ca ādito dve catutthapañcamāni upāsakānaṃ sāmaṇerānañca sādhāraṇāni niccasīlavasena.
atk-s0501a:115_1: Uposathasīlavasena pana upāsakānaṃ sattamaṭṭhamaṃ cekaṃ aṅgaṃ katvā sabbapacchimavajjāni
atk-s0501a:115_2: sabbānipi sāmaṇerehi sādhāraṇāni, pacchimaṃ pana sāmaṇerānameva visesabhūtanti evaṃ
atk-s0501a:115_3: sādhāraṇavisesato vavatthānaṃ kātabbaṃ. Purimāni cettha pañca ekantaakusalacittasamuṭṭhānattā
atk-s0501a:115_4: pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pakativajjato veramaṇiyā, sesāni paṇṇattivajjatoti evaṃ pakatiyā
atk-s0501a:115_5: ca yaṃ vajjaṃ, vajjaṃ paṇṇattiyā ca yaṃ, taṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:117: Yasmā cettha “veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmī”ti etāni sabbasādhāraṇāni padāni, tasmā etesaṃ padānaṃ byañjanato ca atthato ca ayaṃ sādhāraṇavibhāvanā veditabbā –
atk-s0501a:118_0: Tattha byañjanato tāva veraṃ maṇatīti veramaṇī, veraṃ pajahati, vinodeti, byantīkaroti,
atk-s0501a:118_1: anabhāvaṃ gametīti attho. Viramati vā etāya karaṇabhūtāya veramhā puggaloti, vikārassa
atk-s0501a:118_2: vekāraṃ katvā veramaṇī. Teneva cettha “veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ viramaṇisikkhāpada”nti
atk-s0501a:118_3: dvidhā sajjhāyaṃ karonti. Sikkhitabbāti sikkhā, pajjate anenāti padaṃ. Sikkhāya padaṃ
atk-s0501a:118_4: sikkhāpadaṃ, sikkhāya adhigamūpāyoti attho. Atha vā mūlaṃ nissayo patiṭṭhāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0501a:118_5: hoti. Veramaṇī eva sikkhāpadaṃ veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ, viramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ vā dutiyena
atk-s0501a:118_6: nayena. Sammā ādiyāmi samādiyāmi, avītikkamanādhippāyena akhaṇḍakāritāya acchiddakāritāya
atk-s0501a:119_0: Atthato pana veramaṇīti kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttā virati, sā pāṇātipātā viramantassa
atk-s0501a:119_1: “yā tasmiṃ samaye pāṇātipātā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti
atk-s0501a:119_2: velāanatikkamo setughāto”ti evamādinā nayena vibhaṅge vuttā. Kāmañcesā veramaṇī nāma
atk-s0501a:119_3: lokuttarāpi atthi, idha pana samādiyāmīti vuttattā samādānavasena pavattārahā, tasmā
atk-s0501a:119_4: sā na hotīti kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttā viratīti vuttā.
atk-s0501a:120_0: Sikkhāti tisso sikkhā adhisīlasikkhā, adhicittasikkhā, adhipaññāsikkhāti. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0501a:120_1: panatthe sampattaviratisīlaṃ lokikā vipassanā rūpārūpajhānāni ariyamaggo ca sikkhāti
atk-s0501a:121_0: “Katame dhammā sikkhā? Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, somanassasahagataṃ
atk-s0501a:121_1: ñāṇasampayuttaṃ…pe… tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hoti, ime dhammā sikkhā.
atk-s0501a:122_0: “Katame dhammā sikkhā? Yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti vivicceva kāmehi
atk-s0501a:122_1: vivicca akusalehi dhammehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ…pe… pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati…pe…
atk-s0501a:123: “Katame dhammā sikkhā? Yasmiṃ samaye arūpapattiyā…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasahagataṃ…pe… avikkhepo hoti, ime dhammā sikkhā.
atk-s0501a:124: “Katame dhammā sikkhā? Yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānikaṃ…pe… avikkhepo hoti, ime dhammā sikkhā”ti.
atk-s0501a:125_0: Etāsu sikkhāsu yāya kāyaci sikkhāya padaṃ adhigamūpāyo, atha vā mūlaṃ nissayo patiṭṭhāti
atk-s0501a:125_1: sikkhāpadaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento
atk-s0501a:125_2: bahulīkaronto”ti evamādi. Evamettha sādhāraṇānaṃ padānaṃ sādhāraṇā byañjanato atthato
atk-s0501a:127_0: Idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ – “atha pañcasu pubbesu, visesatthappakāsato…pe… viññātabbo vinicchayo”ti,
atk-s0501a:127_1: tatthetaṃ vuccati – pāṇātipātoti ettha tāva pāṇoti jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhā khandhasantati,
atk-s0501a:127_2: taṃ vā upādāya paññatto satto. Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino tassa pāṇassa jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0501a:127_3: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto. Adinnādānanti ettha
atk-s0501a:127_4: adinnanti parapariggahitaṃ, yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo
atk-s0501a:127_5: ca hoti, tasmiṃ parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0501a:127_6: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā eva theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Abrahmacariyanti
atk-s0501a:127_8: abrahmacariyaṃ. Musāvādoti ettha musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako
atk-s0501a:127_9: vacīpayogo kāyapayogo vā, visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0501a:127_11: ettha pana surāti pañca surā – piṭṭhasurā, pūvasurā, odanasurā, kiṇṇapakkhittā, sambhārasaṃyuttā
atk-s0501a:127_12: cāti. Merayampi pupphāsavo, phalāsavo, guḷāsavo, madhvāsavo, sambhārasaṃyutto cāti
atk-s0501a:127_13: pañcavidhaṃ. Majjanti tadubhayameva madaniyaṭṭhena majjaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci
atk-s0501a:127_14: atthi madaniyaṃ, yena pītena matto hoti pamatto, idaṃ vuccati majjaṃ. Pamādaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0501a:127_15: yāya cetanāya taṃ pivati ajjhoharati, sā cetanā madappamādahetuto pamādaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0501a:127_16: vuccati, yato ajjhoharaṇādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā surāmerayamajjānaṃ ajjhoharaṇacetanā
atk-s0501a:127_17: “surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāna”nti veditabbā. Evaṃ tāvettha pāṇātipātappabhutīhi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:129_0: Ekatānānatāditoti ettha āha – kiṃ pana vajjhavadhakappayogacetanādīnaṃ ekatāya pāṇātipātassa
atk-s0501a:129_1: aññassa vā adinnādānādino ekattaṃ, nānatāya nānattaṃ hoti, udāhu noti. Kasmā panetaṃ
atk-s0501a:129_2: vuccati? Yadi tāva ekatāya ekattaṃ, atha yadā ekaṃ vajjhaṃ bahū vadhakā vadhenti,
atk-s0501a:129_3: eko vā vadhako bahuke vajjhe vadheti, ekena vā sāhatthikādinā payogena bahū vajjhā
atk-s0501a:129_4: vadhīyanti, ekā vā cetanā bahūnaṃ vajjhānaṃ jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0501a:129_5: tadā ekena pāṇātipātena bhavitabbaṃ. Yadi pana nānatāya nānattaṃ. Atha yadā eko vadhako
atk-s0501a:129_6: ekassatthāya ekaṃ payogaṃ karonto bahū vajjhe vadheti, bahū vā vadhakā devadattayaññadattasomadattādīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:129_7: bahūnamatthāya bahū payoge karontā ekameva devadattaṃ yaññadattaṃ somadattaṃ vā vadhenti,
atk-s0501a:129_8: bahūhi vā sāhatthikādīhi payogehi eko vajjho vadhīyati. Bahū vā cetanā ekasseva vajjhassa
atk-s0501a:129_9: jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti, tadā bahūhi pāṇātipātehi bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:129_10: Ubhayampi cetamayuttaṃ. Atha neva etesaṃ vajjhādīnaṃ ekatāya ekattaṃ, nānatāya nānattaṃ,
atk-s0501a:129_11: aññatheva tu ekattaṃ nānattañca hoti, taṃ vattabbaṃ pāṇātipātassa, evaṃ sesānampīti.
atk-s0501a:130_0: Vuccate – tattha tāva pāṇātipātassa na vajjhavadhakādīnaṃ paccekamekatāya ekatā,
atk-s0501a:130_1: nānatāya nānatā, kintu vajjhavadhakādīnaṃ yuganandhamekatāya ekatā, dvinnampi tu
atk-s0501a:130_2: tesaṃ, tato aññatarassa vā nānatāya nānatā. Tathā hi bahūsu vadhakesu bahūhi sarakkhepādīhi
atk-s0501a:130_3: ekena vā opātakhaṇanādinā payogena bahū vajjhe vadhentesupi bahū pāṇātipātā honti.
atk-s0501a:130_4: Ekasmiṃ vadhake ekena, bahūhi vā payogehi tappayogasamuṭṭhāpikāya ca ekāya, bahūhi
atk-s0501a:130_5: vā cetanāhi bahū vajjhe vadhentepi bahū pāṇātipātā honti, bahūsu ca vadhakesu yathāvuttappakārehi
atk-s0501a:130_6: bahūhi, ekena vā payogena ekaṃ vajjhaṃ vadhentesupi bahū pāṇātipātā honti. Esa nayo
atk-s0501a:131_1: rūpadhammesu rūpāyatanādiaññatarasaṅkhārārammaṇāni. Musāvādo yassa musā bhaṇati,
atk-s0501a:131_2: tamārabhitvā pavattanato sattārammaṇo. Abrahmacariyampi sattārammaṇanti eke. Adinnādānañca
atk-s0501a:131_3: yadā satto haritabbo hoti, tadā sattārammaṇanti. Api cettha saṅkhāravaseneva sattārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0501a:131_4: na paṇṇattivasenāti. Evamettha ārammaṇatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:132_0: Ādānatoti pāṇātipātāveramaṇisikkhāpadādīni cetāni sāmaṇerena bhikkhusantike samādinnāneva
atk-s0501a:132_1: samādinnāni honti, upāsakena pana attanā samādiyantenāpi samādinnāni honti, parassa
atk-s0501a:132_2: santike samādiyantenāpi. Ekajjhaṃ samādinnānipi samādinnāni honti, paccekaṃ samādinnānipi.
atk-s0501a:132_3: Kintu nānaṃ ekajjhaṃ samādiyato ekāyeva virati, ekāva cetanā hoti, kiccavasena panetāsaṃ
atk-s0501a:132_4: pañcavidhattaṃ viññāyati. Paccekaṃ samādiyato pana pañceva viratiyo, pañca ca cetanā
atk-s0501a:132_5: hontīti veditabbā. Evamettha ādānatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:133_0: Bhedatoti sāmaṇerānañcettha ekasmiṃ bhinne sabbānipi bhinnāni honti. Pārājikaṭṭhāniyāni
atk-s0501a:133_1: hi tāni tesaṃ, yaṃ taṃ vītikkantaṃ hoti, teneva kammabaddho. Gahaṭṭhānaṃ pana ekasmiṃ
atk-s0501a:133_2: bhinne ekameva bhinnaṃ hoti, yato tesaṃ taṃsamādāneneva puna pañcaṅgikattaṃ sīlassa
atk-s0501a:133_3: sampajjati. Apare panāhu – “visuṃ visuṃ samādinnesu ekasmiṃ bhinne ekameva bhinnaṃ
atk-s0501a:133_4: hoti, ‘pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ sīlaṃ samādiyāmī’ti evaṃ pana ekato samādinnesu ekasmiṃ
atk-s0501a:133_5: bhinne sesānipi sabbāni bhinnāni honti. Kasmā? Samādinnassa abhinnattā, yaṃ taṃ vītikkantaṃ,
atk-s0501a:133_6: teneva kammabaddho”ti. Evamettha bhedatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:134_0: Mahāsāvajjatoti guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe pāṇātipāto
atk-s0501a:134_1: appasāvajjo, mahāsarīre mahāsāvajjo. Kasmā? Payogamahantatāya. Payogasamattepi vatthumahantatāya.
atk-s0501a:134_2: Guṇavantesu pana manussādīsu appaguṇe pāṇātipāto appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0501a:134_3: Sarīraguṇānantu samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjatā, tibbatāya
atk-s0501a:134_4: mahāsāvajjatā ca veditabbā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Api cettha surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0501a:134_5: mahāsāvajjaṃ, na tathā pāṇātipātādayo. Kasmā? Manussabhūtassāpi ummattakabhāvasaṃvattanena
atk-s0501a:135_0: Payogatoti ettha ca pāṇātipātassa sāhatthiko, āṇattiko, nissaggiyo, thāvaro, vijjāmayo,
atk-s0501a:135_1: iddhimayoti chappayogā. Tattha kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇaṃ sāhatthiko
atk-s0501a:135_2: payogo, so uddissānuddissabhedato duvidho hoti. Tattha uddissake yaṃ uddissa paharati,
atk-s0501a:135_3: tasseva maraṇena kammunā bajjhati. “Yo koci maratū”ti evaṃ anuddissake pahārapaccayā
atk-s0501a:135_4: yassa kassaci maraṇena. Ubhayathāpi ca paharitamatte vā maratu, pacchā vā teneva
atk-s0501a:135_5: rogena, paharitakkhaṇe eva kammunā bajjhati. Maraṇādhippāyena ca pahāraṃ datvā tena
atk-s0501a:135_6: amatassa puna aññena cittena pahāre dinne pacchāpi yadi paṭhamapahāreneva marati,
atk-s0501a:135_7: tadā eva kammunā baddho hoti. Atha dutiyapahārena, natthi pāṇātipāto. Ubhayehi matepi
atk-s0501a:135_8: paṭhamapahāreneva kammunā baddho, ubhayehipi amate nevatthi pāṇātipāto. Esa nayo
atk-s0501a:135_9: bahukehipi ekassa pahāre dinne. Tatrāpi hi yassa pahārena marati, tasseva kammabaddho hoti.
atk-s0501a:136: Adhiṭṭhahitvā pana āṇāpanaṃ āṇattiko payogo. Tatthapi sāhatthike payoge vuttanayeneva kammabaddho anussaritabbo. Chabbidho cettha niyamo veditabbo –
atk-s0501a:139_0: Tattha vatthūti māretabbo pāṇo. Kāloti pubbaṇhasāyanhādikālo ca, yobbanathāvariyādikālo
atk-s0501a:139_1: ca. Okāsoti gāmo vā nigamo vā vanaṃ vā racchā vā siṅghāṭakaṃ vāti evamādi. Āvudhanti
atk-s0501a:139_2: asi vā usu vā satti vāti evamādi. Iriyāpathoti māretabbassa mārakassa ca ṭhānaṃ vā
atk-s0501a:140_0: Kiriyāvisesoti vijjhanaṃ vā chedanaṃ vā bhedanaṃ vā saṅkhamuṇḍikaṃ vāti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:140_1: Yadi hi vatthuṃ visaṃvādetvā “yaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto, tato aññaṃ māreti, āṇāpakassa
atk-s0501a:140_2: natthi kammabaddho. Atha vatthuṃ avisaṃvādetvā māreti, āṇāpakassa āṇattikkhaṇe āṇattassa
atk-s0501a:140_3: māraṇakkhaṇeti ubhayesampi kammabaddho. Esa nayo kālādīsupi.
atk-s0501a:141: Māraṇatthantu kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇanissajjanaṃ nissaggiyo payogo. Sopi uddissānuddissabhedato duvidho eva, kammabaddho cettha pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:142_1: vā thāvaro payogo. Sopi uddissānuddissabhedato duvidho, yato tatthapi pubbe vuttanayeneva
atk-s0501a:142_2: kammabaddho veditabbo. Ayantu viseso – mūlaṭṭhena opātādīsu paresaṃ mūlena vā mudhā
atk-s0501a:142_3: vā dinnesupi yadi tappaccayā koci marati, mūlaṭṭhasseva kammabaddho. Yadipi ca tena
atk-s0501a:142_4: aññena vā tattha opāte vināsetvā bhūmisame katepi paṃsudhovakā vā paṃsuṃ gaṇhantā,
atk-s0501a:142_5: mūlakhaṇakā vā mūlāni khaṇantā āvāṭaṃ karonti, deve vā vassante kaddamo jāyati, tattha
atk-s0501a:142_6: ca koci otaritvā vā laggitvā vā marati, mūlaṭṭhasseva kammabaddho. Yadi pana yena
atk-s0501a:142_7: laddhaṃ, so añño vā taṃ vitthaṭataraṃ gambhīrataraṃ vā karoti, tappaccayāva koci
atk-s0501a:142_8: marati, ubhayesampi kammabaddho. Yathā tu mūlāni mūlehi saṃsandanti, tathā tatra
atk-s0501a:142_9: thale kate muccati. Evaṃ apassenādīsupi yāva tesaṃ pavatti, tāva yathāsambhavaṃ kammabaddho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:143_0: Māraṇatthaṃ pana vijjāparijappanaṃ vijjāmayo payogo. Dāṭhāvudhādīnaṃ dāṭhākoṭanādimiva
atk-s0501a:143_1: māraṇatthaṃ kammavipākajiddhivikārakaraṇaṃ iddhimayo payogoti. Adinnādānassa tu theyyapasayhapaṭicchannaparikappakusāvahāravasappavattā
atk-s0501a:143_2: sāhatthikāṇattikādayo payogā, tesampi vuttānusāreneva pabhedo veditabbo. Abrahmacariyādīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:143_3: tiṇṇampi sāhatthiko eva payogo labbhatīti. Evamettha payogatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:144_0: Aṅgatoti ettha ca pāṇātipātassa pañca aṅgāni bhavanti – pāṇo ca hoti, pāṇasaññī ca,
atk-s0501a:144_1: vadhakacittañca paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti, vāyamati, tena ca maratīti. Adinnādānassāpi
atk-s0501a:144_2: pañceva – parapariggahitañca hoti, parapariggahitasaññī ca, theyyacittañca paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0501a:144_3: hoti, vāyamati, tena ca ādātabbaṃ ādānaṃ gacchatīti. Abrahmacariyassa pana cattāri
atk-s0501a:144_4: aṅgāni bhavanti – ajjhācariyavatthu ca hoti, tattha ca sevanacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0501a:144_5: hoti, sevanapaccayā payogañca samāpajjati, sādiyati cāti, tathā paresaṃ dvinnampi.
atk-s0501a:144_6: Tattha musāvādassa tāva musā ca hoti taṃ vatthu, visaṃvādanacittañca paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0501a:144_7: hoti, tajjo ca vāyāmo, paravisaṃvādanañca viññāpayamānā viññatti pavattatīti cattāri
atk-s0501a:144_8: aṅgāni veditabbāni. Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānassa pana surādīnañca aññataraṃ hoti
atk-s0501a:144_9: madanīyapātukamyatācittañca paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti, tajjañca vāyāmaṃ āpajjati, pīte
atk-s0501a:144_10: ca pavisatīti imāni cattāri aṅgānīti. Evamettha aṅgatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:145_0: Samuṭṭhānatoti pāṇātipātaadinnādānamusāvādā cettha kāyacittato, vācācittato, kāyavācācittato
atk-s0501a:145_1: cāti tisamuṭṭhānā honti. Abrahmacariyaṃ kāyacittavasena ekasamuṭṭhānameva. Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:145_2: kāyato ca, kāyacittato cāti dvisamuṭṭhānanti. Evamettha samuṭṭhānatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:146_0: Vedanātoti ettha ca pāṇātipāto dukkhavedanāsampayuttova. Adinnādānaṃ tīsu vedanāsu
atk-s0501a:146_1: aññataravedanāsampayuttaṃ, tathā musāvādo. Itarāni dve sukhāya vā adukkhamasukhāya
atk-s0501a:146_2: vā vedanāya sampayuttānīti. Evamettha vedanātopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:147: Mūlatoti pāṇātipāto cettha dosamohamūlo. Adinnādānamusāvādā lobhamohamūlā vā dosamohamūlā vā. Itarāni dve lobhamohamūlānīti. Evamettha mūlatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:148_1: ca, musāvādo vacīkammameva. Yo pana atthabhañjako, so kammapathappatto. Itaro kammameva.
atk-s0501a:148_2: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ kāyakammamevāti. Evamettha kammatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0501a:149_0: Viramatoti ettha āha “pāṇātipātādīhi viramanto kuto viramatī”ti? Vuccate – samādānavasena
atk-s0501a:149_1: tāva viramanto attano vā paresaṃ vā pāṇātipātādiakusalato viramati. Kimārabhitvā?
atk-s0501a:149_2: Yato viramati, tadeva. Sampattavasenāpi viramanto vuttappakārākusalatova. Kimārabhitvā?
atk-s0501a:149_3: Pāṇātipātādīnaṃ vuttārammaṇāneva. Keci pana bhaṇanti “surāmerayamajjasaṅkhāte saṅkhāre
atk-s0501a:149_4: ārabhitvā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā viramati, sattasaṅkhāresu yaṃ pana avaharitabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:149_5: bhañjitabbañca, taṃ ārabhitvā adinnādānā musāvādā ca, satteyevārabhitvā pāṇātipātā
atk-s0501a:149_6: abrahmacariyā cā”ti. Tadaññe “evaṃ sante ‘aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ kareyya, yañca pajahati,
atk-s0501a:149_7: taṃ na jāneyyā’ti evaṃdiṭṭhikā hutvā anicchamānā yadeva pajahati, taṃ attano pāṇātipātādiakusalamevārabhitvā
atk-s0501a:149_8: viramatī”ti vadanti. Tadayuttaṃ. Kasmā? Tassa paccuppannābhāvato bahiddhābhāvato
atk-s0501a:149_9: ca. Sikkhāpadānañhi vibhaṅgapāṭhe “pañcannaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ kati kusalā…pe… kati araṇā”ti
atk-s0501a:149_10: pucchitvā “kusalāyeva, siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”ti evaṃ pavattamāne vissajjane
atk-s0501a:149_12: vuttaṃ, taṃ attano pāṇātipātādiakusalaṃ ārabhitvā viramantassa na yujjati. Yaṃ pana
atk-s0501a:149_13: vuttaṃ – “aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ kareyya, yañca pajahati, taṃ na jāneyyā”ti. Tattha
atk-s0501a:149_14: vuccate – na kiccasādhanavasena pavattento aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ karotīti vā, yañca
atk-s0501a:149_15: pajahati, taṃ na jānātīti vā vuccati.
atk-s0501a:153_0: Phalatoti sabbe eva cete pāṇātipātādayo duggatiphalanibbattakā honti, sugatiyañca
atk-s0501a:153_1: aniṭṭhākantāmanāpavipākanibbattakā honti, samparāye diṭṭhadhamme eva ca avesārajjādiphalanibbattakā.
atk-s0501a:153_2: Apica “yo sabbalahuso pāṇātipātassa vipāko manussabhūtassa appāyukasaṃvattaniko hotī”ti
atk-s0501a:154_1: vinicchayo. Tatthāyaṃ viññāpanā – sabbā eva cetā veramaṇiyo catūhi samuṭṭhahanti
atk-s0501a:154_2: kāyato, kāyacittato, vācācittato, kāyavācācittato cāti. Sabbā eva ca sukhavedanāsampayuttā
atk-s0501a:154_3: vā, adukkhamasukhavedanāsampayuttā vā, alobhādosamūlā vā alobhādosāmohamūlā vā. Catassopi
atk-s0501a:154_4: cettha kāyakammaṃ, musāvādāveramaṇī vacīkammaṃ, maggakkhaṇe ca cittatova samuṭṭhahanti, sabbāpi manokammaṃ.
atk-s0501a:155_0: Pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā cettha aṅgapaccaṅgasampannatā ārohapariṇāhasampattitā javasampattitā
atk-s0501a:155_1: suppatiṭṭhitapādatā cārutā mudutā sucitā sūratā mahabbalatā vissatthavacanatā lokapiyatā
atk-s0501a:155_2: nelatā abhejjaparisatā acchambhitā duppadhaṃsitā parūpakkamena amaraṇatā anantaparivāratā
atk-s0501a:155_3: surūpatā susaṇṭhānatā appābādhatā asokitā piyehi manāpehi saddhiṃ avippayogatā dīghāyukatāti evamādīni phalāni.
atk-s0501a:156_0: Adinnādānā veramaṇiyā mahaddhanatā pahūtadhanadhaññatā anantabhogatā anuppannabhoguppattitā
atk-s0501a:157_2: vā napuṃsakabhāvappaṭilābhassa vā abhabbatā akkodhanatā paccakkhakāritā apatitakkhandhatā
atk-s0501a:157_4: nirāsaṅkatā appossukkatā sukhavihāritā akutobhayatā piyavippayogābhāvatāti evamādīni.
atk-s0501a:158_1: nātithūlatā nātikisatā nātirassatā nātidīghatā sukhasamphassatā uppalagandhamukhatā
atk-s0501a:159_1: khippaṃ paṭijānanatā sadā upaṭṭhitasatitā anummattakatā ñāṇavantatā analasatā ajaḷatā
atk-s0501a:159_2: anelamūgatā amattatā appamattatā asammohatā acchambhitā asārambhitā anussaṅkitā saccavāditā
atk-s0501a:159_4: cāgavantatā sīlavantatā ujutā akkodhanatā hirimanatā ottappitā ujudiṭṭhikatā mahāpaññatā
atk-s0501a:159_5: medhāvitā paṇḍitatā atthānatthakusalatāti evamādīni phalāni. Evamettha pāṇātipātādiveramaṇīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:164_0: Tassāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā – etissā purimapañcasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāya yaṃ yujjati, taṃ tato
atk-s0501a:164_1: gahetvā pacchimesvapi pañcasu sikkhāpadesu yojetabbaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – yatheva
atk-s0501a:164_2: hi purimasikkhāpadesu ārammaṇato ca surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ rūpāyatanādiaññatarasaṅkhārārammaṇaṃ,
atk-s0501a:164_3: tathā idha vikālabhojanaṃ. Etena nayena sabbesaṃ ārammaṇabhedo veditabbo. Ādānato
atk-s0501a:164_4: ca yathā purimāni sāmaṇerena vā upāsakena vā samādiyantena samādinnāni honti, tathā
atk-s0501a:164_5: etānipi. Aṅgatopi yathā tattha pāṇātipātādīnaṃ aṅgabhedo vutto, evamidhāpi vikālabhojanassa
atk-s0501a:164_6: cattāri aṅgāni – vikālo, yāvakālikaṃ, ajjhoharaṇaṃ, anummattakatāti. Etenānusārena
atk-s0501a:164_7: sesānampi aṅgavibhāgo veditabbo. Yathā ca tattha samuṭṭhānato surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:164_8: kāyato ca kāyacittato cāti dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ, evamidha vikālabhojanaṃ. Etena nayena
atk-s0501a:164_9: sabbesaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yathā ca tattha vedanāto adinnādānaṃ tīsu vedanāsu
atk-s0501a:164_10: aññataravedanāsampayuttaṃ, tathā idha vikālabhojanaṃ. Etena nayena sabbesaṃ vedanāsampayogo
atk-s0501a:164_11: veditabbo. Yathā ca tattha abrahmacariyaṃ lobhamohamūlaṃ, evamidha vikālabhojanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:164_12: Aparāni ca dve etena nayena sabbesaṃ mūlabhedo veditabbo. Yathā ca tattha pāṇātipātādayo
atk-s0501a:164_13: kāyakammaṃ, evamidhāpi vikālabhojanādīni. Jātarūparajatappaṭiggahaṇaṃ pana kāyakammaṃ
atk-s0501a:164_14: vā siyā vacīkammaṃ vā kāyadvārādīhi pavattisabbhāvapariyāyena, na kammapathavasena.
atk-s0501a:164_15: Viramatoti yathā ca tattha viramanto attano vā paresaṃ vā pāṇātipātādiakusalato viramati,
atk-s0501a:164_16: evamidhāpi vikālabhojanādiakusalato, kusalatopi vā ekato. Yathā ca purimā pañca veramaṇiyo
atk-s0501a:164_17: catusamuṭṭhānā kāyato, kāyacittato, vācācittato, kāyavācācittato cāti, sabbā sukhavedanāsampayuttā
atk-s0501a:164_18: vā adukkhamasukhavedanāsampayuttā vā, alobhādosamūlā vā alobhādosāmohamūlā vā, sabbā
atk-s0501a:167_0: Ettha pana vikālabhojananti majjhanhikavītikkame bhojanaṃ. Etañhi anuññātakāle vītikkante
atk-s0501a:167_1: bhojanaṃ, tasmā “vikālabhojana”nti vuccati, tato vikālabhojanā. Naccagītavāditavisūkadassananti
atk-s0501a:167_2: ettha naccaṃ nāma yaṃkiñci naccaṃ, gītanti yaṃkiñci gītaṃ, vāditanti yaṃkiñci vāditaṃ.
atk-s0501a:167_4: visūkabhūtaṃ vā dassanaṃ visūkadassanaṃ. Naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca visūkadassanā
atk-s0501a:167_5: ca naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā. Visūkadassanañcettha brahmajāle vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ. Vuttañhi tattha –
atk-s0501a:168_0: “Yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpaṃ
atk-s0501a:168_1: visūkadassanamanuyuttā viharanti, seyyathidaṃ, naccaṃ gītaṃ vāditaṃ pekkhaṃ akkhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:168_2: pāṇissaraṃ vetālaṃ kumbhathūṇaṃ sobhanakaṃ caṇḍālaṃ vaṃsaṃ dhovanaṃ hatthiyuddhaṃ
atk-s0501a:168_3: assayuddhaṃ mahiṃsayuddhaṃ usabhayuddhaṃ ajayuddhaṃ meṇḍayuddhaṃ kukkuṭayuddhaṃ vaṭṭakayuddhaṃ
atk-s0501a:168_4: daṇḍayuddhaṃ muṭṭhiyuddhaṃ nibbuddhaṃ uyyodhikaṃ balaggaṃ senābyūhaṃ anīkadassanaṃ
atk-s0501a:168_5: iti vā, iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato samaṇo gotamo”ti.
atk-s0501a:169_0: Atha vā yathāvuttenatthena naccagītavāditāni eva visūkāni naccagītavāditavisūkāni,
atk-s0501a:169_2: “Dassanasavanā”ti vattabbe yathā “so ca hoti micchādiṭṭhiko viparītadassano”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a:169_4: vuttaṃ. Dassanakamyatāya upasaṅkamitvā passato eva cettha vītikkamo hoti. Ṭhitanisinnasayanokāse
atk-s0501a:169_5: pana āgataṃ gacchantassa vā āpāthagataṃ passato siyā saṃkileso, na vītikkamo. Dhammūpasaṃhitampi
atk-s0501a:169_6: cettha gītaṃ na vaṭṭati, gītūpasaṃhito pana dhammo vaṭṭatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:170_0: Mālādīni dhāraṇādīhi yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yojetabbāni. Tattha mālāti yaṃkiñci pupphajātaṃ.
atk-s0501a:170_1: Vilepananti yaṃkiñci vilepanatthaṃ pisitvā paṭiyattaṃ. Avasesaṃ sabbampi vāsacuṇṇadhūpanādikaṃ
atk-s0501a:170_2: gandhajātaṃ gandho. Taṃ sabbampi maṇḍanavibhūsanatthaṃ na vaṭṭati, bhesajjatthantu
atk-s0501a:170_3: vaṭṭati, pūjanatthañca abhihaṭaṃ sādiyato na kenaci pariyāyena na vaṭṭati. Uccāsayananti
atk-s0501a:170_4: pamāṇātikkantaṃ vuccati. Mahāsayananti akappiyasayanaṃ akappiyattharaṇañca. Tadubhayampi
atk-s0501a:170_5: sādiyato na kenaci pariyāyena vaṭṭati. Jātarūpanti suvaṇṇaṃ. Rajatanti kahāpaṇo,
atk-s0501a:170_6: lohamāsakadārumāsakajatumāsakādi yaṃ yaṃ tattha tattha vohāraṃ gacchati, tadubhayampi
atk-s0501a:170_7: jātarūparajataṃ. Tassa yena kenaci pakārena sādiyanaṃ paṭiggaho nāma, so na yena
atk-s0501a:170_8: kenaci pariyāyena vaṭṭatīti evaṃ āveṇikaṃ vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:171_0: Dasapi cetāni sikkhāpadāni hīnena chandena cittavīriyavīmaṃsāhi vā samādinnāni hīnāni,
atk-s0501a:171_1: majjhimehi majjhimāni, paṇītehi paṇītāni. Taṇhādiṭṭhimānehi vā upakkiliṭṭhāni hīnāni,
atk-s0501a:171_2: anupakkiliṭṭhāni majjhimāni, tattha tattha paññāya anuggahitāni paṇītāni. Ñāṇavippayuttena
atk-s0501a:171_3: vā kusalacittena samādinnāni hīnāni, sasaṅkhārikañāṇasampayuttena majjhimāni, asaṅkhārikena
atk-s0501a:172: Ettāvatā ca yā pubbe “yena yattha yadā yasmā”tiādīhi chahi gāthāhi sikkhāpadapāṭhassa vaṇṇanatthaṃ mātikā nikkhittā, sā atthato pakāsitā hotīti.
atk-s0501a:177_0: Idāni yadidaṃ evaṃ dasahi sikkhāpadehi parisuddhapayogassa sīle patiṭṭhitassa kulaputtassa
atk-s0501a:177_1: āsayaparisuddhatthaṃ cittabhāvanatthañca aññatra buddhuppādā appavattapubbaṃ sabbatitthiyānaṃ
atk-s0501a:178_0: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato mahato saṃvegāya saṃvattati. Mahato atthāya
atk-s0501a:178_1: saṃvattati. Mahato yogakkhemāya saṃvattati. Mahato satisampajaññāya saṃvattati. Ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya
atk-s0501a:178_3: saṃvattati. Katamo ekadhammo? Kāyagatā sati. Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, na paribhuñjanti,
atk-s0501a:178_4: ye kāyagatāsatiṃ na paribhuñjanti. Amataṃ te, bhikkhave, paribhuñjanti, ye kāyagatāsatiṃ
atk-s0501a:178_5: paribhuñjanti. Amataṃ tesaṃ, bhikkhave, aparibhuttaṃ paribhuttaṃ, parihīnaṃ aparihīnaṃ,
atk-s0501a:178_6: viraddhaṃ āraddhaṃ, yesaṃ kāyagatā sati āraddhā”ti. –
atk-s0501a:180: “Kathaṃ bhāvitā, bhikkhave, kāyagatāsati kathaṃ bahulīkatā mahabbalā hoti mahānisaṃsā? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā”ti –
atk-s0501a:181_0: Ādinā nayena ānāpānapabbaṃ iriyāpathapabbaṃ catusampajaññapabbaṃ paṭikūlamanasikārapabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:181_1: dhātumanasikārapabbaṃ nava sivathikapabbānīti imesaṃ cuddasannaṃ pabbānaṃ vasena
atk-s0501a:181_2: kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tassa bhāvanāniddeso anuppatto. Tattha yasmā
atk-s0501a:181_3: iriyāpathapabbaṃ catusampajaññapabbaṃ dhātumanasikārapabbanti imāni tīṇi vipassanāvasena
atk-s0501a:181_4: vuttāni. Nava sivathikapabbāni vipassanāñāṇesuyeva ādīnavānupassanāvasena vuttāni.
atk-s0501a:181_5: Yāpi cettha uddhumātakādīsu samādhibhāvanā iccheyya, sā visuddhimagge vitthārato
atk-s0501a:181_6: asubhabhāvanāniddese pakāsitā eva. Ānāpānapabbaṃ pana paṭikūlamanasikārapabbañceti
atk-s0501a:181_7: imānettha dve samādhivasena vuttāni. Tesu ānāpānapabbaṃ ānāpānassativasena visuṃ
atk-s0501a:182_0: “Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā
atk-s0501a:182_1: tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā, lomā…pe… mutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:183: Evaṃ tattha tattha matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjena saṅgahetvā desitaṃ kāyagatāsatikoṭṭhāsabhāvanāpariyāyaṃ dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ āraddhaṃ, tassāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0501a:184_0: Tattha atthīti saṃvijjanti. Imasminti yvāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyanto
atk-s0501a:184_1: pūro nānappakārassa asucinoti vuccati, tasmiṃ. Kāyeti sarīre. Sarīrañhi asucisañcayato,
atk-s0501a:184_2: kucchitānaṃ vā kesādīnañceva cakkhurogādīnañca rogasatānaṃ āyabhūtato kāyoti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:184_3: Kesā…pe… muttanti ete kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā, tattha “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā atthi
atk-s0501a:184_4: lomā”ti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. Tena kiṃ kathitaṃ hoti? Imasmiṃ pādatalā paṭṭhāya
atk-s0501a:184_5: upari, kesamatthakā paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā, tacato paṭṭhāya paritoti ettake byāmamatte kaḷevare
atk-s0501a:184_6: sabbākārenāpi vicinanto na koci kiñci muttaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā veḷuriyaṃ vā agaruṃ vā candanaṃ
atk-s0501a:184_7: vā kuṅkumaṃ vā kappūraṃ vā vāsacuṇṇādiṃ vā aṇumattampi sucibhāvaṃ passati, atha kho
atk-s0501a:184_8: paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ assirikadassanaṃ nānappakāraṃ kesalomādibhedaṃ asucimeva passatīti.
atk-s0501a:187_0: Asubhabhāvanāvasena panassa evaṃ vaṇṇanā veditabbā – evametasmiṃ pāṇātipātāveramaṇisikkhāpadādibhede
atk-s0501a:187_1: sīle patiṭṭhitena payogasuddhena ādikammikena kulaputtena āsayasuddhiyā adhigamanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:187_3: kittipalibodhena vā saha dasa palibodhā honti. Athānena āvāsakulalābhagaṇañātikittīsu
atk-s0501a:187_4: saṅgappahānena, kammaddhānaganthesu abyāpārena, rogassa tikicchāyāti evaṃ te dasa
atk-s0501a:187_7: āgamādhigamasamannāgato tato aññataraṅgasamannāgato vā kammaṭṭhānadāyako ācariyo
atk-s0501a:187_8: vinayānurūpena vidhinā upagantabbo, vattasampadāya ca ārādhitacittassa tassa attano
atk-s0501a:187_9: adhippāyo nivedetabbo. Tena tassa nimittajjhāsayacariyādhimuttibhedaṃ ñatvā yadi
atk-s0501a:187_10: etaṃ kammaṭṭhānamanurūpaṃ, atha yasmiṃ vihāre attanā vasati, yadi tasmiṃyeva sopi
atk-s0501a:187_11: vasitukāmo hoti, tato saṅkhepato kammaṭṭhānaṃ dātabbaṃ. Atha aññatra vasitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0501a:187_13: sappabhedaṃ vitthārena kathetabbaṃ. Tena taṃ sapurekkhāraṃ sappabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:189: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
atk-s0501a:194: Evaṃ aṭṭhārasa senāsanāni parivajjetabbānīti vuccanti. Tāni vajjetvā, yaṃ taṃ –
atk-s0501a:195_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ
atk-s0501a:195_1: nātidūraṃ hoti, naccāsannaṃ, gamanāgamanasampannaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ, rattiṃ appasaddaṃ
atk-s0501a:195_4: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā
atk-s0501a:195_5: vinayadharā mātikādharā, te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ,
atk-s0501a:195_6: bhante, kathaṃ, imassa ko attho’ti? Tassa, te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva vivaranti, anuttānīkatañca
atk-s0501a:195_7: uttāniṃ karonti, anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
atk-s0501a:195_8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, senāsanaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ hotī”ti. –
atk-s0501a:196_0: Evaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ senāsanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathārūpaṃ senāsanaṃ upagamma katasabbakiccena
atk-s0501a:196_1: kāmesu ādīnavaṃ, nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā buddhasubuddhatāya dhammasudhammatāya
atk-s0501a:196_2: saṅghasuppaṭipannatāya ca anussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā yaṃ taṃ –
atk-s0501a:199_0: Evaṃ sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ; anupubbato, nātisīghato, nātisaṇikato, vikkhepappaṭibāhanato,
atk-s0501a:199_1: paṇṇattisamatikkamato, anupubbamuñcanato, appanāto, tayo ca suttantāti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ
atk-s0501a:199_2: manasikārakosallañca vuttaṃ. Taṃ apariccajantena dvattiṃsākārabhāvanā ārabhitabbā.
atk-s0501a:199_3: Evañhi ārabhato sabbākārena dvattiṃsākārabhāvanā sampajjati no aññathā.
atk-s0501a:200_0: Tattha āditova tacapañcakaṃ tāva gahetvā api tepiṭakena “kesā lomā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0501a:200_1: anulomato, tasmiṃ paguṇībhūte “taco dantā”ti evamādinā nayena paṭilomato, tasmimpi
atk-s0501a:200_3: pāḷipaguṇībhāvatthañca vacasā koṭṭhāsasabhāvapariggahatthaṃ manasā ca addhamāsaṃ
atk-s0501a:200_4: bhāvetabbaṃ. Vacasā hissa bhāvanā bahi visaṭavitakke vicchinditvā manasā bhāvanāya
atk-s0501a:200_5: pāḷipaguṇatāya ca paccayo hoti, manasā bhāvanā asubhavaṇṇalakkhaṇānaṃ aññataravasena
atk-s0501a:200_6: pariggahassa, atha teneva nayena vakkapañcakaṃ addhamāsaṃ, tato tadubhayamaddhamāsaṃ,
atk-s0501a:200_7: tato papphāsapañcakamaddhamāsaṃ, tato taṃ pañcakattayampi addhamāsaṃ, atha ante avuttampi
atk-s0501a:200_8: matthaluṅgaṃ pathavīdhātuākārehi saddhiṃ ekato bhāvanatthaṃ idha pakkhipitvā matthaluṅgapañcakaṃ
atk-s0501a:200_9: addhamāsaṃ, tato pañcakacatukkampi addhamāsaṃ, atha medachakkamaddhamāsaṃ, tato medachakkena
atk-s0501a:200_10: saha pañcakacatukkampi addhamāsaṃ, atha muttachakkamaddhamāsaṃ, tato sabbameva dvattiṃsākāramaddhamāsanti
atk-s0501a:200_11: evaṃ cha māse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedato vavatthapentena bhāvetabbaṃ. Etaṃ
atk-s0501a:200_12: majjhimapaññaṃ puggalaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Mandapaññena tu yāvajīvaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ tikkhapaññassa
atk-s0501a:201_0: Etthāha – “kathaṃ panāyamimaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapetī”ti? Ayañhi “atthi
atk-s0501a:201_1: imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti evamādinā nayena tacapañcakādivibhāgato dvattiṃsākāraṃ bhāvento
atk-s0501a:201_2: kesā tāva vaṇṇato kāḷakāti vavatthapeti, yādisakā vānena diṭṭhā honti. Saṇṭhānato
atk-s0501a:201_3: dīghavaṭṭalikā tulādaṇḍamivāti vavatthapeti. Disato pana yasmā imasmiṃ kāye nābhito
atk-s0501a:201_4: uddhaṃ uparimā disā adho heṭṭhimāti vuccati, tasmā imassa kāyassa uparimāya disāya
atk-s0501a:201_6: jātāti. Tattha yathā vammikamatthake jātāni kuṇṭhatiṇāni na jānanti “mayaṃ vammikamatthake
atk-s0501a:201_7: jātānī”ti; napi vammikamatthako jānāti “mayi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jātānī”ti; evameva na kesā
atk-s0501a:201_8: jānanti “mayaṃ sīsacamme jātā”ti, napi sīsacammaṃ jānāti “mayi kesā jātā”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:201_9: hi ete dhammā acetanā abyākatā suññā paramaduggandhajegucchappaṭikūlā, na satto na
atk-s0501a:201_10: puggaloti vavatthapeti. Paricchedatoti duvidho paricchedo sabhāgavisabhāgavasena.
atk-s0501a:201_11: Tattha kesā heṭṭhā patiṭṭhitacammatalena tattha vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena
atk-s0501a:201_12: attano mūlatalena ca upari ākāsena tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti evaṃ sabhāgaparicchedato,
atk-s0501a:201_13: kesā na avasesaekatiṃsākārā. Avasesā ekatiṃsā na kesāti evaṃ visabhāgaparicchedato
atk-s0501a:201_14: ca vavatthapeti. Evaṃ tāva kese vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:202_0: Avasesesu lomā vaṇṇato yebhuyyena nīlavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti, yādisakā vānena diṭṭhā
atk-s0501a:202_1: honti. Saṇṭhānato oṇatacāpasaṇṭhānā, upari vaṅkatālahīrasaṇṭhānā vā, disato dvīsu
atk-s0501a:202_2: disāsu jātā, okāsato hatthatalapādatale ṭhapetvā yebhuyyena avasesasarīracamme jātāti.
atk-s0501a:203_0: Tattha yathā purāṇagāmaṭṭhāne jātāni dabbatiṇāni na jānanti “mayaṃ purāṇagāmaṭṭhāne
atk-s0501a:203_1: jātānī”ti, na ca purāṇagāmaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti “mayi dabbatiṇāni jātānī”ti, evameva na
atk-s0501a:203_2: lomā jānanti “mayaṃ sarīracamme jātā”ti, napi sarīracammaṃ jānāti “mayi lomā jātā”ti.
atk-s0501a:203_3: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā acetanā abyākatā suññā paramaduggandhajegucchapaṭikūlā,
atk-s0501a:203_4: na satto na puggaloti vavatthapeti. Paricchedato heṭṭhā patiṭṭhitacammatalena tattha
atk-s0501a:203_5: likkhāmattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena attano mūlena ca upari ākāsena tiriyaṃ aññamaññena
atk-s0501a:203_6: paricchinnāti vavatthapeti. Ayametesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana
atk-s0501a:203_7: kesasadiso evāti evaṃ lome vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:204_0: Tato paraṃ nakhā yassa paripuṇṇā, tassa vīsati. Te sabbepi vaṇṇato maṃsavinimuttokāse
atk-s0501a:204_1: setā, maṃsasambandhe tambavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato yathāsakapatiṭṭhitokāsasaṇṭhānā,
atk-s0501a:204_3: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā, okāsato aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu patiṭṭhitāti.
atk-s0501a:205_0: Tattha yathā nāma gāmadārakehi daṇḍakaggesu madhukaphalaṭṭhikā ṭhapitā na jānanti
atk-s0501a:205_1: “mayaṃ daṇḍakaggesu ṭhapitā”ti, napi daṇḍakā jānanti “amhesu madhukaphalaṭṭhikā ṭhapitā”ti;
atk-s0501a:205_2: evameva nakhā na jānanti “mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu patiṭṭhitā”ti, napi aṅguliyo jānanti
atk-s0501a:205_3: “amhākaṃ aggesu nakhā patiṭṭhitā”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā acetanā…pe…
atk-s0501a:205_4: na puggaloti vavatthapeti. Paricchedato heṭṭhā mūle ca aṅgulimaṃsena, tattha patiṭṭhitatalena
atk-s0501a:205_5: vā upari agge ca ākāsena, ubhatopassesu aṅgulīnaṃ ubhatokoṭicammena paricchinnāti
atk-s0501a:205_6: vavatthapeti. Ayametesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:206_0: Tato paraṃ dantā yassa paripuṇṇā, tassa dvattiṃsa. Te sabbepi vaṇṇato setavaṇṇāti
atk-s0501a:206_1: vavatthapeti. Yassa samasaṇṭhitā honti, tassa kharapattacchinnasaṅkhapaṭalamiva samaganthitasetakusumamakuḷamālā
atk-s0501a:206_2: viya ca khāyanti. Yassa visamasaṇṭhitā, tassa jiṇṇaāsanasālāpīṭhakapaṭipāṭi viya
atk-s0501a:206_3: nānāsaṇṭhānāti saṇṭhānato vavatthapeti. Tesañhi ubhayadantapantipariyosānesu heṭṭhato
atk-s0501a:206_4: uparito ca dve dve katvā aṭṭha dantā catukoṭikā catumūlikā āsandikasaṇṭhānā, tesaṃ
atk-s0501a:206_5: orato teneva kamena sanniviṭṭhā aṭṭha dantā tikoṭikā timūlikā siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānā.
atk-s0501a:206_6: Tesampi orato teneva kamena heṭṭhato uparito ca ekamekaṃ katvā cattāro dantā dvikoṭikā
atk-s0501a:206_7: dvimūlikā yānakūpatthambhinīsaṇṭhānā. Tesampi orato teneva kamena sanniviṭṭhā cattāro
atk-s0501a:206_8: dāṭhādantā ekakoṭikā ekamūlikā mallikāmakuḷasaṇṭhānā. Tato ubhayadantapantivemajjhe
atk-s0501a:206_9: heṭṭhā cattāro upari cattāro katvā aṭṭha dantā ekakoṭikā ekamūlikā tumbabījasaṇṭhānā.
atk-s0501a:206_10: Disato uparimāya disāya jātā. Okāsato uparimā uparimahanukaṭṭhike adhokoṭikā, heṭṭhimā
atk-s0501a:207_0: Tattha yathā navakammikapurisena heṭṭhā silātale patiṭṭhāpitā uparimatale pavesitā
atk-s0501a:207_1: thambhā na jānanti “mayaṃ heṭṭhāsilātale patiṭṭhāpitā, uparimatale pavesitā”ti, na
atk-s0501a:207_2: heṭṭhāsilātalaṃ jānāti “mayi thambhā patiṭṭhāpitā”ti, na uparimatalaṃ jānāti “mayi
atk-s0501a:207_3: thambhā paviṭṭhā”ti; evameva dantā na jānanti “mayaṃ heṭṭhāhanukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0501a:207_4: uparimahanukaṭṭhike paviṭṭhā”ti, nāpi heṭṭhāhanukaṭṭhikaṃ jānāti “mayi dantā patiṭṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:207_5: na uparimahanukaṭṭhikaṃ jānāti “mayi dantā paviṭṭhā”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:207_6: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato heṭṭhā hanukaṭṭhikūpena hanukaṭṭhikaṃ
atk-s0501a:207_7: pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena ca upari ākāsena tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti
atk-s0501a:207_8: vavatthapeti. Ayametesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:208_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre nānākuṇapasañcayappaṭicchādakaṃ taco vaṇṇato setoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:208_1: So hi yadipi chavirāgarañjitattā kāḷakodātādivaṇṇavasena nānāvaṇṇo viya dissati,
atk-s0501a:208_2: tathāpi sabhāgavaṇṇena seto eva. So panassa setabhāvo aggijālābhighātapaharaṇapahārādīhi
atk-s0501a:208_3: viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā pākaṭo hoti. Saṇṭhānato saṅkhepena kañcukasaṇṭhāno, vitthārena
atk-s0501a:208_4: nānāsaṇṭhānoti. Tathā hi pādaṅgulittaco kosakārakakosasaṇṭhāno, piṭṭhipādattaco puṭabaddhūpāhanasaṇṭhāno,
atk-s0501a:208_9: vā, hatthaṅgulittaco kuñcikākosasaṇṭhāno, gīvattaco galakañcukasaṇṭhāno, mukhattaco
atk-s0501a:209_0: Tacapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttaroṭṭhato paṭṭhāya tacassa maṃsassa ca antarena
atk-s0501a:209_1: cittaṃ pesentena paṭhamaṃ tāva mukhattaco vavatthapetabbo, tato sīsattaco, atha bahigīvattaco,
atk-s0501a:209_2: tato anulomena paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇahatthattaco. Atha teneva kamena vāmahatthattaco,
atk-s0501a:209_3: tato piṭṭhittaco, atha ānisadattaco, tato anulomena paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇapādattaco,
atk-s0501a:209_4: atha vāmapādattaco, tato vatthiudarahadayaabbhantaragīvattaco, tato heṭṭhimahanukattaco,
atk-s0501a:209_5: atha adharoṭṭhattaco. Evaṃ yāva puna upari oṭṭhattacoti. Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto.
atk-s0501a:210_0: Tattha yathā allacammapariyonaddhāya peḷāya na allacammaṃ jānāti “mayā peḷā pariyonaddhā”ti,
atk-s0501a:210_1: napi peḷā jānāti “ahaṃ allacammena pariyonaddhā”ti; evameva na taco jānāti “mayā
atk-s0501a:210_2: idaṃ cātumahābhūtikaṃ sarīraṃ onaddha”nti, napi idaṃ cātumahābhūtikaṃ sarīraṃ jānāti
atk-s0501a:210_3: “ahaṃ tacena onaddha”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Kevalaṃ tu –
atk-s0501a:213_0: Paricchedato heṭṭhā maṃsena tattha patiṭṭhitatalena vā upari chaviyā paricchinnoti
atk-s0501a:213_1: vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:214_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre navapesisatappabhedaṃ maṃsaṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ pālibhaddakapupphasannibhanti
atk-s0501a:214_1: vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānanti. Tathā hi tattha jaṅghamaṃsaṃ tālapattapuṭabhattasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:214_5: dvebāhumaṃsaṃ naṅguṭṭhasīsapāde chetvā niccammaṃ katvā ṭhapitamahāmūsikasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:214_7: maṇḍūkasaṇṭhānantipi eke. Jivhāmaṃsaṃ nuhīpattasaṇṭhānaṃ, nāsāmaṃsaṃ omukhanikkhittapaṇṇakosasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:214_9: Maṃsapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena etāneva oḷārikamaṃsāni saṇṭhānato vavatthapetabbāni.
atk-s0501a:214_10: Evañhi vavatthāpayato sukhumāni maṃsāni ñāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchantīti. Disato dvīsu
atk-s0501a:214_11: disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpitvā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:215_0: Tattha yathā thūlamattikānulittāya bhittiyā na thūlamattikā jānāti “mayā bhitti anulittā”ti,
atk-s0501a:215_1: napi bhitti jānāti “ahaṃ thūlamattikāya anulittā”ti, evamevaṃ na navapesisatappabhedaṃ
atk-s0501a:215_2: maṃsaṃ jānāti “mayā aṭṭhisatattayaṃ anulitta”nti, napi aṭṭhisatattayaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a:215_3: navapesisatappabhedena maṃsena anulitta”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a:218_0: Paricchedato heṭṭhā aṭṭhisaṅghāṭena tattha patiṭṭhitatalena vā upari tacena tiriyaṃ
atk-s0501a:218_1: aññamaññena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo
atk-s0501a:218_2: pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ maṃsaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:219_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre navasatappabhedā nhārū vaṇṇato setāti vavatthapeti, madhuvaṇṇātipi
atk-s0501a:219_1: eke. Saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānāti. Tathā hi tattha mahantā mahantā nhārū kandalamakuḷasaṇṭhānā,
atk-s0501a:219_2: tato sukhumatarā sūkaravāgurarajjusaṇṭhānā, tato aṇukatarā pūtilatāsaṇṭhānā, tato
atk-s0501a:219_3: aṇukatarā sīhaḷamahāvīṇātantisaṇṭhānā, tato aṇukatarā thūlasuttakasaṇṭhānā, hatthapiṭṭhipādapiṭṭhīsu
atk-s0501a:219_4: nhārū sakuṇapādasaṇṭhānā, sīse nhārū gāmadārakānaṃ sīse ṭhapitaviraḷataradukūlasaṇṭhānā,
atk-s0501a:219_5: piṭṭhiyā nhārū temetvā ātape pasāritamacchajālasaṇṭhānā, avasesā imasmiṃ sarīre taṃtaṃaṅgapaccaṅgānugatā
atk-s0501a:219_6: nhārū sarīre paṭimukkajālakañcukasaṇṭhānāti. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā. Tesu ca dakkhiṇakaṇṇacūḷikato
atk-s0501a:219_7: paṭṭhāya pañca kaṇḍaranāmakā mahānhārū purato ca pacchato ca vinandhamānā vāmapassaṃ
atk-s0501a:219_8: gatā, vāmakaṇṇacūḷikato paṭṭhāya pañca purato ca pacchato ca vinandhamānā dakkhiṇapassaṃ
atk-s0501a:219_9: gatā, dakkhiṇagalavāṭakato paṭṭhāya pañca purato ca pacchato ca vinandhamānā vāmapassaṃ
atk-s0501a:219_10: gatā, vāmagalavāṭakato paṭṭhāya pañca purato ca pacchato ca vinandhamānā dakkhiṇapassaṃ
atk-s0501a:219_11: gatā, dakkhiṇahatthaṃ vinandhamānā purato ca pacchato ca pañca pañcāti dasa kaṇḍaranāmakā
atk-s0501a:219_12: eva mahānhārū āruḷhā. Tathā vāmahatthaṃ, dakkhiṇapādaṃ, vāmapādañcāti evamete saṭṭhi
atk-s0501a:219_13: mahānhārū sarīradhārakā sarīraniyāmakātipi vavatthapeti. Okāsato sakalasarīre aṭṭhicammānaṃ
atk-s0501a:220_0: Tattha yathā vallisantānabaddhesu kuṭṭadārūsu na vallisantānā jānanti “amhehi kuṭṭadārūni
atk-s0501a:220_1: ābaddhānī”ti, napi kuṭṭadārūni jānanti “mayaṃ vallisantānehi ābaddhānī”ti; evameva
atk-s0501a:220_2: na nhārū jānanti “amhehi tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni ābaddhānī”ti, napi tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni jānanti
atk-s0501a:220_3: “mayaṃ nhārūhi ābaddhānī”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Kevalaṃ tu –
atk-s0501a:223_0: Paricchedato heṭṭhā tīhi aṭṭhisatehi tattha patiṭṭhitatalehi vā upari tacamaṃsehi
atk-s0501a:223_1: tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnāti vavatthapeti. Ayametesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo
atk-s0501a:223_2: pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ nhārū vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:224_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre dvattiṃsadantaṭṭhikānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā sesāni catusaṭṭhi hatthaṭṭhikāni
atk-s0501a:224_1: catusaṭṭhi pādaṭṭhikāni catusaṭṭhi mudukaṭṭhikāni maṃsanissitāni dve paṇhikaṭṭhīni
atk-s0501a:224_2: ekekasmiṃ pāde dve dve gopphakaṭṭhikāni dve jaṅghaṭṭhikāni ekaṃ jaṇṇukaṭṭhi ekaṃ
atk-s0501a:224_3: ūruṭṭhi dve kaṭiṭṭhīni aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni catuvīsati phāsukaṭṭhīni cuddasa
atk-s0501a:224_4: uraṭṭhīni ekaṃ hadayaṭṭhi dve akkhakaṭṭhīni dve piṭṭhibāhaṭṭhīni dve bāhaṭṭhīni dve
atk-s0501a:224_5: dve aggabāhaṭṭhīni satta gīvaṭṭhīni dve hanukaṭṭhīni ekaṃ nāsikaṭṭhi dve akkhiṭṭhīni
atk-s0501a:224_6: dve kaṇṇaṭṭhīni ekaṃ nalāṭaṭṭhi ekaṃ muddhaṭṭhi nava sīsakapālaṭṭhīnīti evamādinā
atk-s0501a:224_7: nayena vuttappabhedāni aṭṭhīni sabbāneva vaṇṇato setānīti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:225_0: Saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānāni. Tathā hi tattha aggapādaṅguliyaṭṭhīni katakabījasaṇṭhānāni,
atk-s0501a:225_9: tappatiṭṭhitokāso aggacchinnapunnāgaphalasaṇṭhāno, kaṭiṭṭhīni dvepi ekābaddhāni hutvā
atk-s0501a:225_13: vaṭṭanāvalisaṇṭhānāni, tesaṃ antarantarā kakacadantasadisāni dve tīṇi kaṇṭakāni honti,
atk-s0501a:225_16: eke. Cuddasa uraṭṭhīni jiṇṇasandamānikaphalakapantisaṇṭhānāni, hadayaṭṭhi dabbiphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:225_17: akkhakaṭṭhīni khuddakalohavāsidaṇḍasaṇṭhānāni, tesaṃ heṭṭhā aṭṭhi addhacandasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:225_19: eke. Bāhaṭṭhīni ādāsadaṇḍasaṇṭhānāni, mahāvāsidaṇḍasaṇṭhānānītipi eke. Aggabāhaṭṭhīni
atk-s0501a:225_23: katakabījasaṇṭhānāni, satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍe vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitavaṃsakaḷīrakhaṇḍasaṇṭhānāni,
atk-s0501a:225_28: sīsaṭṭhīni sibbetvā ṭhapitajajjarālābukaṭāhasaṇṭhānānīti. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātāni.
atk-s0501a:226_0: Okāsato avisesena sakalasarīre ṭhitāni, visesena tu sīsaṭṭhīni gīvaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitāni,
atk-s0501a:226_1: gīvaṭṭhīni piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitāni, piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni kaṭiṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitāni,
atk-s0501a:226_2: kaṭiṭṭhīni ūruṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitāni, uruṭṭhīni jaṇṇukaṭṭhikesu, jaṇṇukaṭṭhīni jaṅghaṭṭhikesu,
atk-s0501a:226_3: jaṅghaṭṭhīni gopphakaṭṭhikesu, gopphakaṭṭhīni piṭṭhipādaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitāni, piṭṭhipādaṭṭhikāni
atk-s0501a:226_4: ca gopphakaṭṭhīni ukkhipitvā ṭhitāni, gopphakaṭṭhīni jaṅghaṭṭhīni…pe… gīvaṭṭhīni
atk-s0501a:226_5: sīsaṭṭhīni ukkhipitvā ṭhitānīti etenānusārena avasesānipi aṭṭhīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0501a:227_0: Tattha yathā iṭṭhakagopānasicayādīsu na uparimā iṭṭhakādayo jānanti “mayaṃ heṭṭhimesu
atk-s0501a:227_1: patiṭṭhitā”ti, napi heṭṭhimā jānanti “mayaṃ uparimāni ukkhipitvā ṭhitā”ti; evameva
atk-s0501a:227_2: na sīsaṭṭhikāni jānanti “mayaṃ gīvaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitānī”ti…pe… na gopphakaṭṭhikāni
atk-s0501a:227_3: jānanti “mayaṃ piṭṭhipādaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitānī”ti, napi piṭṭhipādaṭṭhikāni jānanti
atk-s0501a:227_4: “mayaṃ gopphakaṭṭhīni ukkhipitvā ṭhitānī”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a:227_5: na puggaloti. Kevalaṃ tu imāni sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni navahi nhārusatehi navahi
atk-s0501a:227_8: gatāni, yaṃ sabhāvato upaparikkhanto yogāvacaro na kiñci gayhūpagaṃ passati, kevalaṃ
atk-s0501a:227_9: tu nhārusambandhaṃ nānākuṇapasaṅkiṇṇaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghāṭameva passati. Yaṃ disvā dasabalassa
atk-s0501a:233: Duggandhe cāpi duggandhaṃ, bhedanamhi ca vayadhammaṃ.
atk-s0501a:235: Tamhi ca vinetha chandaṃ, hessatha puttā dasabalassā”ti ca.
atk-s0501a:236_0: Paricchedato anto aṭṭhimiñjena uparito maṃsena agge mūle ca aññamaññena paricchinnānīti
atk-s0501a:236_1: vavatthapeti. Ayametesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:237_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre yathāvuttappabhedānaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vaṇṇato
atk-s0501a:237_1: setanti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato attano okāsasaṇṭhānanti. Seyyathidaṃ – mahantamahantānaṃ
atk-s0501a:237_2: aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ sedetvā vaṭṭetvā mahantesu vaṃsanaḷakapabbesu pakkhittamahāvettaṅkurasaṇṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:237_3: khuddānukhuddakānaṃ abbhantaragataṃ sedetvā vaṭṭetvā khuddānukhuddakesu vaṃsanaḷakapabbesu
atk-s0501a:237_4: pakkhittatanuvettaṅkurasaṇṭhānanti. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare patiṭṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:238_0: Tattha yathā veḷunaḷakādīnaṃ antogatāni dadhiphāṇitāni na jānanti “mayaṃ veḷunaḷakādīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:238_1: antogatānī”ti, napi veḷunaḷakādayo jānanti “dadhiphāṇitāni amhākaṃ antogatānī”ti;
atk-s0501a:238_2: evameva na aṭṭhimiñjaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ antogata”nti, napi aṭṭhīni jānanti “aṭṭhimiñjaṃ
atk-s0501a:238_3: amhākaṃ antogata”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti.
atk-s0501a:238_4: Paricchedato aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaratalehi aṭṭhimiñjabhāgena ca paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:238_5: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ
atk-s0501a:239_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare dvigoḷakappabhedaṃ vakkaṃ vaṇṇato mandarattaṃ pāḷibhaddakaṭṭhivaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a:239_2: eke. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato galavāṭakā vinikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ
atk-s0501a:239_3: gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:240_0: Tattha yathā vaṇṭūpanibaddhaṃ sahakāradvayaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ vaṇṭena upanibaddha”nti,
atk-s0501a:240_1: napi vaṇṭaṃ jānāti “mayā sahakāradvayaṃ upanibaddha”nti; evameva na vakkaṃ jānāti
atk-s0501a:240_2: “ahaṃ thūlanhārunā upanibaddha”nti, napi thūlanhāru jānāti “mayā vakkaṃ upanibaddha”nti.
atk-s0501a:240_3: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato vakkaṃ vakkabhāgena
atk-s0501a:240_4: paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana
atk-s0501a:240_5: kesasadiso evāti evaṃ vakkaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:241_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare hadayaṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ rattapadumapattapiṭṭhivaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a:241_2: tañca aggacchinnapunnāgaphalamiva vivaṭekapassaṃ bahi maṭṭhaṃ anto kosātakīphalassa
atk-s0501a:241_3: abbhantarasadisaṃ. Paññābahulānaṃ thokaṃ vikasitaṃ, mandapaññānaṃ makuḷitameva. Yaṃ
atk-s0501a:241_4: rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti, taṃ apanetvā avasesamaṃsapiṇḍasaṅkhātahadayabbhantare
atk-s0501a:241_5: addhapasatamattaṃ lohitaṃ saṇṭhāti, taṃ rāgacaritassa rattaṃ, dosacaritassa kāḷakaṃ,
atk-s0501a:241_8: viya jutimantaṃ khāyati. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ
atk-s0501a:242_0: Tattha yathā dvinnaṃ vātapānakavāṭakānaṃ majjhe ṭhito aggaḷatthambhako na jānāti
atk-s0501a:242_1: “ahaṃ dvinnaṃ vātapānakavāṭakānaṃ majjhe ṭhito”ti, napi vātapānakavāṭakāni jānanti
atk-s0501a:242_2: “amhākaṃ majjhe aggaḷatthambhako ṭhito”ti; evamevaṃ na hadayaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ dvinnaṃ
atk-s0501a:242_3: thanānaṃ majjhe ṭhita”nti, napi thanāni jānanti “hadayaṃ amhākaṃ majjhe ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:242_4: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato hadayaṃ
atk-s0501a:242_5: hadayabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo
atk-s0501a:242_6: pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ hadayaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:243_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare yakanasaññitaṃ yamakamaṃsapiṇḍaṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ rattakumudabāhirapattapiṭṭhivaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a:243_1: vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato ekamūlaṃ hutvā agge yamakaṃ koviḷārapattasaṇṭhānaṃ, tañca
atk-s0501a:243_2: dandhānaṃ ekaṃyeva hoti mahantaṃ, paññavantānaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā khuddakānīti. Disato
atk-s0501a:243_3: uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:244_0: Tattha yathā piṭharakapasse laggā maṃsapesi na jānāti “ahaṃ piṭharakapasse laggā”ti,
atk-s0501a:244_1: napi piṭharakapassaṃ jānāti “mayi maṃsapesi laggā”ti; evameva na yakanaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a:244_2: dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita”nti, napi thanānaṃ abbhantare
atk-s0501a:244_3: dakkhiṇapassaṃ jānāti “maṃ nissāya yakanaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:244_4: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato pana yakanaṃ yakanabhāgena paricchinnanti
atk-s0501a:244_5: vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:245_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre paṭicchannāpaṭicchannabhedato duvidhaṃ kilomakaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ
atk-s0501a:245_1: dukūlapilotikavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato attano okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato dvīsu
atk-s0501a:245_2: disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca vakkañca parivāretvā, appaṭicchannakilomakaṃ
atk-s0501a:245_3: sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:246_0: Tattha yathā pilotikāya paliveṭhite maṃse na pilotikā jānāti “mayā maṃsaṃ paliveṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:246_1: napi maṃsaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ pilotikāya paliveṭhita”nti; evameva na kilomakaṃ jānāti
atk-s0501a:246_2: “mayā hadayavakkāni sakalasarīre ca cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ paliveṭhita”nti. Napi
atk-s0501a:246_3: hadayavakkāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ kilomakena paliveṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:246_4: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato heṭṭhā maṃsena upari cammena tiriyaṃ
atk-s0501a:246_5: kilomakabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo
atk-s0501a:246_6: pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ kilomakaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:247_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare pihakaṃ vaṇṇato nīlaṃ mīlātanigguṇḍīpupphavaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a:247_1: vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato yebhuyyena sattaṅgulappamāṇaṃ abandhanaṃ kāḷavacchakajivhāsaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:247_2: Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ
atk-s0501a:247_3: nissāya ṭhitaṃ, yamhi paharaṇapahārena bahi nikkhante sattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hotīti.
atk-s0501a:248_0: Tattha yathā koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitā na gomayapiṇḍi jānāti “ahaṃ koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ
atk-s0501a:248_1: nissāya ṭhitā”ti, napi koṭṭhakamatthakapassaṃ jānāti “gomayapiṇḍi maṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti;
atk-s0501a:248_2: evameva na pihakaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:248_3: napi udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ jānāti “pihakaṃ maṃ nissāya ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:248_4: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato pihakaṃ pihakabhāgena paricchinnanti
atk-s0501a:248_5: vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:249_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrassa abbhantare dvattiṃsamaṃsakhaṇḍappabhedaṃ papphāsaṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ
atk-s0501a:249_2: chadaniṭṭhakakhaṇḍapuñjasaṇṭhānantipi eke. Tadetaṃ abbhantare asitapītādīnaṃ abhāve
atk-s0501a:249_3: uggatena kammajatejusmanā abbhāhatattā saṅkhāditapalālapiṇḍamiva nirasaṃ nirojaṃ
atk-s0501a:249_4: hoti. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare
atk-s0501a:249_5: hadayañca yakanañca upari chādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:250_0: Tattha yathā jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāno sakuṇakulāvako na jānāti “ahaṃ jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare
atk-s0501a:250_1: lambamāno ṭhito”ti, napi jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantaraṃ jānāti “sakuṇakulāvako mayi lambamāno
atk-s0501a:250_2: ṭhito”ti; evameva na papphāsaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ antare
atk-s0501a:250_3: lambamānaṃ ṭhita”nti, napi sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ antaraṃ jānāti “mayi
atk-s0501a:250_4: papphāsaṃ lambamānaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na
atk-s0501a:250_5: puggaloti. Paricchedato papphāsaṃ papphāsabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa
atk-s0501a:250_6: sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ papphāsaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:251_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre purisassa dvattiṃsahatthaṃ, itthiyā aṭṭhavīsatihatthaṃ, ekavīsatiyā
atk-s0501a:251_1: ṭhānesu obhaggaṃ antaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ sakkharasudhāvaṇṇanti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato
atk-s0501a:251_2: sīsaṃ chinditvā lohitadoṇiyaṃ saṃvelletvā ṭhapitadhammanisaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato dvīsu
atk-s0501a:251_3: disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato upari galavāṭake heṭṭhā ca karīsamagge vinibandhattā galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante
atk-s0501a:252_0: Tattha yathā lohitadoṇiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ chinnasīsaṃ dhammanikaḷevaraṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a:252_1: lohitadoṇiyaṃ ṭhita”nti, napi lohitadoṇi jānāti “mayi chinnasīsaṃ dhammanikaḷevaraṃ
atk-s0501a:252_2: ṭhita”nti; evameva na antaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ sarīrabbhantare ṭhita”nti, napi sarīrabbhantaraṃ
atk-s0501a:252_3: jānāti “mayi antaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti.
atk-s0501a:252_4: Paricchedato antaṃ antabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo,
atk-s0501a:252_5: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ antaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:253_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre antantare antaguṇaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ dakasītalikamūlavaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a:253_2: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato kudālapharasukammādīni karontānaṃ yantākaḍḍhanakāle
atk-s0501a:253_3: yantasuttakamiva yantaphalakāni antabhoge ekato aggaḷante ābandhitvā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakassa
atk-s0501a:253_4: antarā taṃ sibbitvā ṭhitarajjukā viya ekavīsatiyā antabhogānaṃ antarā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:254_0: Tattha yathā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbitvā ṭhitarajjukā na jānāti “mayā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ
atk-s0501a:254_1: sibbita”nti, napi pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ jānāti “rajjukā maṃ sibbitvā ṭhitā”ti,
atk-s0501a:254_2: evameva antaguṇaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ antaṃ ekavīsatibhogabbhantare ābandhitvā ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:254_3: napi antaṃ jānāti “antaguṇaṃ maṃ ābandhitvā ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:254_4: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato antaguṇaṃ antaguṇabhāgena paricchinnanti
atk-s0501a:254_5: vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:255_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre udariyaṃ vaṇṇato ajjhohaṭāhāravaṇṇanti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato
atk-s0501a:255_1: parissāvane sithilabaddhataṇḍulasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato
atk-s0501a:255_2: udare ṭhitanti. Udaraṃ nāma ubhato nippīḷiyamānassa allasāṭakassa majjhe sañjātaphoṭakasadisaṃ
atk-s0501a:255_3: antapaṭalaṃ, bahi maṭṭhaṃ, anto maṃsakasambupaliveṭhitaṃ, kiliṭṭhapāvārapupphasadisaṃ,
atk-s0501a:255_5: evamādidvattiṃsakulappabhedā kimayo ākulabyākulā saṇḍasaṇḍacārino hutvā nivasanti,
atk-s0501a:255_6: ye pānabhojanādimhi avijjamāne ullaṅghitvā viravantā hadayamaṃsaṃ abhitudanti pānabhojanādīni
atk-s0501a:255_7: ajjhoharaṇavelāyañca uddhaṃmukhā hutvā paṭhamajjhohaṭe dve tayo ālope turitaturitā
atk-s0501a:255_8: vilumpanti. Yaṃ etesaṃ kimīnaṃ pasūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hoti,
atk-s0501a:255_9: yattha seyyathāpi nāma caṇḍālagāmadvāre candanikāya saradasamaye thūlaphusitake deve
atk-s0501a:255_11: nipatitvā kaddamodakāluḷitaṃ sañjātakimikulākulaṃ hutvā dvīhatīhaccayena sūriyātapasantāpavegakuthitaṃ
atk-s0501a:255_12: upari pheṇapupphuḷake muñcantaṃ abhinīlavaṇṇaṃ paramaduggandhajegucchaṃ upagantuṃ
atk-s0501a:255_13: vā daṭṭhuṃ vā anaraharūpataṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati, pageva ghāyituṃ vā sāyituṃ vā; evameva
atk-s0501a:255_18: Yaṃ sutvāpi pānabhojanādīsu amanuññatā saṇṭhāti, pageva paññācakkhunā oloketvā. Yattha
atk-s0501a:255_19: ca patitaṃ pānabhojanādi pañcadhā vivekaṃ gacchati, ekaṃ bhāgaṃ pāṇakā khādanti,
atk-s0501a:255_20: ekaṃ bhāgaṃ udaraggi jhāpeti, eko bhāgo muttaṃ hoti, eko bhāgo karīsaṃ hoti, eko
atk-s0501a:256_0: Tattha yathā paramajegucchāya suvānadoṇiyā ṭhito suvānavamathu na jānāti “ahaṃ suvānadoṇiyā
atk-s0501a:256_1: ṭhito”ti; napi suvānadoṇi jānāti “mayi suvānavamathu ṭhito”ti. Evameva na udariyaṃ
atk-s0501a:256_2: jānāti “ahaṃ imasmiṃ paramaduggandhajegucche udare ṭhita”nti; napi udaraṃ jānāti
atk-s0501a:256_3: “mayi udariyaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti.
atk-s0501a:256_4: Paricchedato udariyaṃ udariyabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo,
atk-s0501a:256_5: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ udariyaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:257_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre karīsaṃ vaṇṇato yebhuyyena ajjhohaṭāhāravaṇṇanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:257_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ, disato heṭṭhimāya disāya jātaṃ, okāsato pakkāsaye ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:257_2: Pakkāsayo nāma heṭṭhā nābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ antare antāvasāne ubbedhena aṭṭhaṅgulamatto
atk-s0501a:257_3: vaṃsanaḷakabbhantarasadiso padeso, yattha seyyathāpi nāma uparibhūmibhāge patitaṃ
atk-s0501a:257_4: vassodakaṃ ogaḷitvā heṭṭhābhūmibhāgaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati, evameva yaṃkiñci āmāsaye
atk-s0501a:257_5: patitaṃ pānabhojanādikaṃ udaragginā pheṇuddehakaṃ pakkaṃ pakkaṃ saṇhakaraṇiyā piṭṭhamiva
atk-s0501a:257_6: saṇhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā antabilena ogaḷitvā omadditvā vaṃsanaḷake pakkhittapaṇḍumattikā
atk-s0501a:258_0: Tattha yathā vaṃsanaḷake omadditvā pakkhittapaṇḍumattikā na jānāti “ahaṃ vaṃsanaḷake
atk-s0501a:258_1: ṭhitā”ti, napi vaṃsanaḷako jānāti “mayi paṇḍumattikā ṭhitā”ti; evameva na karīsaṃ
atk-s0501a:258_2: jānāti “ahaṃ pakkāsaye ṭhita”nti, napi pakkāsayo jānāti “mayi karīsaṃ ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:258_3: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato karīsaṃ
atk-s0501a:258_4: karīsabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo
atk-s0501a:258_5: pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ karīsaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:259_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sīsakaṭāhabbhantare matthaluṅgaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ ahichattakapiṇḍivaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a:259_1: vavatthapeti. Pakkuthitaduddhavaṇṇantipi eke. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya
atk-s0501a:259_2: disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sīsakaṭāhassa abbhantare cattāro sibbinimagge nissāya samodhāya
atk-s0501a:259_3: ṭhapitā cattāro piṭṭhapiṇḍikā viya samohitaṃ catumatthaluṅgapiṇḍappabhedaṃ hutvā ṭhitanti.
atk-s0501a:260_0: Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittapiṭṭhapiṇḍi pakkuthitaduddhaṃ vā na jānāti
atk-s0501a:260_1: “ahaṃ purāṇalābukaṭāhe ṭhita”nti, napi purāṇalābukaṭāhaṃ jānāti “mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi
atk-s0501a:260_2: pakkuthitaduddhaṃ vā ṭhita”nti; evameva na matthaluṅgaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare
