atk-s0501a:260_3: ṭhita”nti, napi sīsakaṭāhabbhantaraṃ jānāti “mayi matthaluṅgaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:260_4: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato matthaluṅgaṃ matthaluṅgabhāgena paricchinnanti
atk-s0501a:260_5: vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:261_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre baddhābaddhabhedato duvidhampi pittaṃ vaṇṇato bahalamadhukatelavaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a:261_1: vavatthapeti. Abaddhapittaṃ milātabakulapupphavaṇṇantipi eke. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:261_2: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato abaddhapittaṃ kesalomanakhadantānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:261_3: thaddhasukkhacammañca vajjetvā udakamiva telabindu avasesasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:261_4: yamhi kupite akkhīni pītakāni honti bhamanti, gattaṃ kampati kaṇḍūyati. Baddhapittaṃ
atk-s0501a:261_6: pittakosake ṭhitaṃ, yamhi kupite sattā ummattakā honti, vipallatthacittā hirottappaṃ
atk-s0501a:261_7: chaḍḍetvā akattabbaṃ karonti, abhāsitabbaṃ bhāsanti, acintitabbaṃ cintenti.
atk-s0501a:262_0: Tattha yathā udakaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ telaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ udakaṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:262_1: napi udakaṃ jānāti “telaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti; evameva na abaddhapittaṃ jānāti
atk-s0501a:262_2: “ahaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhita”nti, napi sarīraṃ jānāti “abaddhapittaṃ maṃ byāpetvā
atk-s0501a:262_3: ṭhita”nti. Yathā ca kosātakikosake ṭhitaṃ vassodakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ kosātakikosake
atk-s0501a:262_4: ṭhita”nti, napi kosātakikosako jānāti “mayi vassodakaṃ ṭhita”nti; evameva na baddhapittaṃ
atk-s0501a:262_5: jānāti “ahaṃ pittakosake ṭhita”nti, napi pittakosako jānāti “mayi baddhapittaṃ ṭhita”nti.
atk-s0501a:262_6: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato pittaṃ pittabhāgena
atk-s0501a:262_7: paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana
atk-s0501a:262_8: kesasadiso evāti evaṃ pittaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:263_0: Tato paraṃ sarīrabbhantare ekapattapūrappamāṇaṃ semhaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ kacchakapaṇṇarasavaṇṇanti
atk-s0501a:263_1: vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato udarapaṭale
atk-s0501a:263_2: ṭhitanti. Yaṃ pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇakāle seyyathāpi nāma udake sevālapaṇakaṃ kaṭṭhe
atk-s0501a:263_3: vā kathale vā patante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati, evameva
atk-s0501a:263_4: pānabhojanādimhi nipatante chijjitvā dvidhā hutvā puna ajjhottharitvā tiṭṭhati, yamhi
atk-s0501a:263_5: ca mandībhūte pakkamiva gaṇḍaṃ pūtikamiva kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ udarapaṭalaṃ paramajegucchakuṇapagandhaṃ
atk-s0501a:263_6: hoti. Tato uggatena ca gandhena uggāropi mukhampi duggandhaṃ pūtikuṇapasadisaṃ hoti,
atk-s0501a:263_7: so ca puriso “apehi duggandhaṃ vāyasī”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati, yañca abhivaḍḍhitaṃ
atk-s0501a:263_8: bahalattamāpannaṃ paṭikujjanaphalakamiva vaccakuṭiyā udarapaṭalabbhantare eva kuṇapagandhaṃ
atk-s0501a:264_0: Tattha yathā candanikāya uparipheṇapaṭalaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ candanikāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:264_1: napi candanikā jānāti “mayi pheṇapaṭalaṃ ṭhita”nti; evameva na semhaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a:264_2: udarapaṭale ṭhita”nti, napi udarapaṭalaṃ jānāti “mayi semhaṃ ṭhitanti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:264_3: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato semhaṃ semhabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:264_4: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ semhaṃ
atk-s0501a:265_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre pubbo vaṇṇato paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno.
atk-s0501a:265_1: Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto. Okāsato pubbassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi. Yattha pubbo
atk-s0501a:265_2: sannicito tiṭṭheyya, yatra yatra khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaggijālādīhi abhihate sarīrappadese
atk-s0501a:265_3: lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati, gaṇḍapiḷakādayo vā uppajjanti, tatra tatra tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0501a:266_0: Tattha yathā rukkhassa tattha tattha pharasudhārādīhi pahatappadese avagaḷitvā ṭhito
atk-s0501a:266_1: niyyāso na jānāti “ahaṃ rukkhassa pahatappadese ṭhito”ti, napi rukkhassa pahatappadeso
atk-s0501a:266_2: jānāti “mayi niyyāso ṭhito”ti; evameva na pubbo jānāti “ahaṃ sarīrassa tattha tattha
atk-s0501a:266_3: khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi abhihatappadese gaṇḍapiḷakādīnaṃ uṭṭhitappadese vā ṭhito”ti, napi
atk-s0501a:266_4: sarīrappadeso jānāti “mayi pubbo ṭhito”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a:266_5: na puggaloti. Paricchedato pubbo pubbabhāgena paricchinnoti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa
atk-s0501a:266_6: sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ pubbaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:267_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sannicitalohitaṃ saṃsaraṇalohitanti evaṃ duvidhe lohite sannicitalohitaṃ
atk-s0501a:267_1: tāva vaṇṇato bahalakuthitalākhārasavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti, saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ acchalākhārasavaṇṇanti.
atk-s0501a:267_2: Saṇṭhānato sabbampi attano okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato sannicitalohitaṃ uparimāya disāya
atk-s0501a:267_3: jātaṃ, saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ dvīsupīti. Okāsato saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ kesalomanakhadantānaṃ
atk-s0501a:267_5: upādinnakasarīraṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sannicitalohitaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0501a:267_6: ekapattapūraṇamattaṃ vakkahadayapapphāsānaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ binduṃ pātentaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāse
atk-s0501a:267_7: tementaṃ ṭhitaṃ, yamhi vakkahadayādīni atemente sattā pipāsitā honti.
atk-s0501a:268_0: Tattha yathā jajjarakapāle ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tementaṃ na jānāti
atk-s0501a:268_1: “ahaṃ jajjarakapāle ṭhitaṃ heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tememī”ti, napi jajjarakapālaṃ
atk-s0501a:268_2: heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni vā jānanti “mayi udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ, amhe vā tementaṃ ṭhita”nti;
atk-s0501a:268_3: evameva na lohitaṃ jānāti “ahaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāge vakkahadayādīni tementaṃ ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:268_4: napi yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ vakkahadayādīni vā jānanti “mayi lohitaṃ ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:268_5: amhe vā tementaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti.
atk-s0501a:268_6: Paricchedato lohitaṃ lohitabhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo,
atk-s0501a:268_7: visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ lohitaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:269_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre sedo vaṇṇato pasannatilatelavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno.
atk-s0501a:269_1: Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto. Okāsato sedassa okāso nāma nibaddho natthi, yattha sedo
atk-s0501a:269_2: lohitaṃ viya sadā tiṭṭheyya. Yasmā vā yadā aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvikārādīhi
atk-s0501a:269_4: sabbakesalomakūpavivarehi paggharati. Tasmā tesaṃ kesalomakūpavivarānaṃ vasena taṃ
atk-s0501a:269_5: saṇṭhānato vavatthapeti. “Sedapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena kesalomakūpavivare pūretvā
atk-s0501a:270_0: Tattha yathā bhisamuḷālakumudanālakalāpavivarehi paggharantaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a:270_2: jānanti “amhehi udakaṃ paggharatī”ti; evameva na sedo jānāti “ahaṃ kesalomakūpavivarehi
atk-s0501a:270_3: paggharāmī”ti, napi kesalomakūpavivarā jānanti “amhehi sedo paggharatī”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:270_4: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato sedo sedabhāgena paricchinnoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:270_5: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ sedaṃ
atk-s0501a:271_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre cammamaṃsantare medo vaṇṇato phālitahaliddivaṇṇoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:271_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhāno. Tathā hi sukhino thūlasarīrassa cammamaṃsantare pharitvā
atk-s0501a:271_4: disāsu jāto. Okāsato thūlasarīrassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghāmaṃsādīni
atk-s0501a:271_5: nissāya ṭhito, yo sinehasaṅkhātopi hutvā paramajegucchattā na matthakatelatthaṃ na
atk-s0501a:272_0: Tattha yathā maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitā haliddirattadukūlapilotikā na jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a:272_1: maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti, napi maṃsapuñjo jānāti “haliddirattadukūlapilotikā
atk-s0501a:272_2: maṃ nissāya ṭhitā”ti; evameva na medo jānāti “ahaṃ sakalasarīraṃ jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ
atk-s0501a:272_3: nissāya ṭhito”ti, napi sakalasarīraṃ jānāti jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ “medo maṃ nissāya
atk-s0501a:272_4: ṭhito”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato
atk-s0501a:272_5: medo heṭṭhā maṃsena, upari cammena, samantato medabhāgena paricchinnoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:272_6: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ medaṃ
atk-s0501a:273_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre assu vaṇṇato pasannatilatelavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:273_1: Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato akkhikūpakesu ṭhitanti. Na cetaṃ pittakosake
atk-s0501a:273_2: pittamiva akkhikūpakesu sadā sannicitaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, kintu yadā somanassajātā
atk-s0501a:273_3: sattā mahāhasitaṃ hasanti, domanassajātā rodanti paridevanti, tathārūpaṃ visamāhāraṃ
atk-s0501a:273_4: vā haranti, yadā ca tesaṃ akkhīni dhūmarajapaṃsukādīhi abhihaññanti, tadā etehi somanassadomanassavisamāhārādīhi
atk-s0501a:273_5: samuṭṭhahitvā assu akkhikūpakesu pūretvā tiṭṭhati paggharati ca. “Assupariggaṇhakena
atk-s0501a:273_6: ca yogāvacarena akkhikūpake pūretvā ṭhitavaseneva taṃ manasikātabba”nti pubbācariyā vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0501a:274_0: Tattha yathā matthakacchinnataruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu ṭhitaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a:274_2: jānanti “amhesu udakaṃ ṭhita”nti; evameva na assu jānāti “ahaṃ akkhikūpakesu ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:274_3: napi akkhikūpakā jānanti “amhesu assu ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete
atk-s0501a:274_4: dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato assu assubhāgena paricchinnanti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:274_5: Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ assuṃ
atk-s0501a:275_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre vilīnasinehasaṅkhātā vasā vaṇṇato ācāme āsittatelavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:275_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā. Okāsato hatthatalahatthapiṭṭhipādatalapādapiṭṭhināsāpuṭanalāṭaaṃsakūṭesu
atk-s0501a:275_2: ṭhitāti. Na cesā etesu okāsesu sadā vilīnā eva hutvā tiṭṭhati, kintu yadā aggisantāpasūriyasantāpautuvisabhāgadhātuvisabhāgehi
atk-s0501a:275_3: te padesā usmājātā honti, tadā tattha vilīnāva hutvā pasannasalilāsu udakasoṇḍikāsu nīhāro viya sarati.
atk-s0501a:276_0: Tattha yathā udakasoṇḍiyo ajjhottharitvā ṭhito nīhāro na jānāti “ahaṃ udakasoṇḍiyo
atk-s0501a:276_1: ajjhottharitvā ṭhito”ti, napi udakasoṇḍiyo jānanti “nīhāro amhe ajjhottharitvā ṭhito”ti;
atk-s0501a:276_2: evameva na vasā jānāti “ahaṃ hatthatalādīni ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā”ti, napi hatthatalādīni
atk-s0501a:276_3: jānanti “vasā amhe ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a:276_4: na puggaloti. Paricchedato vasā vasābhāgena paricchinnāti vavatthapeti. Ayametissā
atk-s0501a:276_5: sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ vasaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:277_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre mukhassabbhantare kheḷo vaṇṇato seto pheṇavaṇṇoti vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:277_1: Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānoti, samuddapheṇasaṇṭhānotipi eke. Disato uparimāya disāya
atk-s0501a:277_2: jāto. Okāsato ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhāya ṭhitoti. Na ceso ettha sadā sannicito
atk-s0501a:277_3: hutvā tiṭṭhati, kintu yadā sattā tathārūpaṃ āhāraṃ passanti vā saranti vā, uṇhatittakaṭukaloṇambilānaṃ
atk-s0501a:277_4: vā kiñci mukhe ṭhapenti. Yadā ca tesaṃ hadayaṃ āgilāyati, kismiñcideva vā jigucchā
atk-s0501a:277_5: uppajjati, tadā kheḷo uppajjitvā ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhāya saṇṭhāti.
atk-s0501a:277_6: Aggajivhāya cesa kheḷo tanuko hoti, mūlajivhāya bahalo, mukhe pakkhittañca puthukaṃ
atk-s0501a:277_7: vā taṇḍulaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci khādanīyaṃ nadipuline khatakūpasalilamiva parikkhayamagacchantova
atk-s0501a:278_0: Tattha yathā nadipuline khatakūpatale saṇṭhitaṃ udakaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ kūpatale saṇṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:278_1: napi kūpatalaṃ jānāti “mayi udakaṃ ṭhita”nti; evameva na kheḷo jānāti “ahaṃ ubhohi
atk-s0501a:278_2: kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale saṇṭhito”ti, napi jivhātalaṃ jānāti “mayi ubhohi
atk-s0501a:278_3: kapolapassehi orohitvā kheḷo saṇṭhito”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a:278_4: na puggaloti. Paricchedato kheḷo kheḷabhāgena paricchinnoti vavatthapeti. Ayametassa
atk-s0501a:278_5: sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti evaṃ kheḷaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:279_0: Tato paraṃ sarīre siṅghāṇikā vaṇṇato setā taruṇatālamiñjavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato
atk-s0501a:279_1: okāsasaṇṭhānā, sedetvā sedetvā nāsāpuṭe nirantaraṃ pakkhittavettaṅkurasaṇṭhānātipi
atk-s0501a:279_2: eke. Disato uparimāya disāya jātā. Okāsato nāsāpuṭe pūretvā ṭhitāti. Na cesā ettha
atk-s0501a:279_3: sadā sannicitā hutvā tiṭṭhati, kintu seyyathāpi nāma puriso paduminipatte dadhiṃ
atk-s0501a:279_4: bandhitvā heṭṭhā paduminipattaṃ kaṇṭakena vijjheyya, atha tena chiddena dadhipiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0501a:279_5: gaḷitvā bahi papateyya; evameva yadā sattā rodanti, visabhāgāhārautuvasena vā sañjātadhātukkhobhā
atk-s0501a:279_6: honti, tadā antosīsato pūtisemhabhāvaṃ āpannaṃ matthaluṅgaṃ gaḷitvā tālumatthakavivarena
atk-s0501a:280_0: Tattha yathā sippikāya pakkhittaṃ pūtidadhi na jānāti “ahaṃ sippikāya ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:280_1: napi sippikā jānāti “mayi pūtikaṃ dadhi ṭhita”nti; evameva na siṅghāṇikā jānāti “ahaṃ
atk-s0501a:280_2: nāsāpuṭesu ṭhitā”ti, napi nāsāpuṭā jānanti “amhesu siṅghāṇikā ṭhitā”ti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā
atk-s0501a:280_3: hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato siṅghāṇikā siṅghāṇikabhāgena paricchinnāti
atk-s0501a:280_4: vavatthapeti. Ayametissā sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:281_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre lasikāti sarīrasandhīnaṃ abbhantare picchilakuṇapaṃ. Sā vaṇṇato
atk-s0501a:281_1: kaṇikāraniyyāsavaṇṇāti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato okāsasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu disāsu
atk-s0501a:281_2: jātā. Okāsato aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīnaṃ abbhantare
atk-s0501a:281_3: ṭhitāti. Yassa cesā mandā hoti, tassa uṭṭhahantassa nisīdantassa abhikkamantassa
atk-s0501a:281_4: paṭikkamantassa samiñjantassa pasārentassa aṭṭhikāni kaṭakaṭāyanti, accharikāsaddaṃ
atk-s0501a:281_5: karonto viya vicarati, ekayojanadviyojanamattampi addhānaṃ gatassa vāyodhātu kuppati,
atk-s0501a:281_6: gattāni dukkhanti yassa pana cesā bahukā hoti, tassa uṭṭhānanisajjādīsu na aṭṭhīni
atk-s0501a:281_7: kaṭakaṭāyanti, dīghampi addhānaṃ gatassa na vāyodhātu kuppati, na gattāni dukkhanti.
atk-s0501a:282_0: Tattha yathā abbhañjanatelaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ akkhaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita”nti, napi akkho
atk-s0501a:282_1: jānāti “maṃ telaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhita”nti; evameva na lasikā jānāti “ahaṃ asītisatasandhiyo
atk-s0501a:282_2: abbhañjitvā ṭhitā”ti, napi asītisatasandhiyo jānanti “lasikā amhe abbhañjitvā ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0501a:282_3: Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe… na puggaloti. Paricchedato lasikā lasikabhāgena
atk-s0501a:282_4: paricchinnāti vavatthapeti. Ayametissā sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana
atk-s0501a:282_5: kesasadiso evāti evaṃ lasikaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:283_0: Tato paraṃ antosarīre muttaṃ vaṇṇato māsakhārodakavaṇṇanti vavatthapeti. Saṇṭhānato
atk-s0501a:283_2: disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato vatthissabbhantare ṭhitanti. Vatthi nāma vatthipuṭo vuccati,
atk-s0501a:283_3: yattha seyyathāpi nāma candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe peḷāghaṭe candanikāraso pavisati,
atk-s0501a:283_4: na cassa pavisanamaggo paññāyati; evameva sarīrato muttaṃ pavisati, na cassa pavisanamaggo
atk-s0501a:283_5: paññāyati nikkhamanamaggo eva tu pākaṭo hoti, yamhi ca muttassa bharite “passāvaṃ
atk-s0501a:283_6: karomā”ti sattānaṃ āyūhanaṃ hoti. Tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe peḷāghaṭe
atk-s0501a:283_7: ṭhito candanikāraso na jānāti “ahaṃ amukhe peḷāghaṭe ṭhito”ti, napi peḷāghaṭo jānāti
atk-s0501a:283_8: “mayi candanikāraso ṭhito”ti; evameva muttaṃ na jānāti “ahaṃ vatthimhi ṭhita”nti,
atk-s0501a:283_9: napi vatthi jānāti “mayi muttaṃ ṭhita”nti. Ābhogapaccavekkhaṇavirahitā hi ete dhammā…pe…
atk-s0501a:283_10: na puggaloti. Paricchedato vatthiabbhantarena ceva muttabhāgena ca paricchinnanti
atk-s0501a:283_11: vavatthapeti. Ayametassa sabhāgaparicchedo, visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadiso evāti
atk-s0501a:283_12: evaṃ muttaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti. Evamayaṃ imaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthapeti.
atk-s0501a:284_0: Tassevaṃ imaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ vaṇṇādivasena vavatthapentassa taṃ taṃ bhāvanānuyogaṃ
atk-s0501a:284_1: āgamma kesādayo paguṇā honti, koṭṭhāsabhāvena upaṭṭhahanti. Tato pabhuti seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a:284_2: nāma cakkhumato purisassa dvattiṃsavaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ ekasuttaganthitaṃ mālaṃ olokentassa
atk-s0501a:284_3: sabbapupphāni apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭāni honti; evameva “atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā”ti
atk-s0501a:284_4: imaṃ kāyaṃ satiyā olokentassa sabbe te dhammā apubbāpariyamiva pākaṭā honti. Kesesu
atk-s0501a:284_5: āvajjitesu asaṇṭhahamānāva sati yāva muttaṃ, tāva pavattati. Tato pabhuti tassa āhiṇḍantā
atk-s0501a:284_6: manussatiracchānādayo ca sattākāraṃ vijahitvā koṭṭhāsarāsivaseneva upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:284_7: tehi ca ajjhohariyamānaṃ pānabhojanādi koṭṭhāsarāsimhi pakkhippamānamiva upaṭṭhātīti.
atk-s0501a:285_0: Etthāha “athānena tato paraṃ kiṃ kātabba”nti? Vuccate – tadeva nimittaṃ āsevitabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:285_1: bhāvetabbaṃ bahulīkātabbaṃ suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ taṃ nimittaṃ
atk-s0501a:285_2: āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetīti? Ayañhi taṃ kesādīnaṃ koṭṭhāsabhāvena
atk-s0501a:285_3: upaṭṭhānanimittaṃ āsevati, satiyā alliyati bhajati upagacchati, satigabbhaṃ gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0501a:285_4: Tattha laddhaṃ vā satiṃ vaḍḍhento taṃ bhāvetīti vuccati. Bahulīkarotīti punappunaṃ
atk-s0501a:285_5: satisampayuttaṃ vitakkavicārabbhāhataṃ karoti. Suvavatthitaṃ vavatthapetīti yathā
atk-s0501a:285_6: suṭṭhu vavatthitaṃ hoti, na puna antaradhānaṃ gacchati, tathā taṃ satiyā vavatthapeti,
atk-s0501a:286_0: Atha vā yaṃ pubbe anupubbato, nātisīghato, nātisaṇikato, vikkhepappahānato, paṇṇattisamatikkamanato,
atk-s0501a:286_1: anupubbamuñcanato, lakkhaṇato, tayo ca suttantāti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ
atk-s0501a:286_2: vuttaṃ. Tattha anupubbato manasikaronto āsevati, nātisīghato nātisaṇikato ca manasikaronto
atk-s0501a:286_3: bhāveti, vikkhepappahānato manasikaronto bahulī karoti, paṇṇattisamatikkamanādito
atk-s0501a:287_0: Etthāha “kathaṃ panāyaṃ anupubbādivasena ete dhamme manasi karotī”ti? Vuccate – ayañhi
atk-s0501a:287_1: kese manasi karitvā tadanantaraṃ lome manasi karoti, na nakhe. Tathā lome manasi
atk-s0501a:287_2: karitvā tadanantaraṃ nakhe manasi karoti, na dante. Esa nayo sabbattha. Kasmā? Uppaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0501a:287_3: hi manasikaronto seyyathāpi nāma akusalo puriso dvattiṃsapadaṃ nisseṇiṃ uppaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0501a:287_4: ārohanto kilantakāyo tato nisseṇito papatati, na ārohanaṃ sampādeti; evameva bhāvanāsampattivasena
atk-s0501a:287_5: adhigantabbassa assādassa anadhigamanato kilantacitto dvattiṃsākārabhāvanāto papatati,
atk-s0501a:288_0: Anupubbato manasikarontopi ca kesā lomāti nātisīghatopi manasi karoti. Atisīghato
atk-s0501a:288_1: hi manasikaronto seyyathāpi nāma addhānaṃ gacchanto puriso samavisamarukkhathalaninnadvedhāpathādīni
atk-s0501a:288_2: magganimittāni upalakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, tato na maggakusalo hoti, addhānañca parikkhayaṃ
atk-s0501a:288_3: neti; evameva vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni dvattiṃsākāranimittāni upalakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, tato
atk-s0501a:288_4: na dvattiṃsākāre kusalo hoti, kammaṭṭhānañca parikkhayaṃ neti.
atk-s0501a:289_0: Yathā ca nātisīghato, evaṃ nātisaṇikatopi manasi karoti. Atisaṇikato hi manasikaronto
atk-s0501a:289_1: seyyathāpi nāma puriso addhānamaggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge rukkhapabbatataḷākādīsu
atk-s0501a:289_2: vilambamāno icchitappadesaṃ apāpuṇanto antarāmaggeyeva sīhabyagghādīhi anayabyasanaṃ
atk-s0501a:289_3: pāpuṇāti; evameva dvattiṃsākārabhāvanāsampadaṃ apāpuṇanto bhāvanāvicchedena antarāyeva
atk-s0501a:290_0: Nātisaṇikato manasikarontopi ca vikkhepappahānatopi manasi karoti. Vikkhepappahānato
atk-s0501a:290_1: nāma yathā aññesu navakammādīsu cittaṃ na vikkhipati, tathā manasi karoti. Bahiddhā
atk-s0501a:290_2: vikkhepamānacitto hi kesādīsveva asamāhitacetovitakko bhāvanāsampadaṃ apāpuṇitvā
atk-s0501a:290_3: antarāva anayabyasanaṃ āpajjati takkasilāgamane bodhisattassa sahāyakā viya. Avikkhipamānacitto
atk-s0501a:290_4: pana kesādīsveva samāhitacetovitakko bhāvanāsampadaṃ pāpuṇāti bodhisatto viya takkasilarajjasampadanti.
atk-s0501a:290_5: Tassevaṃ vikkhepappahānato manasikaroto adhikāracariyādhimuttīnaṃ vasena te dhammā
atk-s0501a:290_6: asubhato vā vaṇṇato vā suññato vā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0501a:291_0: Atha paṇṇattisamatikkamanato te dhamme manasi karoti. Paṇṇattisamatikkamanatoti kesā
atk-s0501a:291_1: lomāti evamādivohāraṃ samatikkamitvā vissajjetvā yathūpaṭṭhitānaṃ asubhādīnaṃyeva
atk-s0501a:291_2: vasena manasi karoti. Kathaṃ? Yathā araññanivāsūpagatā manussā aparicitabhūmibhāgattā
atk-s0501a:291_3: udakaṭṭhānasañjānanatthaṃ sākhābhaṅgādinimittaṃ katvā tadanusārena gantvā udakaṃ
atk-s0501a:291_4: paribhuñjanti, yadā pana paricitabhūmibhāgā honti, atha taṃ nimittaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0501a:291_5: amanasikatvāva udakaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā udakaṃ paribhuñjanti, evamevāyaṃ kesā lomātiādinā
atk-s0501a:291_6: taṃtaṃvohārassa vasena paṭhamaṃ te dhamme manasākāsi, tesu dhammesu asubhādīnaṃ aññataravasena
atk-s0501a:291_7: upaṭṭhahantesu taṃ vohāraṃ samatikkamitvā vissajjetvā asubhāditova manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:292_0: Etthāha “kathaṃ panassa ete dhammā asubhādito upaṭṭhahanti, kathaṃ vaṇṇato, kathaṃ
atk-s0501a:292_1: suññato vā, kathañcāyamete asubhato manasi karoti, kathaṃ vaṇṇato, kathaṃ suññato
atk-s0501a:292_2: vā”ti? Kesā tāvassa vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā asubhato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:292_3: pañcadhā eva ayamete asubhato manasi karoti. Seyyathidaṃ – kesā nāmete vaṇṇato asubhā
atk-s0501a:292_4: paramappaṭikūlajegucchā. Tathā hi manussā divā pānabhojane patitaṃ kesavaṇṇaṃ vākaṃ
atk-s0501a:292_5: vā suttaṃ vā disvā kesasaññāya manoramampi pānabhojanaṃ chaḍḍenti vā jigucchanti
atk-s0501a:292_6: vā. Saṇṭhānatopi asubhā. Tathā hi rattiṃ pānabhojane patitaṃ kesasaṇṭhānaṃ vākaṃ
atk-s0501a:292_7: vā suttaṃ vā phusitvā kesasaññāya manoramampi pānabhojanaṃ chaḍḍenti vā jigucchanti
atk-s0501a:292_8: vā. Gandhatopi asubhā. Tathā hi telamakkhanapupphadhūmādisaṅkhārehi virahitānaṃ kesānaṃ
atk-s0501a:292_9: gandho paramajeguccho hoti, aggīsu pakkhittassa kesassa gandhaṃ ghāyitvā sattā nāsikaṃ
atk-s0501a:292_10: pidhenti, mukhampi vikujjenti. Āsayatopi asubhā. Tathā hi nānāvidhena manussāsucinissandena
atk-s0501a:292_11: saṅkāraṭṭhāne taṇḍuleyyakādīni viya pittasemhapubbalohitanissandena te ācitā vuddhiṃ
atk-s0501a:292_12: virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gamitāti. Okāsatopi asubhā. Tathā hi saṅkāraṭṭhāne viya taṇḍuleyyakādīni
atk-s0501a:292_14: jātāti. Esa nayo lomādīsu. Evaṃ tāva ayamete dhamme asubhato upaṭṭhahante asubhato manasi karoti.
atk-s0501a:293_0: Yadi panassa vaṇṇato upaṭṭhahanti, atha kesā nīlakasiṇavasena upaṭṭhahanti. Tathā
atk-s0501a:293_1: lomā dantā odātakasiṇavasenāti. Esa nayo sabbattha. Taṃtaṃkasiṇavaseneva ayamete
atk-s0501a:293_2: manasi karoti, evaṃ vaṇṇato upaṭṭhahante vaṇṇato manasi karoti. Yadi panassa suññato
atk-s0501a:293_3: upaṭṭhahanti, atha kesā ghanavinibbhogavavatthānena ojaṭṭhamakasamūhavasena upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0501a:293_4: Tathā lomādayo, yathā upaṭṭhahanti. Ayamete tatheva manasi karoti. Evaṃ suññato upaṭṭhahante
atk-s0501a:294_0: Evaṃ manasikaronto ayamete dhamme anupubbamuñcanato manasi karoti. Anupubbamuñcanatoti
atk-s0501a:294_1: asubhādīnaṃ aññataravasena upaṭṭhite kese muñcitvā lome manasikaronto seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a:294_2: nāma jalūkā naṅguṭṭhena gahitappadese sāpekkhāva hutvā tuṇḍena aññaṃ padesaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0501a:294_3: gahite ca tasmiṃ itaraṃ muñcati, evameva kesesu sāpekkhova hutvā lome manasi karoti,
atk-s0501a:294_4: lomesu ca patiṭṭhite manasikāre kese muñcati. Esa nayo sabbattha. Evaṃ hissa anupubbamuñcanato
atk-s0501a:294_5: manasikaroto asubhādīsu aññataravasena te dhammā upaṭṭhahantā anavasesato upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0501a:295_0: Atha yassa te dhammā asubhato upaṭṭhahanti, pākaṭatarūpaṭṭhānā ca honti, tassa seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a:295_1: nāma makkaṭo dvattiṃsatālake tālavane byādhena paripātiyamāno ekarukkhepi asaṇṭhahanto
atk-s0501a:295_2: paridhāvitvā yadā nivatto hoti kilanto, atha ekameva ghanatālapaṇṇapariveṭhitaṃ tālasuciṃ
atk-s0501a:295_3: nissāya tiṭṭhati; evameva cittamakkaṭo dvattiṃsakoṭṭhāsake imasmiṃ kāye teneva yoginā
atk-s0501a:295_4: paripātiyamāno ekakoṭṭhāsakepi asaṇṭhahanto paridhāvitvā yadā anekārammaṇavidhāvane
atk-s0501a:295_5: abhilāsābhāvena nivatto hoti kilanto. Atha yvāssa kesādīsu dhammo paguṇataro caritānurūpataro
atk-s0501a:295_6: vā, yattha vā pubbe katādhikāro hoti, taṃ nissāya upacāravasena tiṭṭhati. Atha tameva
atk-s0501a:295_7: nimittaṃ punappunaṃ takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ karitvā yathākkamaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0501a:296_0: Yassa pana te dhammā vaṇṇato upaṭṭhahanti, tassāpi seyyathāpi nāma makkaṭo…pe… atha
atk-s0501a:296_1: yvāssa kesādīsu dhammo paguṇataro caritānurūpataro vā, yattha vā pubbe katādhikāro
atk-s0501a:296_2: hoti, taṃ nissāya upacāravasena tiṭṭhati. Atha tameva nimittaṃ punappunaṃ takkāhataṃ
atk-s0501a:296_3: vitakkāhataṃ karitvā yathākkamaṃ nīlakasiṇavasena pītakasiṇavasena vā pañcapi rūpāvacarajjhānāni
atk-s0501a:296_4: uppādeti, tesañca yattha katthaci patiṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0501a:297_0: Yassa pana te dhammā suññato upaṭṭhahanti, so lakkhaṇato manasi karoti, lakkhaṇato
atk-s0501a:297_1: manasikaronto tattha catudhātuvavatthānavasena upacārajjhānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Atha manasikaronto
atk-s0501a:297_2: te dhamme aniccadukkhānattasuttattayavasena manasi karoti. Ayamassa vipassanānayo.
atk-s0501a:297_3: So imaṃ vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā yathākkamañca paṭipajjitvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0501a:298_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ – “kathaṃ panāyaṃ anupubbādivasena ete dhamme manasi karotī”ti,
atk-s0501a:298_1: taṃ byākataṃ hoti. Yañcāpi vuttaṃ – “bhāvanāvasena panassa evaṃ vaṇṇanā veditabbā”ti,
atk-s0501a:300: Idāni imasmiṃyeva dvattiṃsākāre vaṇṇanāparicayapāṭavatthaṃ ayaṃ pakiṇṇakanayo veditabbo –
atk-s0501a:303_0: Tattha nimittatoti evaṃ vuttappakāre imasmiṃ dvattiṃsākāre saṭṭhisataṃ nimittāni
atk-s0501a:303_1: honti, yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ koṭṭhāsato pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṃ
atk-s0501a:303_2: – kesassa vaṇṇanimittaṃ, saṇṭhānanimittaṃ, disānimittaṃ, okāsanimittaṃ, paricchedanimittanti
atk-s0501a:304_0: Lakkhaṇatoti dvattiṃsākāre aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ lakkhaṇāni honti, yesaṃ vasena yogāvacaro
atk-s0501a:304_1: dvattiṃsākāraṃ lakkhaṇato manasi karoti. Seyyathidaṃ – kesassa thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0501a:304_2: ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ, uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ, samudīraṇalakkhaṇanti cattāri lakkhaṇāni honti. Evaṃ lomādīsu.
atk-s0501a:305_0: Dhātutoti dvattiṃsākāre “chadhāturo, bhikkhave, ayaṃ purisapuggalo”ti ettha vuttāsu
atk-s0501a:305_1: dhātūsu aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ dhātuyo honti, yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ dhātuto
atk-s0501a:305_2: pariggaṇhāti. Seyyathidaṃ – yā kese thaddhatā, sā pathavīdhātu; yā ābandhanatā, sā
atk-s0501a:305_3: āpodhātu; yā paripācanatā, sā tejodhātu; yā vitthambhanatā, sā vāyodhātūti catasso
atk-s0501a:306_0: Suññatoti dvattiṃsākāre aṭṭhavīsatisataṃ suññatā honti, yāsaṃ vasena yogāvacaro dvattiṃsākāraṃ
atk-s0501a:306_1: suññato vipassati. Seyyathidaṃ – kese tāva pathavīdhātu āpodhātvādīhi suññā, tathā
atk-s0501a:306_2: āpodhātvādayo pathavīdhātvādīhīti catasso suññatā honti. Evaṃ lomādīsu.
atk-s0501a:307_0: Khandhāditoti dvattiṃsākāre kesādīsu khandhādivasena saṅgayhamānesu “kesā kati khandhā
atk-s0501a:307_1: honti, kati āyatanāni, kati dhātuyo, kati saccāni, kati satipaṭṭhānānī”ti evamādinā
atk-s0501a:307_2: nayena vinicchayo veditabbo. Evañcassa vijānato tiṇakaṭṭhasamūho viya kāyo khāyati. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:312: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. –
atk-s0501a:313: Evaṃ amānusī rati vuttā, sā adūratarā hoti. Tato yaṃ taṃ –
atk-s0501a:316: Evaṃ vipassanāmayaṃ pītipāmojjāmataṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ anubhavanto na cireneva ariyajanasevitaṃ ajarāmaraṃ nibbānāmataṃ sacchikarotīti.
atk-s0501a:321: Idāni ekaṃ nāma kinti evamādīnaṃ kumārapañhānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto. Tesaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ idha nikkhepappayojanañca vatvā vaṇṇanaṃ karissāma –
atk-s0501a:322_0: Aṭṭhuppatti tāva nesaṃ sopāko nāma bhagavato mahāsāvako ahosi. Tenāyasmatā jātiyā
atk-s0501a:322_1: sattavasseneva aññā ārādhitā, tassa bhagavā pañhabyākaraṇena upasampadaṃ anuññātukāmo
atk-s0501a:322_2: attanā adhippetatthānaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇasamatthataṃ passanto “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti
atk-s0501a:322_3: evamādinā pañhe pucchi. So byākāsi. Tena ca byākaraṇena bhagavato cittaṃ ārādhesi.
atk-s0501a:325_0: Yasmā pana saraṇagamanehi buddhadhammasaṅghānussativasena cittabhāvanā, sikkhāpadehi
atk-s0501a:325_1: sīlabhāvanā, dvattiṃsākārena ca kāyabhāvanā pakāsitā, tasmā idāni nānappakārato paññābhāvanāmukhadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:325_2: ime pañhabyākaraṇā idha nikkhittā. Yasmā vā sīlapadaṭṭhāno samādhi, samādhipadaṭṭhānā
atk-s0501a:325_3: ca paññā; yathāha – “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya”nti, tasmā
atk-s0501a:325_4: sikkhāpadehi sīlaṃ dvattiṃsākārena taṃgocaraṃ samādhiñca dassetvā samāhitacittassa
atk-s0501a:325_5: nānādhammaparikkhārāya paññāya pabhedadassanatthaṃ idha nikkhittātipi viññātabbā.
atk-s0501a:329_0: Idāni tesaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti – ekaṃ nāma kinti bhagavā yasmiṃ ekadhammasmiṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0501a:329_1: sammā nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, yasmiṃ cāyamāyasmā nibbindamāno
atk-s0501a:329_2: anupubbena dukkhassantamakāsi, taṃ dhammaṃ sandhāya pañhaṃ pucchati. “Sabbe sattā
atk-s0501a:329_3: āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti thero puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vissajjeti. “Katamā ca, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a:329_4: sammāsati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti evamādīni cettha
atk-s0501a:329_5: suttāni evaṃ vissajjanayuttisambhave sādhakāni. Ettha yenāhārena sabbe sattā “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti
atk-s0501a:329_6: vuccanti, so āhāro taṃ vā nesaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti puṭṭhena therena
atk-s0501a:329_7: niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ. Tañhi bhagavatā idha ekanti adhippetaṃ, na tu sāsane loke
atk-s0501a:329_8: vā aññaṃ ekaṃ nāma natthīti ñāpetuṃ vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a:330_0: “Ekadhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno
atk-s0501a:330_1: sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:330_2: Katamasmiṃ ekadhamme? Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. Imasmiṃ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhamme
atk-s0501a:330_3: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Eko pañho eko uddeso ekaṃ
atk-s0501a:330_4: veyyākaraṇa’nti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:331_0: Āhāraṭṭhitikāti cettha yathā “atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittaṃ. Tattha ayoniso manasikārabahulīkāro,
atk-s0501a:331_1: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”ti evamādīsu paccayo āhāroti vuccati,
atk-s0501a:331_2: evaṃ paccayaṃ āhārasaddena gahetvā paccayaṭṭhitikā “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti vuttā. Cattāro
atk-s0501a:331_3: pana āhāre sandhāya – “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti vuccamāne “asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārā
atk-s0501a:332_0: Tattha siyā – evampi vuccamāne “katame dhammā sapaccayā? Pañcakkhandhā – rūpakkhandho…pe…
atk-s0501a:332_1: viññāṇakkhandho”ti vacanato khandhānaṃyeva paccayaṭṭhitikattaṃ yuttaṃ, sattānantu
atk-s0501a:332_2: ayuttamevetaṃ vacanaṃ bhaveyyāti. Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā? Sattesu
atk-s0501a:332_3: khandhopacārasiddhito. Sattesu hi khandhopacāro siddho. Kasmā? Khandhe upādāya paññāpetabbato.
atk-s0501a:332_4: Kathaṃ? Gehe gāmopacāro viya. Seyyathāpi hi gehāni upādāya paññāpetabbattā gāmassa
atk-s0501a:332_5: ekasmimpi dvīsu tīsupi vā gehesu daḍḍhesu “gāmo daḍḍho”ti evaṃ gehe gāmopacāro siddho,
atk-s0501a:332_6: evameva khandhesu paccayaṭṭhena āhāraṭṭhitikesu “sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ayaṃ upacāro
atk-s0501a:332_7: siddhoti veditabbo. Paramatthato ca khandhesu jāyamānesu jīyamānesu mīyamānesu ca
atk-s0501a:332_8: “khaṇe khaṇe tvaṃ bhikkhu jāyase ca jīyase ca mīyase cā”ti vadatā bhagavatā tesu
atk-s0501a:332_9: sattesu khandhopacāro siddhoti dassito evāti veditabbo. Yato yena paccayākhyena āhārena
atk-s0501a:332_10: sabbe sattā tiṭṭhanti, so āhāro taṃ vā nesaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ ekanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:332_11: Āhāro hi āhāraṭṭhitikattaṃ vā aniccatākāraṇato nibbidāṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Atha tesu sabbasattasaññitesu
atk-s0501a:332_12: saṅkhāresu aniccatādassanena nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:334: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a:335_0: Ettha ca “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti ca “kihā”ti ca duvidho pāṭho, tattha sīhaḷānaṃ kihāti
atk-s0501a:335_1: pāṭho. Te hi “ki”nti vattabbe “kihā”ti vadanti. Keci bhaṇanti “ha-iti nipāto, theriyānampi
atk-s0501a:335_2: ayameva pāṭho”ti ubhayathāpi pana ekova attho. Yathā ruccati, tathā paṭhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:335_3: Yathā pana “sukhena phuṭṭho atha vā dukhena, dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedetī”ti
atk-s0501a:335_4: evamādīsu katthaci dukhanti ca katthaci dukkhanti ca vuccati, evaṃ katthaci ekanti,
atk-s0501a:335_5: katthaci ekkanti vuccati. Idha pana ekaṃ nāmāti ayameva pāṭho.
atk-s0501a:337_0: Evaṃ iminā pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0501a:337_1: dve nāma kinti? Thero dveti paccanubhāsitvā “nāmañca rūpañcā”ti dhammādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0501a:337_2: desanāya vissajjeti. Tattha ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato, cittassa ca natihetuto sabbampi
atk-s0501a:337_3: arūpaṃ “nāma”nti vuccati. Idha pana nibbidāhetuttā sāsavadhammameva adhippetaṃ ruppanaṭṭhena
atk-s0501a:337_4: cattāro ca mahābhūtā, sabbañca tadupādāya pavattamānaṃ rūpaṃ “rūpa”nti vuccati, taṃ
atk-s0501a:337_5: sabbampi idhādhippetaṃ. Adhippāyavaseneva cettha “dve nāma nāmañca rūpañcā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:338_0: “Dvīsu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:338_1: Katamesu dvīsu? Nāme ca rūpe ca. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, dvīsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā
atk-s0501a:338_2: nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Dve pañhā, dve uddesā, dve veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a:338_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:339: Ettha ca nāmarūpamattadassanena attadiṭṭhiṃ pahāya anattānupassanāmukheneva nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṃ pāpuṇātīti veditabbo. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:341: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a:343_0: Idāni imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0501a:343_1: pucchati tīṇi nāma kinti? Thero tīṇīti paccanubhāsitvā puna byākaritabbassa atthassa
atk-s0501a:343_2: liṅgānurūpaṃ saṅkhyaṃ dassento “tisso vedanā”ti vissajjeti. Atha vā “yā bhagavatā
atk-s0501a:343_3: ‘tisso vedanā’ti vuttā, imāsamatthamahaṃ tīṇīti paccemī”ti dassento āhāti evampettha
atk-s0501a:343_4: attho veditabbo. Anekamukhā hi desanā paṭisambhidāpabhedena desanāvilāsappattānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:343_5: Keci panāhu “tīṇīti adhikapadamida”nti. Purimanayeneva cettha “tisso vedanā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:344_0: “Tīsu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:344_1: Katamesu tīsu? Tīsu vedanāsu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, tīsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe…
atk-s0501a:344_2: dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Tayo pañhā, tayo uddesā, tīṇi veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ
atk-s0501a:345: Ettha ca “yaṃkiñci vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti vuttasuttānusārena vā. –
atk-s0501a:348_1: dukkhabhāvadassanena sukhasaññaṃ pahāya dukkhānupassanāmukhena nibbindamāno anupubbena
atk-s0501a:348_2: dukkhassantakaro hoti, paramatthavisuddhiṃ pāpuṇātīti veditabbo. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:350: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti. ;
atk-s0501a:352_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0501a:352_1: cattāri nāma kinti? Tattha imassa pañhassa byākaraṇapakkhe katthaci purimanayeneva
atk-s0501a:353_0: “Catūsu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:353_1: Katamesu catūsu? Catūsu āhāresu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, catūsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā
atk-s0501a:353_2: nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a:353_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:354: Katthaci yesu subhāvitacitto anupubbena dukkhassantakaro hoti, tāni cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni. Yathāha kajaṅgalā bhikkhunī –
atk-s0501a:355_0: “Catūsu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto sammā pariyantadassāvī sammattaṃ
atk-s0501a:355_1: abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu catūsu? Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu.
atk-s0501a:355_2: Imesu kho, āvuso, catūsu dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro
atk-s0501a:355_3: hoti. ‘Cattāro pañhā cattāro uddesā cattāri veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a:356_0: Idha pana yesaṃ catunnaṃ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti, yasmā tāni cattāri
atk-s0501a:356_1: ariyasaccāni adhippetāni. Yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena byākataṃ subyākatameva hoti,
atk-s0501a:356_2: tasmā thero cattārīti paccanubhāsitvā “ariyasaccānī”ti vissajjeti. Tattha cattārīti
atk-s0501a:356_3: gaṇanaparicchedo. Ariyasaccānīti ariyāni saccāni, avitathāni avisaṃvādakānīti attho. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:357: “Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0501a:358_0: Yasmā vā sadevakena lokena araṇīyato abhigamanīyatoti vuttaṃ hoti, vāyamitabbaṭṭhānasaññite
atk-s0501a:358_1: aye vā iriyanato, anaye vā na iriyanato, sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyaariyadhammasamāyogato
atk-s0501a:358_2: vā ariyasammatā buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā etāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmāpi “ariyasaccānī”ti vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:359: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ariyasaccāni…pe… imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri ariyasaccāni, ariyā imāni paṭivijjhanti, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0501a:360: Apica ariyassa bhagavato saccānītipi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:361: “Sadevake, bhikkhave…pe… sadevamanussāya tathāgato ariyo, tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti.
atk-s0501a:362: Atha vā etesaṃ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:363: “Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0501a:364: Ayametesaṃ padattho. Etesaṃ pana ariyasaccānaṃ anubodhappaṭivedhato bhavataṇhāchedo hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:365_0: “Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ…pe… dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā
atk-s0501a:365_1: ariyasaccaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, khīṇā bhavanetti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
atk-s0501a:367_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0501a:367_1: pañca nāma kinti? Thero pañcāti paccanubhāsitvā “upādānakkhandhā”ti vissajjeti. Tattha
atk-s0501a:367_2: pañcāti gaṇanaparicchedo. Upādānajanitā upādānajanakā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā.
atk-s0501a:367_3: Yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇañca sāsavā upādāniyā, etesametaṃ
atk-s0501a:367_4: adhivacanaṃ. Pubbanayeneva cettha “pañcupādānakkhandhā”ti vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ pañcannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:368_0: “Pañcasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:368_1: Katamesu pañcasu? Pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, pañcasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a:368_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Pañca pañhā, pañca uddesā,
atk-s0501a:368_3: pañca veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:369: Ettha ca pañcakkhandhe udayabbayavasena sammasanto vipassanāmataṃ laddhā anupubbena nibbānāmataṃ sacchikaroti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:373_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā purimanayeneva uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati
atk-s0501a:373_1: “cha nāma ki”nti? Thero chaiti paccanubhāsitvā ‘ajjhattikāni āyatanānī’ti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a:373_2: Tattha chaiti gaṇanaparicchedo, ajjhatte niyuttāni, attānaṃ vā adhikatvā pavattāni
atk-s0501a:373_3: ajjhattikāni. Āyatanato, āyassa vā tananato, āyatassa vā saṃsāradukkhassa nayanato
atk-s0501a:373_5: ajjhattikāni āyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ channamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:374_0: “Chasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:374_1: Katamesu chasu? Chasu ajjhattikesu āyatanesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, chasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a:374_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Cha pañhā cha uddesā cha veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a:374_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:375_0: Ettha ca cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, “suñño gāmoti kho, bhikkhave, channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ
atk-s0501a:375_1: āyatanānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato suññato pubbuḷakamarīcikādīni viya aciraṭṭhitikato
atk-s0501a:375_2: tucchato vañcanato ca samanupassaṃ nibbindamāno anupubbena dukkhassantaṃ katvā maccurājassa
atk-s0501a:377: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti. ;
atk-s0501a:379_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati satta nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:379_1: Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo vuttā, apica kho pana yesu
atk-s0501a:379_2: dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti, te dassento “satta bojjhaṅgā”ti
atk-s0501a:379_3: vissajjeti. Ayampi cattho bhagavatā anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:380_0: “Paṇḍitā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī, mahāpaññā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī,
atk-s0501a:380_1: mañcepi tumhe gahapatayo upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi cetaṃ
atk-s0501a:380_2: evameva byākareyyaṃ, yathā taṃ kajaṅgalikāya bhikkhuniyā byākata”nti.
atk-s0501a:382_0: “Sattasu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:382_1: Katamesu sattasu? Sattasu bojjhaṅgesu. Imesu kho, āvuso, sattasu dhammesu bhikkhu
atk-s0501a:382_2: sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Satta pañhā satta uddesā satta veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a:382_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:384_0: Tattha sattāti ūnādhikanivāraṇagaṇanaparicchedo. Bojjhaṅgāti satiādīnaṃ dhammānametaṃ
atk-s0501a:384_1: adhivacanaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ padattho – etāya lokiyalokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādi-
atk-s0501a:384_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhi, kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0501a:384_4: cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:384_5: Yathāha – “satta bojjhaṅge bhāvetvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho”ti. Yathāvuttappakārāya
atk-s0501a:384_6: vā etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvakopi bodhi. Iti tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya
atk-s0501a:384_7: bodhiyā aṅgabhūtattā bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni viya, tassa vā bodhīti laddhavohārassa
atk-s0501a:385_0: Apica “bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti
atk-s0501a:385_1: bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti
atk-s0501a:385_2: imināpi paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vidhinā bojjhaṅgānaṃ bojjhaṅgaṭṭho veditabbo. Evamime
atk-s0501a:385_3: satta bojjhaṅge bhāvento bahulīkaronto na cirasseva ekantanibbidādiguṇapaṭilābhī
atk-s0501a:385_4: hoti, tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati. Vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a:386: “Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
atk-s0501a:388_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati aṭṭha nāma
atk-s0501a:388_1: kinti? Thero kiñcāpi mahāpañhabyākaraṇe aṭṭha lokadhammā vuttā, apica kho pana yesu
atk-s0501a:388_2: dhammesu subhāvitacitto bhikkhu dukkhassantakaro hoti, te dassento “ariyāni aṭṭha
atk-s0501a:388_3: maggaṅgānī”ti avatvā yasmā aṭṭhaṅgavinimutto maggo nāma natthi, aṭṭhaṅgamattameva
atk-s0501a:388_4: tu maggo, tasmā tamatthaṃ sādhento desanāvilāsena ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vissajjeti.
atk-s0501a:388_5: Bhagavatāpi cāyamattho desanānayo ca anumato eva. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:389: “Paṇḍitā gahapatayo kajaṅgalikā bhikkhunī…pe… ahampi evameva byākareyyaṃ, yathā taṃ kajaṅgalikāya bhikkhuniyā byākata”nti.
atk-s0501a:391_0: “Aṭṭhasu, āvuso, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā subhāvitacitto…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:391_1: ‘Aṭṭha pañhā, aṭṭha uddesā, aṭṭha veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā,
atk-s0501a:392: Evamayaṃ attho ca desanānayo ca bhagavatā anumato evāti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:393_0: Tattha ariyoti nibbānatthikehi abhigantabbo, apica ārakā kilesehi vattanato, ariyabhāvakaraṇato,
atk-s0501a:393_1: ariyaphalapaṭilābhato cāpi ariyoti veditabbo. Aṭṭha aṅgāni assāti aṭṭhaṅgiko. Svāyaṃ
atk-s0501a:393_2: caturaṅgikā viya senā, pañcaṅgikaṃ viya ca tūriyaṃ aṅgavinibbhogena anupalabbhasabhāvato
atk-s0501a:393_3: aṅgamattamevāti veditabbo. Maggati iminā nibbānaṃ, sayaṃ vā maggati, kilese mārento
atk-s0501a:394_0: Evamaṭṭhappabhedañcimaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bhikkhu avijjaṃ bhindati, vijjaṃ
atk-s0501a:394_1: uppādeti, nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti, tena diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hotīti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0501a:395_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā sammā paṇihitaṃ hatthena vā pādena
atk-s0501a:395_1: vā akkantaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhecchati, lohitaṃ vā uppādessatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
atk-s0501a:395_2: Taṃ kissa hetu? Sammā paṇihitattā, bhikkhave, sūkassa, evameva kho, bhikkhave, so
atk-s0501a:395_3: vata bhikkhu sammā paṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammā paṇihitāya maggabhāvanāya avijjaṃ bhecchati,
atk-s0501a:395_4: vijjaṃ uppādessati, nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatīti ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0501a:397_0: Imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati nava nāma kinti?
atk-s0501a:397_1: Thero navaiti paccanubhāsitvā “sattāvāsā”ti vissajjeti. Tattha navāti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0501a:397_2: Sattāti jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhe khandhe upādāya paññattā pāṇino paṇṇatti vā. Āvāsāti
atk-s0501a:397_3: āvasanti etesūti āvāsā, sattānaṃ āvāsā sattāvāsā. Esa desanāmaggo, atthato pana navavidhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:398_0: “Santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce
atk-s0501a:398_1: ca vinipātikā, ayaṃ paṭhamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino,
atk-s0501a:398_2: seyyathāpi, devā brahmakāyikā, paṭhamābhinibbattā, ayaṃ dutiyo sattāvāso. Santāvuso,
atk-s0501a:398_3: sattā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā ābhassarā, ayaṃ tatiyo sattāvāso.
atk-s0501a:398_4: Santāvuso, sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi, devā subhakiṇhā, ayaṃ catuttho
atk-s0501a:398_5: sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā asaññino appaṭisaṃvedino, seyyathāpi, devā asaññasattā,
atk-s0501a:398_6: ayaṃ pañcamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ…pe… ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā,
atk-s0501a:398_7: ayaṃ chaṭṭho sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā…pe… viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā, ayaṃ sattamo sattāvāso.
atk-s0501a:398_8: Santāvuso, sattā…pe… ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā, ayaṃ aṭṭhamo sattāvāso. Santāvuso, sattā…pe…
atk-s0501a:399: Purimanayeneva cettha “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuttaṃ, na aññesaṃ navannamabhāvato. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:400_0: “Navasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:400_1: Katamesu navasu? Navasu sattāvāsesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, navasu dhammesu bhikkhu
atk-s0501a:400_2: sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Nava pañhā, nava uddesā, nava veyyākaraṇānī’ti
atk-s0501a:400_3: iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:401_0: Ettha ca “nava dhammā pariññeyyā. Katame nava? Nava sattāvāsā”ti vacanato navasu
atk-s0501a:401_2: nibbindamāno tīraṇapariññāya aniccānupassanena virajjamāno dukkhānupassanena vimuccamāno
atk-s0501a:401_3: anattānupassanena sammā pariyantadassāvī pahānapariññāya sammattamabhisamecca diṭṭheva
atk-s0501a:402: “Navasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamesu navasu? Navasu sattāvāsesū”ti.
atk-s0501a:404_0: Evaṃ imināpi pañhabyākaraṇena āraddhacitto satthā uttariṃ pañhaṃ pucchati dasa nāma
atk-s0501a:404_1: kinti? Tattha kiñcāpi imassa pañhassa ito aññatra veyyākaraṇesu dasa akusalakammapathā vuttā. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:405_0: “Dasasu, bhikkhave, dhammesu bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe… dukkhassantakaro hoti.
atk-s0501a:405_1: Katamesu dasasu? Dasasu akusalakammapathesu. Imesu kho, bhikkhave, dasasu dhammesu
atk-s0501a:405_2: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno…pe. … dukkhassantakaro hoti. ‘Dasa pañhā dasa uddesā dasa
atk-s0501a:405_3: veyyākaraṇānī’ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta”nti.
atk-s0501a:406_0: Idha pana yasmā ayamāyasmā attānaṃ anupanetvā aññaṃ byākātukāmo, yasmā vā iminā pariyāyena
atk-s0501a:406_1: byākataṃ subyākatameva hoti, tasmā yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a:406_2: tesaṃ adhigamaṃ dīpento dasahaṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0501a:406_3: desanāya vissajjeti. Yato ettha yehi dasahi aṅgehi samannāgato arahāti pavuccati,
atk-s0501a:406_4: tāni dasaṅgāni “dasa nāma ki”nti puṭṭhena therena niddiṭṭhānīti veditabbāni. Tāni ca dasa –
atk-s0501a:407_0: “Asekho asekhoti, bhante, vuccati, kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu asekho hotīti?
atk-s0501a:407_1: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāsaṅkappena
atk-s0501a:407_2: samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāvācāya samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammākammantena
atk-s0501a:407_3: samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāājīvena samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāvāyāmena
atk-s0501a:407_4: samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāsatiyā samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāsamādhinā
atk-s0501a:407_5: samannāgato hoti, asekhena sammāñāṇena samannāgato hoti, asekhāya sammāvimuttiyā
atk-s0501a:407_6: samannāgato hoti. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asekho hotī”ti. –
atk-s0501a:413_0: Idāni kumārapañhānantaraṃ nikkhittassa maṅgalasuttassa atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto,
atk-s0501a:413_1: tassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ vatvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Seyyathidaṃ – idañhi
atk-s0501a:413_2: suttaṃ iminā anukkamena bhagavatā avuttampi yvāyaṃ saraṇagamanehi sāsanotāro, sikkhāpadadvattiṃsākārakumārapañhehi
atk-s0501a:413_3: ca sīlasamādhipaññāppabhedanayo dassito, sabbopesa paramamaṅgalabhūto, yato maṅgalatthikena
atk-s0501a:413_4: ettheva abhiyogo kātabbo, so cassa maṅgalabhāvo iminā suttānusārena veditabboti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:416: Evaṃ nikkhittassa panassa atthavaṇṇanatthaṃ ayaṃ mātikā –
atk-s0501a:417: “Vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, cetaṃ vatvā imaṃ vidhiṃ;
atk-s0501a:421_0: Tattha “vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, cetaṃ vatvā imaṃ vidhi”nti ayaṃ tāva addhagāthā yadidaṃ
atk-s0501a:421_1: “evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā…pe… bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsī”ti, idaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0501a:421_2: sandhāya vuttā. Idañhi anussavavasena vuttaṃ, so ca bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako,
atk-s0501a:421_3: tasmā nedaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa. Yato vattabbametaṃ
atk-s0501a:421_4: “idaṃ vacanaṃ kena vuttaṃ, kadā, kasmā ca vutta”nti. Vuccate – āyasmatā ānandena
atk-s0501a:422_0: Paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti cesā sabbasuttanidānakosallatthamādito pabhuti evaṃ veditabbā.
atk-s0501a:422_1: Dhammacakkappavattanañhi ādiṃ katvā yāva subhaddaparibbājakavinayanā, katabuddhakicce
atk-s0501a:422_2: kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare visākhapuṇṇamadivase
atk-s0501a:422_3: paccūsasamaye anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbute, bhagavati lokanāthe bhagavato
atk-s0501a:422_4: parinibbāne sannipatitānaṃ sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ saṅghatthero āyasmā mahākassapo
atk-s0501a:422_5: sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena “alaṃ, āvuso, mā socittha,
atk-s0501a:422_6: mā paridevittha, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇena, upaddutā ca homa ‘idaṃ vo kappati
atk-s0501a:422_7: idaṃ vo na kappatī’ti, idāni pana mayaṃ yaṃ icchissāma taṃ karissāma, yaṃ na icchissāma
atk-s0501a:422_8: na taṃ karissāmā”ti vuttavacanamanussaranto “ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ pāpabhikkhū
atk-s0501a:422_9: ‘atītasatthukaṃ pāvacana’nti maññamānā pakkhaṃ labhitvā na cirasseva saddhammaṃ antaradhāpeyyuṃ.
atk-s0501a:422_10: Yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhati, tāva anatītasatthukameva pāvacanaṃ hoti. Yathāha bhagavā –
atk-s0501a:423: “Yo vo, ānanda, mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti.
atk-s0501a:424: “Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṃ, yathayidaṃ sāsanaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitikaṃ”.
atk-s0501a:426: “Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ, kassapa, sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī”ti vatvā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena ceva –
atk-s0501a:427_0: “Ahaṃ, bhikkhave, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-s0501a:427_1: viharāmi, kassapopi, bhikkhave, yāvadeva ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0501a:428_1: samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahito, tassa me kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati? “Nanu maṃ
atk-s0501a:428_2: bhagavā rājā viya sakakavacaissariyānuppadānena attano kulavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpakaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0501a:428_3: ‘saddhammavaṃsappatiṭṭhāpako me ayaṃ bhavissatī’ti mantvā iminā asādhāraṇena anuggahena
atk-s0501a:428_4: anuggahesī”ti cintayanto dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesi? Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:429_0: “Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhikkhū āmantesi – ekamidāhaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ pāvāya
atk-s0501a:429_1: kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”ti
atk-s0501a:431_0: “Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma, pure adhammo dippati, dhammo
atk-s0501a:431_1: paṭibāhiyyati, avinayo dippati, vinayo paṭibāhiyyati, pure adhammavādino balavanto
atk-s0501a:431_2: honti, dhammavādino dubbalā honti, avinayavādino balavanto honti, vinayavādino dubbalā hontī”ti.
atk-s0501a:432_0: Bhikkhū āhaṃsu “tena hi, bhante, thero bhikkhū uccinatū”ti. Thero sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhare
atk-s0501a:432_2: ca vajjetvā tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadhare paṭisambhidāppatte mahānubhāve yebhuyyena
atk-s0501a:432_3: bhagavatā etadaggaṃ āropite tevijjādibhede khīṇāsavabhikkhūyeva ekūnapañcasate pariggahesi.
atk-s0501a:432_4: Ye sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnapañcaarahantasatāni uccinī”ti.
atk-s0501a:433_0: Kissa pana thero ekenūnamakāsīti? Āyasmato ānandattherassa okāsakaraṇatthaṃ. Tena
atk-s0501a:433_1: hāyasmatā sahāpi vināpi na sakkā dhammasaṅgīti kātuṃ. So hāyasmā sekho sakaraṇīyo,
atk-s0501a:433_2: tasmā saha na sakkā, yasmā panassa kiñci dasabaladesitaṃ suttageyyādikaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0501a:433_3: asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā vināpi na sakkā. Yadi evaṃ sekhopi samāno
atk-s0501a:433_4: dhammasaṅgītiyā bahūkārattā therena uccinitabbo assa, atha kasmā na uccinitoti? Parūpavādavivajjanato.
atk-s0501a:433_5: Thero hi āyasmante ānande ativiya vissattho ahosi. Tathā hi naṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu
atk-s0501a:433_6: jātesupi “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti kumārakavādena ovadati. Sakyakulappasuto
atk-s0501a:433_7: cāyaṃ āyasmā tathāgatassa bhātā cūḷapitu putto, tatra bhikkhū chandāgamanaṃ viya
atk-s0501a:433_8: maññamānā “bahū asekhapaṭisambhidāppatte bhikkhū ṭhapetvā ānandaṃ sekhapaṭisambhidāppattaṃ
atk-s0501a:433_9: thero uccinī”ti upavadeyyuṃ. Taṃ parūpavādaṃ parivivajjento “ānandaṃ vinā saṅgīti
atk-s0501a:433_10: na sakkā kātuṃ, bhikkhūnaṃyeva anumatiyā gahessāmī”ti na uccini.
atk-s0501a:434: Atha sayameva bhikkhū ānandassatthāya theraṃ yāciṃsu. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:435_0: “Bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavocuṃ – ‘ayaṃ, bhante, āyasmā ānando kiñcāpi
atk-s0501a:435_1: sekho, abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ, bahu cānena bhagavato santike
atk-s0501a:435_2: dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto, tena hi, bhante, thero āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinatū’ti.
atk-s0501a:435_3: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinī”ti.
atk-s0501a:436: Evaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā uccinitena tenāyasmatā saddhiṃ pañcatherasatāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:437_0: Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – “kattha nu kho mayaṃ dhammañca vinayañca
atk-s0501a:437_1: saṅgāyeyyāmā”ti. Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi “rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaraṃ
atk-s0501a:437_2: pahūtasenāsanaṃ, yaṃnūna mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
atk-s0501a:437_3: naññe bhikkhū rājagahe vassaṃ upagaccheyyu”nti. Kasmā pana nesaṃ etadahosi? Idaṃ
atk-s0501a:437_4: amhākaṃ thāvarakammaṃ, koci visabhāgapuggalo saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā ukkoṭeyyāti.
atk-s0501a:437_5: Athāyasmā mahākassapo ñattidutiyena kammena sāvesi. Taṃ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttanayeneva ñātabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:438_0: Atha tathāgatassa parinibbānato sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesu
atk-s0501a:438_1: vītivattesu “aḍḍhamāso atikkanto, idāni gimhānaṃ diyaḍḍho māso seso, upakaṭṭhā vassūpanāyikā”ti
atk-s0501a:438_2: mantvā mahākassapatthero “rājagahaṃ, āvuso, gacchāmā”ti upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0501a:438_3: ekaṃ maggaṃ gato. Anuruddhattheropi upaḍḍhaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gato, ānandatthero
atk-s0501a:438_4: pana bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ gantvā rājagahaṃ
atk-s0501a:438_5: gantukāmo yena sāvatthi, tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi. Ānandattherena gatagataṭṭhāne mahāparidevo
atk-s0501a:438_6: ahosi, “bhante ānanda, kuhiṃ satthāraṃ ṭhapetvā āgatosī”ti? Anupubbena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0501a:438_7: anuppatte there bhagavato parinibbānasamaye viya mahāparidevo ahosi.
atk-s0501a:439_0: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā ānando aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya taṃ mahājanaṃ
atk-s0501a:439_1: saññāpetvā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā dasabalena vasitagandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivaritvā mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-s0501a:439_2: nīharitvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭiṃ sammajjitvā milātamālākacavaraṃ chaḍḍetvā mañcapīṭhaṃ
atk-s0501a:439_3: atiharitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhagavato ṭhitakāle karaṇīyaṃ vattaṃ sabbamakāsi.
atk-s0501a:439_4: Atha thero bhagavato parinibbānato pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulattā ussannadhātukaṃ
atk-s0501a:439_5: kāyaṃ samassāsetuṃ dutiyadivase khīravirecanaṃ pivitvā vihāreyeva nisīdi, yaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0501a:440: “Akālo kho, māṇavaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattā pītā, appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a:441: Dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchāsamaṇena gantvā subhena māṇavena puṭṭho dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃ nāma dasamaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0501a:442_0: Atha kho thero jetavane vihāre khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ kārāpetvā upakaṭṭhāya
atk-s0501a:442_1: vassūpanāyikāya rājagahaṃ gato. Tathā mahākassapatthero anuruddhatthero ca sabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:443_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe aṭṭhārasa mahāvihārā honti. Te sabbepi chaḍḍitapatitauklāpā
atk-s0501a:443_1: ahesuṃ. Bhagavato hi parinibbāne sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0501a:443_2: vihāre ca pariveṇe ca chaḍḍetvā agamaṃsu. Tattha therā bhagavato vacanapūjanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:443_4: cintesuṃ. Titthiyā hi vadeyyuṃ “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā satthari ṭhiteyeva vihāre
atk-s0501a:443_5: paṭijaggiṃsu, parinibbute chaḍḍesu”nti. Tesaṃ vādaparimocanatthañca cintesunti vuttaṃ
atk-s0501a:444_0: “Atha kho therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etadahosi – bhagavatā kho, āvuso, khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:444_1: vaṇṇitaṃ, handa mayaṃ, āvuso, paṭhamaṃ māsaṃ khaṇḍaphullappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ karoma,
atk-s0501a:444_2: majjhimaṃ māsaṃ sannipatitvā dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a:445_0: Te dutiyadivase gantvā rājadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu. Ajātasattu rājā āgantvā vanditvā “ahaṃ,
atk-s0501a:445_1: bhante, kiṃ karomi, kenattho”ti pavāresi. Therā aṭṭhārasamahāvihārappaṭisaṅkharaṇatthāya
atk-s0501a:445_2: hatthakammaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. “Sādhu, bhante”ti rājā hatthakammakārake manusse adāsi.
atk-s0501a:446_0: Atha rañño ārocesuṃ – “niṭṭhitaṃ, mahārāja, vihārappaṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ, idāni dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ
atk-s0501a:446_1: karomā”ti. “Sādhu, bhante, vissatthā karotha, mayhaṃ āṇācakkaṃ, tumhākaṃ dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0501a:446_2: hotu. Āṇāpetha, bhante, kiṃ karomī”ti? “Dhammasaṅgahaṃ karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannisajjaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:446_4: kātuṃ yuttaṃ mahārājā”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho, rājā ajātasattu, vissakammunā nimmitasadisaṃ
atk-s0501a:446_7: ca naṃ nānāpupphūpahāravicitraṃ supariniṭṭhitabhūmikammaṃ brahmavimānasadisaṃ alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0501a:446_8: tasmiṃ mahāmaṇḍape pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anagghāni pañcakappiyapaccattharaṇasatāni
atk-s0501a:446_9: paññāpetvā dakkhiṇabhāgaṃ nissāya uttarābhimukhaṃ therāsanaṃ, maṇḍapamajjhe puratthābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0501a:446_10: buddhassa bhagavato āsanārahaṃ dhammāsanaṃ paññāpetvā dantakhacitaṃ cittabījaniñcettha
atk-s0501a:447_0: Bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsu “sve, āvuso ānanda, saṅghasannipāto, tvañca sekho
atk-s0501a:447_1: sakaraṇīyo, tena te na yuttaṃ sannipātaṃ gantuṃ, appamatto hohī”ti. Atha kho āyasmā
atk-s0501a:447_2: ānando “sve sannipāto, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yvāhaṃ sekho samāno sannipātaṃ
atk-s0501a:447_3: gaccheyya”nti bahudeva rattiṃ kāyagatāya satiyā vītināmetvā rattiyā paccūsasamaye
atk-s0501a:447_4: caṅkamā orohitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā “nipajjissāmī”ti kāyaṃ āvajjesi. Dve pādā bhūmito
atk-s0501a:447_5: muttā, appattañca sīsaṃ bimbohanaṃ, etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
atk-s0501a:447_6: Ayañhi āyasmā caṅkamena bahi vītināmetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto cintesi “nanu
atk-s0501a:447_7: maṃ bhagavā etadavoca – ‘katapuññosi tvaṃ, ānanda, padhānamanuyuñja, khippaṃ hohisi
atk-s0501a:447_8: anāsavo’ti. Buddhānañca kathādoso nāma natthi, mama pana accāraddhaṃ vīriyaṃ, tena
atk-s0501a:447_9: me cittaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati, handāhaṃ vīriyasamataṃ yojemī”ti caṅkamā orohitvā
atk-s0501a:447_10: pādadhovanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā pāde dhovitvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīditvā “thokaṃ
atk-s0501a:447_11: vissamissāmī”ti kāyaṃ mañcake upanāmesi. Dve pādā bhūmito muttā, sīsañca bimbohanamasampattaṃ,
atk-s0501a:447_12: etasmiṃ antare anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci. Catuiriyāpathavirahitaṃ therassa
atk-s0501a:447_13: arahattaṃ. Tena “imasmiṃ sāsane anisinno anipanno aṭṭhito acaṅkamanto ko bhikkhu
atk-s0501a:448_0: Atha therā bhikkhū dutiyadivase bhattakiccaṃ katvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0501a:448_1: sannipatitā. Ānandatthero pana attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmo bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0501a:448_2: na gato. Bhikkhū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ attano attano pattāsane nisīdantā ānandattherassa āsanaṃ
atk-s0501a:448_3: ṭhapetvā nisinnā. Tattha kehici “etamāsanaṃ kassā”ti vutte ānandassāti. “Ānando pana
atk-s0501a:448_4: kuhiṃ gato”ti. Tasmiṃ samaye thero cintesi “idāni mayhaṃ gamanakālo”ti. Tato attano
atk-s0501a:448_5: ānubhāvaṃ dassento pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā attano āsaneyeva attānaṃ dassesi. Ākāsenāgantvā nisīdītipi eke.
atk-s0501a:449_0: Evaṃ nisinne tasmiṃ āyasmante mahākassapatthero bhikkhū āmantesi, “āvuso, kiṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0501a:449_1: saṅgāyāma dhammaṃ vā vinayaṃ vā”ti? Bhikkhū āhaṃsu, “bhante mahākassapa, vinayonāmabuddhasāsanassa
atk-s0501a:449_2: āyu, vinaye ṭhite sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti, tasmā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṅgāyāmā”ti. “Kaṃ
atk-s0501a:449_3: dhuraṃ katvā vinayo saṅgāyitabbo”ti? “Āyasmantaṃ upāli”nti. “Kiṃ ānando nappahotī”ti?
atk-s0501a:449_4: “No nappahoti, apica kho pana sammāsambuddho dharamānoyeva vinayapariyattiṃ nissāya
atk-s0501a:449_5: āyasmantaṃ upāliṃ etadagge ṭhapesi – ‘etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0501a:449_6: vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”’ti. Tasmā upālittheraṃ pucchitvā vinayaṃ saṅgāyāmāti.
atk-s0501a:449_7: Tato thero vinayaṃ pucchanatthāya attanāva attānaṃ sammanni. Upālittheropi vissajjanatthāya
atk-s0501a:450: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a:451: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ upāliṃ vinayaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0501a:453: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena vinayaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-s0501a:454_0: Evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ sammannitvā āyasmā, upāli, uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā
atk-s0501a:454_1: there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā. Tato mahākassapatthero
atk-s0501a:454_2: upālittheraṃ paṭhamapārājikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ vinayaṃ pucchi, upālitthero vissajjesi.
atk-s0501a:454_3: Sabbe pañcasatā bhikkhū paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ sanidānaṃ katvā ekato gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:454_4: Evaṃ sesānipīti sabbaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathāya gahetabbaṃ. Etena nayena saubhatovibhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0501a:454_5: sakhandhakaparivāraṃ sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṅgāyitvā upālitthero dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ
atk-s0501a:454_6: nikkhipitvā dhammāsanā orohitvā vuḍḍhe bhikkhū vanditvā attano pattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0501a:455_0: Vinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyitukāmo āyasmā mahākassapatthero bhikkhū pucchi
atk-s0501a:455_1: – “dhammaṃ saṅgāyantehi kaṃ puggalaṃ dhuraṃ katvā dhammo saṅgāyitabbo”ti? Bhikkhū
atk-s0501a:456: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a:457: “Suṇātu me, āvuso, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ ānandaṃ dhammaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0501a:458: Atha kho āyasmā ānando saṅghaṃ ñāpesi –
atk-s0501a:459: “Suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ āyasmatā mahākassapena dhammaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeyya”nti.
atk-s0501a:460_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā there bhikkhū vanditvā dhammāsane
atk-s0501a:460_1: nisīdi dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā. Atha mahākassapatthero ānandattheraṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0501a:460_2: pucchi – “brahmajālaṃ, āvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”nti? “Antarā ca, bhante, rājagahaṃ
atk-s0501a:460_3: antarā ca nāḷandaṃ rājāgārake ambalaṭṭhikāya”nti. “Kaṃ ārabbhā”ti? “Suppiyañca paribbājakaṃ
atk-s0501a:460_4: brahmadattañca māṇavaka”nti. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ brahmajālassa
atk-s0501a:460_5: nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi. “Sāmaññaphalaṃ; panāvuso ānanda, kattha bhāsita”nti?
atk-s0501a:460_7: saddhi”nti. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sāmaññaphalassa nidānampi
atk-s0501a:460_8: pucchi, puggalampi pucchi. Eteneva upāyena pañcapi nikāye pucchi, puṭṭho puṭṭho āyasmā
atk-s0501a:460_9: ānando vissajjesi. Ayaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti pañcahi therasatehi katā –
atk-s0501a:463_0: Imissā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyā vattamānāya sabbaṃ dīghanikāyaṃ majjhimanikāyādiñca pucchitvā
atk-s0501a:463_1: anupubbena khuddakanikāyaṃ pucchantena āyasmatā mahākassapena “maṅgalasuttaṃ, āvuso
atk-s0501a:463_2: ānanda, kattha bhāsita”nti evamādivacanāvasāne “nidānampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchī”ti
atk-s0501a:463_3: ettha nidāne pucchite taṃ nidānaṃ vitthāretvā yathā ca bhāsitaṃ, yena ca sutaṃ, yadā
atk-s0501a:463_4: ca sutaṃ, yena ca bhāsitaṃ, yattha ca bhāsitaṃ, yassa ca bhāsitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ kathetukāmena
atk-s0501a:463_5: “evaṃ bhāsitaṃ mayā sutaṃ, ekaṃ samayaṃ sutaṃ, bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0501a:463_6: devatāya bhāsita”nti etamatthaṃ dassentena āyasmatā ānandena vuttaṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ
atk-s0501a:463_7: – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme…pe… bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0501a:463_8: gāthāya ajjhabhāsī”ti. Evamidaṃ āyasmatā ānandena vuttaṃ, tañca pana paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle
atk-s0501a:464_0: Idāni “kasmā vutta”nti ettha vuccate – yasmā ayamāyasmā mahākassapattherena nidānaṃ
atk-s0501a:464_1: puṭṭho, tasmānena taṃ nidānaṃ ādito pabhuti vitthāretuṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā vā ānandaṃ
atk-s0501a:464_2: dhammāsane nisinnaṃ vasīgaṇaparivutaṃ disvā ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ cittamuppannaṃ “ayamāyasmā
atk-s0501a:464_3: vedehamuni pakatiyāpi sakyakulamanvayo bhagavato dāyādo, bhagavatāpi pañcakkhattuṃ
atk-s0501a:464_4: etadagge niddiṭṭho, catūhi acchariyaabbhutadhammehi samannāgato, catunnaṃ parisānaṃ
atk-s0501a:464_5: piyo manāpo, idāni maññe bhagavato dhammarajjadāyajjaṃ patvā buddho jāto”ti. Tasmā
atk-s0501a:464_6: āyasmā ānando tāsaṃ devatānaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya taṃ abhūtaguṇasambhāvanaṃ
atk-s0501a:464_7: anadhivāsento attano sāvakabhāvameva dīpetuṃ āha “evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0501a:464_8: …pe… ajjhabhāsī”ti. Etthantare pañca arahantasatāni anekāni ca devatāsahassāni “sādhu
atk-s0501a:464_9: sādhū”ti āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhinandiṃsu, mahābhūmicālo ahosi, nānāvidhakusumavassaṃ
atk-s0501a:464_10: antalikkhato papati, aññāni ca bahūni acchariyāni pāturahesuṃ, bahūnañca devatānaṃ
atk-s0501a:464_11: saṃvego uppajji “yaṃ amhehi bhagavato sammukhā sutaṃ, idāneva taṃ parokkhā jāta”nti.
atk-s0501a:464_12: Evamidaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vadantenāpi iminā kāraṇena vuttanti
atk-s0501a:464_13: veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā ca “vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā, cetaṃ vatvā imaṃ vidhi”nti imissā
atk-s0501a:466_2: atthesu daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hesa “evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a:466_3: upamāyaṃ dissati. “Evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba”ntiādīsu upadese.
atk-s0501a:466_4: “Evametaṃ bhagavā, evametaṃ sugatā”ti evamādīsu sampahaṃsane. “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī
atk-s0501a:466_5: yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti evamādīsu garahaṇe.
atk-s0501a:466_6: “Evaṃ, bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”nti evamādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe.
atk-s0501a:466_7: “Evaṃ byā kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”ti evamādīsu ākāre.
atk-s0501a:466_8: “Ehi tvaṃ, māṇavaka, yena samaṇo ānando tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena
atk-s0501a:466_9: samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha. ‘Subho
atk-s0501a:466_10: māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ
atk-s0501a:466_11: pucchatī’ti, evañca vadehi sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa
atk-s0501a:466_12: nivesanaṃ, tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti evamādīsu nidassane. “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha
atk-s0501a:466_13: kālāmā, ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vāti? Akusalā, bhante. Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vāti?
atk-s0501a:466_14: Sāvajjā, bhante. Viññugarahitā vā viññuppasatthā vāti? Viññugarahitā, bhante. Samattā
atk-s0501a:466_15: samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti no vā, kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti? Samattā, bhante,
atk-s0501a:466_16: samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti, evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti evamādīsu avadhāraṇe.
atk-s0501a:467_0: Tattha ākāratthena evaṃ-saddena etamatthaṃ dīpeti – nānānayanipuṇamanekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:467_2: sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena
atk-s0501a:467_3: ko samattho viññātuṃ, sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi
atk-s0501a:468: Nidassanatthena “nāhaṃ sayambhū, na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento “evaṃ me sutaṃ, mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalasuttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0501a:469_0: Avadhāraṇatthena “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0501a:469_1: ānando, gatimantānaṃ, satimantānaṃ, dhitimantānaṃ, upaṭṭhākānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti
atk-s0501a:469_2: evaṃ bhagavatā pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ dassento sattānaṃ sotukamyataṃ
atk-s0501a:469_3: janeti “evaṃ me sutaṃ, tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikaṃ, evameva,
atk-s0501a:470_0: Me-saddo tīsu atthesu dissati. Tathā hissa “gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyya”nti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a:470_1: mayāti attho. “Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a:470_2: mayhanti attho. “Dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavathā”ti evamādīsu mamāti attho.
atk-s0501a:470_3: Idha pana “mayā suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0501a:471_0: Sutanti ayaṃ sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca gamanakhyātarāgābhibhūtūpacitānuyogasotaviññeyyasotadvāraviññātādianekatthappabhedo.
atk-s0501a:471_1: Tathā hissa “senāya pasuto”ti evamādīsu gacchantoti attho. “Sutadhammassa passato”ti
atk-s0501a:471_2: evamādīsu khyātadhammassāti attho. “Avassutā avassutassā”ti evamādīsu rāgābhibhūtā
atk-s0501a:471_3: rāgābhibhūtassāti attho. “Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ anappaka”nti evamādīsu upacitanti
atk-s0501a:471_4: attho. “Ye jhānappasutā dhīrā”ti evamādīsu jhānānuyuttāti attho. “Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ muta”nti
atk-s0501a:471_5: evamādīsu sotaviññeyyanti attho. “Sutadharo sutasannicayo”ti evamādīsu sotadvārānusāraviññātadharoti
atk-s0501a:471_6: attho. Idha pana sutanti sotaviññāṇapubbaṅgamāya viññāṇavīthiyā upadhāritanti vā
atk-s0501a:471_7: upadhāraṇanti vāti attho. Tattha yadā me-saddassa mayāti attho, tadā “evaṃ mayā sutaṃ,
atk-s0501a:471_8: sotaviññāṇapubbaṅgamāya viññāṇavīthiyā upadhārita”nti yujjati. Yadā me-saddassa mamāti
atk-s0501a:471_9: attho, tadā “evaṃ mama sutaṃ sotaviññāṇapubbaṅgamāya viññāṇavīthiyā upadhāraṇa”nti yujjati.
atk-s0501a:472_0: Evametesu tīsu padesu evanti sotaviññāṇakiccanidassanaṃ. Meti vuttaviññāṇasamaṅgīpuggalanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:472_2: savanādicittānaṃ nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattabhāvanidassanaṃ. Meti attanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:473: Tathā evanti niddisitabbadhammanidassanaṃ. Meti puggalanidassanaṃ. Sutanti puggalakiccanidassanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:474: Tathā evanti vīthicittānaṃ ākārapaññattivasena nānappakāraniddeso. Meti kattāraniddeso. Sutanti visayaniddeso.
atk-s0501a:475: Tathā evanti puggalakiccaniddeso. Sutanti viññāṇakiccaniddeso. Meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0501a:476: Tathā evanti bhāvaniddeso. Meti puggalaniddeso. Sutanti tassa kiccaniddeso.
atk-s0501a:477_0: Tattha evanti ca meti ca sacchikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti. Sutanti
atk-s0501a:477_1: vijjamānapaññatti. Tathā evanti ca meti ca taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti.
atk-s0501a:478_0: Ettha ca evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti, sutanti vacanena sutassa asammosaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0501a:478_1: evanti vacanena yonisomanasikāraṃ dīpeti ayoniso manasikaroto nānappakārappaṭivedhābhāvato.
atk-s0501a:478_2: Sutanti vacanena avikkhepaṃ dīpeti vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato. Tathā hi vikkhittacitto
atk-s0501a:478_3: puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ, puna bhaṇathā”ti bhaṇati. Yonisomanasikārena
atk-s0501a:478_4: cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe katapuññatañca sādheti, avikkhepena saddhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0501a:478_5: sappurisūpanissayañca. Evanti ca iminā bhaddakena ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṃ
atk-s0501a:478_6: attano dīpeti, sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampattiṃ. Tathā āsayasuddhiṃ
atk-s0501a:478_7: payogasuddhiñca, tāya ca āsayasuddhiyā adhigamabyattiṃ, payogasuddhiyā āgamabyattiṃ.
atk-s0501a:479_0: Evanti ca iminā nānappakārapaṭivedhadīpakena vacanena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampadaṃ
atk-s0501a:479_2: dīpeti. Evanti ca idaṃ yonisomanasikāradīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhaṇanto “ete mayā dhammā
atk-s0501a:479_3: manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti ñāpeti. Sutanti idaṃ savanayogadīpakavacanaṃ
atk-s0501a:479_4: bhaṇanto “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti ñāpeti. Tadubhayenapi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ
atk-s0501a:480_0: Evaṃ me sutanti iminā pana sakalenapi vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ
atk-s0501a:480_1: dhammaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ, atikkamati, sāvakattaṃ paṭijānanto sappurisabhūmiṃ
atk-s0501a:480_2: okkamati. Tathā asaddhammā cittaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti, saddhamme cittaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Kevalaṃ
atk-s0501a:480_3: sutamevetaṃ mayā, tasseva tu bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti ca dīpento
atk-s0501a:480_4: attānaṃ parimoceti, satthāraṃ apadisati, jinavacanaṃ appeti, dhammanettiṃ patiṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0501a:481_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimassavanaṃ vivaranto
atk-s0501a:481_1: “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa
atk-s0501a:481_4: Na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kātabbā”ti sabbadevamanussānaṃ
atk-s0501a:481_5: imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti, saddhāsampadaṃ uppādetīti veditabbo. Hoti cettha –
atk-s0501a:484: Ekanti gaṇanaparicchedaniddeso. Samayanti paricchinnaniddeso. Ekaṃ samayanti aniyamitaparidīpanaṃ. Tattha samayasaddo –
atk-s0501a:486: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati.
atk-s0501a:487_0: Tathā hissa “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a:487_1: samavāyo attho. “Ekova kho, bhikkhave, khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a:487_2: khaṇo. “Uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo”ti evamādīsu kālo. “Mahāsamayo pavanasmi”nti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a:487_3: samūho. “Samayopi kho te, bhaddāli, appaṭividdho ahosi, bhagavā kho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0501a:487_4: sopi maṃ jānissati, ‘bhaddāli, nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti,
atk-s0501a:487_5: ayampi kho te bhaddāli samayo appaṭividdho ahosī”ti evamādīsu hetu. “Tena kho pana
atk-s0501a:487_6: samayena uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake
atk-s0501a:488: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0501a:490_0: Evamādīsu paṭilābho. “Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”ti evamādīsu pahānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:490_1: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0501a:490_2: paṭivedho. Idha panassa kālo attho. Tena ekaṃ samayanti saṃvaccharautumāsaaḍḍhamāsarattidivapubbaṇhamajjhanhikasāyanhapaṭhamamajjhima-
atk-s0501a:490_3: pacchimayāmamuhuttādīsu kālakhyesu samayesu ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0501a:491_0: Ye vā ime gabbhokkantisamayo jātisamayo saṃvegasamayo abhinikkhamanasamayo dukkarakārikasamayo
atk-s0501a:491_2: evamādayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya pakāsā anekakālakhyā eva samayā. Tesu samayesu
atk-s0501a:491_3: desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo cāyaṃ ñāṇakaruṇākiccasamayesu
atk-s0501a:491_6: samayesu yaṃ kiñci sandhāya “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:492_0: Etthāha – atha kasmā yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca ito aññesu
atk-s0501a:492_1: suttapadesu “yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacanena
atk-s0501a:492_2: niddeso kato, vinaye ca “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”ti karaṇavacanena, tathā akatvā
atk-s0501a:492_3: idha “ekaṃ samaya”nti upayogavacananiddeso katoti. Tattha tathā, idha ca aññathā
atk-s0501a:492_4: atthasambhavato. Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho
atk-s0501a:492_5: ca sambhavati. Adhikaraṇañhi kālattho samūhattho ca samayo, tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
atk-s0501a:492_6: khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati, tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:493_0: Vinaye ca hetvattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati. Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi
atk-s0501a:493_1: dubbiññeyyo, tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññapento sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
atk-s0501a:493_2: apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi, tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ tattha karaṇavacananiddeso kato.
atk-s0501a:494_0: Idha pana aññasmiñca evaṃjātike suttantapāṭhe accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati. Yañhi
atk-s0501a:494_1: samayaṃ bhagavā imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi, accantameva taṃ samayaṃ karuṇāvihārena
atk-s0501a:494_2: vihāsi. Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ idha upayogavacananiddeso katoti viññeyyo. Hoti cettha –
atk-s0501a:496: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0501a:499: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0501a:500_0: Catubbidhañhi nāmaṃ āvatthikaṃ, liṅgikaṃ, nemittakaṃ, adhiccasamuppannanti. Adhiccasamuppannaṃ
atk-s0501a:500_1: nāma “yadicchaka”nti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha vaccho dammo balibaddhoti evamādi āvatthikaṃ,
atk-s0501a:500_2: daṇḍī chattī sikhī karīti evamādi liṅgikaṃ, tevijjo chaḷabhiññoti evamādi nemittakaṃ,
atk-s0501a:500_3: sirivaḍḍhako dhanavaḍḍhakoti evamādi vacanatthamanapekkhitvā pavattaṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ.
atk-s0501a:500_4: Idaṃ pana bhagavāti nāmaṃ guṇanemittakaṃ, na mahāmāyāya, na suddhodanamahārājena,
atk-s0501a:500_5: na asītiyā ñātisahassehi kataṃ, na sakkasantusitādīhi devatāvisesehi kataṃ. Yathāha
atk-s0501a:500_6: āyasmā sāriputtatthero “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ…pe… sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ bhagavā”ti.
atk-s0501a:501: Yaṃ guṇanemittakañcetaṃ nāmaṃ, tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0501a:510_0: Tattha “vaṇṇāgamo vaṇṇavipariyāyo”ti evaṃ niruttilakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā saddanayena vā
atk-s0501a:510_2: bhāgyamassa atthi, tasmā bhāgyavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccatīti ñātabbaṃ. Yasmā
atk-s0501a:510_7: vā pañca kilesakkhandhaabhisaṅkhāramaccudevaputtamāre abhañji, tasmā bhaggattā etesaṃ
atk-s0501a:510_8: parissayānaṃ bhaggavāti vattabbe bhagavāti vuccati. Āha cettha –
atk-s0501a:512: Bhaggāssa pāpakā dhammā, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
