atk-s0501a:804_7: sabbagandhehi limpitvā vitānaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā tattha buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0501a:805_0: Bhagavā santhāgāraṃ pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Bhikkhusaṅghopi kho rājāno manussā
atk-s0501a:805_1: ca patirūpe patirūpe āsane nisīdiṃsu. Sakkopi devānamindo dvīsu devalokesu devaparisāya
atk-s0501a:805_2: saddhiṃ upanisīdi aññe ca devā, ānandattheropi sabbaṃ vesāliṃ anuvicaranto rakkhaṃ
atk-s0501a:805_3: katvā vesālinagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Tattha bhagavā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0501a:806: Ettāvatā ca yā “yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha, yasmā cetaṃ imaṃ nayaṃ. Pakāsetvānā”ti mātikā nikkhittā, sā sabbappakārena vitthāritā hoti.
atk-s0501a:808_0: 1. Idāni “etassa karissāmatthavaṇṇana”nti vuttattā atthavaṇṇanā ārabbhate. Apare
atk-s0501a:808_1: pana vadanti “ādito pañceva gāthā bhagavatā vuttā, sesā parittakaraṇasamaye ānandattherenā”ti.
atk-s0501a:808_2: Yathā vā tathā vā hotu, kiṃ no imāya parikkhāya, sabbathāpi etassa ratanasuttassa
atk-s0501a:809_0: Yānīdha bhūtānīti paṭhamagāthā. Tattha yānīti yādisāni appesakkhāni vā mahesakkhāni
atk-s0501a:809_1: vā. Idhāti imasmiṃ padese, tasmiṃ khaṇe sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha. Bhūtānīti kiñcāpi
atk-s0501a:809_3: samanupassathā”ti evamādīsu khandhapañcake. “Cattāro kho, bhikkhu, mahābhūtā hetū”ti
atk-s0501a:809_4: evamādīsu catubbidhe pathavīdhātvādirūpe. “Yo ca kālaghaso bhūto”ti evamādīsu khīṇāsave.
atk-s0501a:809_5: “Sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya”nti evamādīsu sabbasatte. “Bhūtagāmapātabyatāyā”ti
atk-s0501a:809_6: evamādīsu rukkhādike. “Bhūtaṃ bhūtato sañjānātī”ti evamādīsu cātumahārājikānaṃ heṭṭhā
atk-s0501a:809_7: sattanikāyaṃ upādāya vattati. Idha pana avisesato amanussesu daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0501a:810_0: Samāgatānīti sannipatitāni. Bhummānīti bhūmiyaṃ nibbattāni. Vā-iti vikappane. Tena
atk-s0501a:810_1: yānīdha bhummāni vā bhūtāni samāgatānīti imamekaṃ vikappaṃ katvā puna dutiyavikappaṃ
atk-s0501a:810_2: kātuṃ “yāni va antalikkhe”ti āha. Antalikkhe vā yāni bhūtāni nibbattāni, tāni sabbāni
atk-s0501a:810_3: idha samāgatānīti attho. Ettha ca yāmato yāva akaniṭṭhaṃ, tāva nibbattāni bhūtāni
atk-s0501a:810_4: ākāse pātubhūtavimānesu nibbattattā “antalikkhe bhūtānī”ti veditabbāni. Tato heṭṭhā
atk-s0501a:810_5: sineruto pabhuti yāva bhūmiyaṃ rukkhalatādīsu adhivatthāni pathaviyañca nibbattāni
atk-s0501a:810_6: bhūtāni, tāni sabbāni bhūmiyaṃ bhūmipaṭibaddhesu ca rukkhalatāpabbatādīsu nibbattattā
atk-s0501a:811_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbāneva amanussabhūtāni “bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe”ti dvīhi padehi
atk-s0501a:811_1: vikappetvā puna ekena padena pariggahetvā dassetuṃ “sabbeva bhūtā sumanā bhavantū”ti
atk-s0501a:811_2: āha. Sabbeti anavasesā. Evāti avadhāraṇe, ekampi anapanetvāti adhippāyo. Bhūtāti
atk-s0501a:811_3: amanussā. Sumanā bhavantūti sukhitamanā pītisomanassajātā bhavantu. Athopīti kiccantarasanniyojanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:811_4: vākyopādāne nipātadvayaṃ. Sakkacca suṇantu bhāsitanti aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasikatvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:811_5: cetasā samannāharitvā dibbasampattilokuttarasukhāvahaṃ mama desanaṃ suṇantu.
atk-s0501a:812_0: Evamettha bhagavā “yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatānī”ti aniyamitavacanena bhūtāni pariggahetvā
atk-s0501a:812_1: puna “bhummāni vā yāni va antalikkhe”ti dvidhā vikappetvā tato “sabbeva bhūtā”ti
atk-s0501a:812_2: puna ekajjhaṃ katvā “sumanā bhavantū”ti iminā vacanena āsayasampattiyaṃ niyojento
atk-s0501a:814_0: 2. Tasmā hi bhūtāti dutiyagāthā. Tattha tasmāti kāraṇavacanaṃ. Bhūtāti āmantanavacanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:814_1: Nisāmethāti suṇātha. Sabbeti anavasesā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yasmā tumhe dibbaṭṭhānāni
atk-s0501a:814_2: tattha upabhogaparibhogasampadañca pahāya dhammassavanatthaṃ idha samāgatā, na naṭanaccanādidassanatthaṃ,
atk-s0501a:814_3: tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbeti. Atha vā “sumanā bhavantu, sakkacca suṇantū”ti vacanena
atk-s0501a:814_4: tesaṃ sumanabhāvaṃ sakkaccaṃ sotukamyatañca disvā āha “yasmā tumhe sumanabhāvena
atk-s0501a:814_6: payogasuddhīhi ca yuttā, tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha sabbe”ti. Atha vā yaṃ purimagāthāya
atk-s0501a:814_7: ante “bhāsita”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ kāraṇabhāvena apadisanto āha “yasmā mama bhāsitaṃ nāma
atk-s0501a:814_8: atidullabhaṃ aṭṭhakkhaṇaparivajjitassa khaṇassa dullabhattā, anekānisaṃsañca paññākaruṇāguṇena
atk-s0501a:814_9: pavattattā, tañcāhaṃ vattukāmo ‘suṇantu bhāsita’nti avocaṃ, tasmā hi bhūtā nisāmetha
atk-s0501a:814_10: sabbe”ti. Idaṃ iminā gāthāpadena vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:815_0: Evametaṃ kāraṇaṃ niropento attano bhāsitanisāmane niyojetvā nisāmetabbaṃ vattumāraddho
atk-s0501a:815_1: “mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā pajāyā”ti. Tassattho – yāyaṃ tīhi upaddavehi upaddutā mānusī
atk-s0501a:815_2: pajā, tassā mānusiyā pajāya mettaṃ mittabhāvaṃ hitajjhāsayataṃ paccupaṭṭhapethāti.
atk-s0501a:815_3: Keci pana “mānusikaṃ paja”nti paṭhanti, taṃ bhummatthāsambhavā na yujjati. Yampi
atk-s0501a:815_4: aññe atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti, sopi na yujjati. Adhippāyo panettha – nāhaṃ buddhoti issariyabalena
atk-s0501a:815_5: vadāmi, api tu yaṃ tumhākañca imissā ca mānusiyā pajāya hitatthaṃ vadāmi “mettaṃ
atk-s0501a:824: “Sabbe ca pāṇe manasānukampī, pahūtamariyo pakaroti puñña”nti. –
atk-s0501a:825: Evamādīnaṃ suttānaṃ ekādasānisaṃsānañca vasena ye mettaṃ karonti, etesaṃ mettā hitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0501a:827: Evamādīnaṃ suttānaṃ vasena yesu kayirati, tesampi hitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0501a:828_0: Evaṃ ubhayesampi hitabhāvaṃ dassento “mettaṃ karotha mānusiyā”ti vatvā idāni upakārampi
atk-s0501a:828_1: dassento āha “divā ca ratto ca haranti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha appamattā”ti.
atk-s0501a:828_2: Tassattho – ye manussā cittakammakaṭṭhakammādīhipi devatā katvā cetiyarukkhādīni
atk-s0501a:828_3: ca upasaṅkamitvā devatā uddissa divā baliṃ karonti, kālapakkhādīsu ca rattiṃ baliṃ
atk-s0501a:828_4: karonti, salākabhattādīni vā datvā ārakkhadevatā upādāya yāva brahmadevatānaṃ pattidānaniyyātanena
atk-s0501a:828_5: divā baliṃ karonti, chattāropanadīpamālāya sabbarattikadhammassavanādīni kārāpetvā
atk-s0501a:828_6: pattidānaniyyātanena ca rattiṃ baliṃ karonti, te kathaṃ na rakkhitabbā? Yato evaṃ
atk-s0501a:828_7: divā ca ratto ca tumhe uddissa karonti ye baliṃ, tasmā hi ne rakkhatha; tasmā balikammakaraṇāpi
atk-s0501a:828_8: te manusse rakkhatha gopayatha, ahitaṃ nesaṃ apanetha, hitaṃ upanetha appamattā hutvā
atk-s0501a:830_0: 3. Evaṃ devatāsu manussānaṃ upakārakabhāvaṃ dassetvā tesaṃ upaddavavūpasamanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:830_2: nayena saccavacanaṃ payuñjitumāraddho. Tattha yaṃkiñcīti aniyamitavasena anavasesaṃ
atk-s0501a:830_3: pariyādiyati yaṃkiñci tattha tattha vohārūpagaṃ. Vittanti dhanaṃ. Tañhi vittiṃ janetīti
atk-s0501a:830_4: vittaṃ. Idha vāti manussalokaṃ niddisati. Huraṃ vāti tato paraṃ avasesalokaṃ, tena
atk-s0501a:830_5: ca ṭhapetvā manusse sabbalokaggahaṇe patte “saggesu vā”ti parato vuttattā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0501a:830_6: manusse ca sagge ca avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:831_0: Evaṃ imehi dvīhi padehi yaṃ manussānaṃ vohārūpagaṃ alaṅkāraparibhogūpagañca jātarūparajatamuttāmaṇiveḷuriyapavāḷalohitaṅkamasāragallādikaṃ,
atk-s0501a:831_2: bhavanesu uppannānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ vittaṃ, taṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti. Saggesu vāti kāmāvacararūpāvacaradevalokesu.
atk-s0501a:831_3: Te hi sobhanena kammena ajīyantīti saggā. Suṭṭhu aggātipi saggā. Yanti yaṃ sasāmikaṃ
atk-s0501a:831_4: vā asāmikaṃ vā. Ratananti ratiṃ nayati vahati janayati vaḍḍhetīti ratanaṃ. Yaṃkiñci
atk-s0501a:831_5: cittīkataṃ mahagghaṃ atulaṃ dullabhadassanaṃ anomasattaparibhogañca, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:834_0: Paṇītanti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ atappakaṃ. Evaṃ iminā gāthāpadena yaṃ saggesu anekayojanasatappamāṇasabbaratanamayavimānasudhammavejayantappabhutīsu
atk-s0501a:834_1: sasāmikaṃ, yañca buddhuppādavirahena apāyameva paripūrentesu sattesu suññavimānappaṭibaddhaṃ
atk-s0501a:835_0: Na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenāti na-iti paṭisedhe. No-iti avadhāraṇe. Samanti tulyaṃ.
atk-s0501a:835_1: Atthīti vijjati. Tathāgatenāti buddhena. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ etaṃ vittañca ratanañca
atk-s0501a:835_2: pakāsitaṃ, ettha ekampi buddharatanena sadisaṃ ratanaṃ nevatthi. Yampi hi taṃ cittīkataṭṭhena
atk-s0501a:835_3: ratanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ maṇiratanañca, yamhi uppanne
atk-s0501a:835_4: mahājano na aññattha cittīkāraṃ karoti, na koci pupphagandhādīni gahetvā yakkhaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:835_5: vā bhūtaṭṭhānaṃ vā gacchati, sabbopi jano cakkaratanamaṇiratanameva cittīkāraṃ karoti
atk-s0501a:835_6: pūjeti, taṃ taṃ varaṃ pattheti, patthitapatthitañcassa ekaccaṃ samijjhati, tampi
atk-s0501a:835_7: ratanaṃ buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova
atk-s0501a:835_8: ratanaṃ. Tathāgate hi uppanne ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā na te aññatra cittīkāraṃ
atk-s0501a:835_9: karonti, na kañci aññaṃ pūjenti. Tathā hi brahmā sahampati sinerumattena ratanadāmena
atk-s0501a:835_10: tathāgataṃ pūjesi, yathābalañca aññe devā manussā ca bimbisārakosalarājaanāthapiṇḍikādayo.
atk-s0501a:835_11: Parinibbutampi bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā asokamahārājā
atk-s0501a:835_12: sakalajambudīpe caturāsīti vihārasahassāni patiṭṭhāpesi, ko pana vādo aññesaṃ cittīkārānaṃ.
atk-s0501a:835_14: paṭimācetiyādīni vā uddissa evaṃ cittīkāragarukāro pavattati yathā bhagavato. Evaṃcittīkataṭṭhenāpi
atk-s0501a:836_0: Tathā yampi taṃ mahagghaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:836_1: “jiṇṇampi, bhikkhave, kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ vaṇṇavantañceva hoti sukhasamphassañca mahagghañcā”ti,
atk-s0501a:836_2: tampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi mahagghaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:836_3: Tathāgato hi yesaṃ paṃsukampi paṭiggaṇhāti, tesaṃ taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0501a:836_4: seyyathāpi asokarañño, idamassa mahagghatāya. Evaṃ mahagghatāvacanena cettha dosābhāvasādhakaṃ
atk-s0501a:837_1: tesaṃ taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ. Idamassa mahagghatāya vadāmi. Seyyathāpi
atk-s0501a:837_2: taṃ, bhikkhave, kāsikaṃ vatthaṃ mahagghaṃ, tathūpamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, imaṃ puggalaṃ vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0501a:839_0: Tathā yampi taṃ atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0501a:839_2: yassa dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānamupari ekaṃ muṇḍāraṃ hoti vātaṃ gahetvā saddakaraṇatthaṃ,
atk-s0501a:839_3: yena kato saddo sukusalappatāḷitapañcaṅgikatūriyasaddo viya hoti, yassa nābhiyā ubhosu
atk-s0501a:839_4: passesu dve sīhamukhāni honti, abbhantaraṃ sakaṭacakkasseva susiraṃ. Tassa kattā
atk-s0501a:839_5: vā kāretā vā natthi, kammapaccayena ututo samuṭṭhāti. Yaṃ rājā dasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ
atk-s0501a:839_6: pūretvā tadahuposathe puṇṇamadivase sīsaṃnhāto uposathiko uparipāsādavaragato sīlāni
atk-s0501a:839_7: sodhento nisinno puṇṇacandaṃ viya sūriyaṃ viya ca uṭṭhentaṃ passati, yassa dvādasayojanato
atk-s0501a:839_8: saddo suyyati, yojanato vaṇṇo dissati, yaṃ mahājanena “dutiyo maññe cando sūriyo
atk-s0501a:839_9: vā uṭṭhito”ti ativiya kotūhalajātena dissamānaṃ nagarassa upari āgantvā rañño antepurassa
atk-s0501a:839_10: pācīnapasse nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ hutvā mahājanassa gandhapupphādīhi pūjetuṃ, yuttaṭṭhāne
atk-s0501a:840_0: Tadeva anubandhamānaṃ hatthiratanaṃ uppajjati, sabbaseto rattapādo sattappatiṭṭho
atk-s0501a:840_1: iddhimā vehāsaṅgamo uposathakulā vā chaddantakulā vā āgacchati, uposathakulā ca āgacchanto
atk-s0501a:840_2: sabbajeṭṭho āgacchati, chaddantakulā sabbakaniṭṭho sikkhitasikkho damathūpeto, so
atk-s0501a:840_3: dvādasayojanaṃ parisaṃ gahetvā sakalajambudīpaṃ anusaṃyāyitvā purepātarāsameva sakaṃ
atk-s0501a:841: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ assaratanaṃ uppajjati, sabbaseto rattapādo kāḷasīso muñjakeso valāhakassarājakulā āgacchati. Sesamettha hatthiratanasadisameva.
atk-s0501a:842_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uppajjati. So hoti maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṃso
atk-s0501a:842_1: suparikammakato āyāmato cakkanābhisadiso, vepullapabbatā āgacchati. So caturaṅgasamannāgatepi
atk-s0501a:842_2: andhakāre rañño dhajaggaṃ gato yojanaṃ obhāseti, yassobhāsena manussā “divā”ti maññamānā
atk-s0501a:842_3: kammante payojenti, antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya passanti.
atk-s0501a:843_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ itthiratanaṃ uppajjati, pakatiaggamahesī vā hoti, uttarakuruto
atk-s0501a:843_1: vā āgacchati maddarājakulato vā, atidīghatādichadosavivajjitā atikkantā mānusavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:843_2: appattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ, yassā rañño sītakāle uṇhāni gattāni honti, uṇhakāle sītāni,
atk-s0501a:843_3: satadhā phoṭita tūlapicuno viya samphasso hoti, kāyato candanagandho vāyati, mukhato
atk-s0501a:844_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ gahapatiratanaṃ uppajjati rañño pakatikammakāro seṭṭhi, yassa
atk-s0501a:844_1: cakkaratane uppannamatte dibbaṃ cakkhu pātubhavati, yena samantato yojanamatte nidhiṃ
atk-s0501a:844_2: passati asāmikampi sasāmikampi, so rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti “appossukko tvaṃ,
atk-s0501a:844_3: deva, hohi, ahaṃ te dhanena dhanakaraṇīyaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0501a:845_0: Tampi anubandhamānaṃ pariṇāyakaratanaṃ uppajjati rañño pakatijeṭṭhaputto. Cakkaratane
atk-s0501a:845_1: uppannamatte atirekapaññāveyyattiyena samannāgato hoti, dvādasayojanāya parisāya
atk-s0501a:845_2: cetasā cittaṃ parijānitvā niggahapaggahasamattho hoti, so rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti
atk-s0501a:845_3: “appossukko tvaṃ, deva, hohi, ahaṃ te rajjaṃ anusāsissāmī”ti. Yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ
atk-s0501a:845_4: atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, yassa na sakkā tulayitvā tīrayitvā aggho kātuṃ “sataṃ vā sahassaṃ
atk-s0501a:845_5: vā agghati koṭiṃ vā”ti. Tattha ekaratanampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi hi
atk-s0501a:845_6: atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ. Tathāgato hi na sakkā sīlato vā samādhito
atk-s0501a:845_7: vā paññādīnaṃ vā aññatarato kenaci tulayitvā tīrayitvā “ettakaguṇo vā iminā samo
atk-s0501a:845_8: vā sappaṭibhāgo vā”ti paricchindituṃ. Evaṃ atulaṭṭhenapi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0501a:846_0: Tathā yampi taṃ dullabhadassanaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, seyyathidaṃ dullabhapātubhāvo rājā
atk-s0501a:846_1: cakkavatti, cakkādīni ca tassa ratanāni, tampi buddharatanena samaṃ natthi. Yadi
atk-s0501a:846_2: hi dullabhadassanaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ, kuto cakkavattiādīnaṃ ratanattaṃ.
atk-s0501a:846_3: Tāni hi ekasmiṃyeva kappe anekāni uppajjanti. Yasmā pana asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe tathāgatasuñño
atk-s0501a:846_4: loko hoti, tasmā tathāgatova kadāci karahaci uppajjanato dullabhadassano. Vuttampi
atk-s0501a:847_0: “Devatā, ānanda, ujjhāyanti ‘dūrā ca vatamha āgatā tathāgataṃ dassanāya, kadāci karahaci
atk-s0501a:847_1: tathāgatā loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā, ajjeva rattiyā pacchime yāme tathāgatassa
atk-s0501a:847_2: parinibbānaṃ bhavissati, ayañca mahesakkho bhikkhu bhagavato purato ṭhito ovārento,
atk-s0501a:847_3: na mayaṃ labhāma pacchime kāle tathāgataṃ dassanāyā”’ti.
atk-s0501a:849_0: Tathā yampi taṃ anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa
atk-s0501a:849_3: na nibbattati. Ubhato sujātassa pana rañño khattiyasseva paripūritadasavidhacakkavattivattassa
atk-s0501a:849_4: paribhogatthāya nibbattanato anomasattaparibhogaṃyeva hoti, tampi buddharatanasamaṃ
atk-s0501a:849_5: natthi. Yadi hi anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ. Tathāgato
atk-s0501a:849_6: hi loke omakasattasammatānaṃ anupanissayasampannānaṃ viparītadassanānaṃ pūraṇakassapādīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:849_7: channaṃ satthārānaṃ aññesañca evarūpānaṃ supinantepi aparibhogo. Upanissayasampannānaṃ
atk-s0501a:849_8: pana catuppadāyapi gāthāya pariyosāne arahattamadhigantuṃ samatthānaṃ nibbedhikañāṇadassanānaṃ
atk-s0501a:849_11: paribhuñjanti. Evaṃ anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhenāpi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0501a:850_0: Yampi taṃ avisesato ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – rañño cakkavattissa cakkaratanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:850_1: Tañhi disvāva rājā cakkavatti attamano hoti, evampi taṃ rañño ratiṃ janeti. Puna
atk-s0501a:850_2: caparaṃ rājā cakkavatti vāmena hatthena suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena
atk-s0501a:850_3: cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkirati “pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratanaṃ, abhivijinātu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti.
atk-s0501a:850_4: Tato cakkaratanaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ viya tūriyaṃ madhurassaraṃ niccharantaṃ ākāsena puratthimaṃ
atk-s0501a:850_5: disaṃ gacchati, anvadeva rājā, cakkavatti cakkānubhāvena dvādasayojanavitthiṇṇāya
atk-s0501a:850_6: caturaṅginiyā senāya nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ uccarukkhānaṃ heṭṭhābhāgena, nīcarukkhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:850_7: uparibhāgena, rukkhesu pupphaphalapallavādipaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgatānaṃ hatthato paṇṇākārañca
atk-s0501a:850_8: gaṇhanto “ehi kho, mahārājā”ti evamādinā paramanipaccakārena āgate paṭirājāno “pāṇo
atk-s0501a:850_9: na hantabbo”tiādinā nayena anusāsanto gacchati. Yattha pana rājā bhuñjitukāmo vā
atk-s0501a:850_10: divāseyyaṃ vā kappetukāmo hoti, tattha cakkaratanaṃ ākāsā orohitvā udakādisabbakiccakkhame
atk-s0501a:850_11: same bhūmibhāge akkhāhataṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Puna rañño gamanacitte uppanne purimanayeneva
atk-s0501a:850_12: saddaṃ karontaṃ gacchati, taṃ sutvā dvādasayojanikāpi parisā ākāsena gacchati. Cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0501a:850_13: anupubbena puratthimaṃ samuddaṃ ajjhogāhati, tasmiṃ ajjhogāhante udakaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:850_14: apagantvā bhittīkataṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Mahājano yathākāmaṃ satta ratanāni gaṇhāti.
atk-s0501a:850_15: Puna rājā suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā “ito paṭṭhāya mama rajja”nti udakena abbhukkiritvā
atk-s0501a:850_16: nivattati. Senā purato hoti, cakkaratanaṃ pacchato, rājā majjhe. Cakkaratanena osakkitosakkitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:850_17: udakaṃ paripūrati. Eteneva upāyena dakkhiṇapacchimuttarepi samudde gacchati.
atk-s0501a:851_0: Evaṃ catuddisaṃ anusaṃyāyitvā cakkaratanaṃ tiyojanappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ ārohati. Tattha
atk-s0501a:851_1: ṭhito rājā cakkaratanānubhāvena vijitavijayo pañcasataparittadīpapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ sattayojanasahassaparimaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0501a:851_4: ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ suphullapuṇḍarīkavanaṃ viya oloketi. Evaṃ olokayato cassa anappakā
atk-s0501a:851_5: rati uppajjati. Evampi taṃ cakkaratanaṃ rañño ratiṃ janeti, tampi buddharatanasamaṃ
atk-s0501a:851_6: natthi. Yadi hi ratijananaṭṭhena ratanaṃ, tathāgatova ratanaṃ, kiṃ karissati etaṃ
atk-s0501a:851_7: cakkaratanaṃ? Tathāgato hi yassā dibbāya ratiyā cakkaratanādīhi sabbehipi janitā
atk-s0501a:851_8: cakkavattirati saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upeti, tatopi ratito uttaritarañca
atk-s0501a:851_9: paṇītatarañca attano ovādappaṭikarānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānampi devamanussānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaratiṃ
atk-s0501a:851_12: janeti. Evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhenāpi tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0501a:852_0: Apica ratanaṃ nāmetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti saviññāṇakamaviññāṇakañca. Tattha aviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0501a:852_1: cakkaratanaṃ maṇiratanañca, yaṃ vā panaññampi anindriyabaddhasuvaṇṇarajatādi, saviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0501a:852_3: Evaṃ duvidhe cettha saviññāṇakaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā? Yasmā aviññāṇakaṃ suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādiratanaṃ
atk-s0501a:853_0: Saviññāṇakaratanampi duvidhaṃ tiracchānagataratanaṃ, manussaratanañca. Tattha manussaratanaṃ
atk-s0501a:853_1: aggamakkhāyati. Kasmā? Yasmā tiracchānagataratanaṃ manussaratanassa opavayhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:853_2: Manussaratanampi duvidhaṃ itthiratanaṃ, purisaratanañca. Tattha purisaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0501a:853_3: Kasmā? Yasmā itthiratanaṃ purisaratanassa paricārikattaṃ āpajjati. Purisaratanampi
atk-s0501a:853_4: duvidhaṃ agārikaratanaṃ, anagārikaratanañca. Tattha anagārikaratanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0501a:853_5: Kasmā? Yasmā agārikaratanesu aggo cakkavattipi sīlādiguṇayuttaṃ anagārikaratanaṃ
atk-s0501a:853_6: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā upaṭṭhahitvā payirupāsitvā dibbamānusikā sampattiyo pāpuṇitvā
atk-s0501a:854_0: Evaṃ anagārikaratanampi duvidhaṃ ariyaputhujjanavasena. Ariyaratanampi duvidhaṃ sekhāsekhavasena.
atk-s0501a:854_4: Kasmā? Guṇamahantatāya. Sāriputtamoggallānasadisāpi hi anekasatā sāvakā ekassa paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0501a:854_5: guṇānaṃ satabhāgampi na upenti. Paccekabuddharatanatopi sammāsambuddharatanaṃ aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0501a:854_6: Kasmā? Guṇamahantatāya. Sakalampi hi jambudīpaṃ pūretvā pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ ghaṭentā
atk-s0501a:854_7: nisinnā paccekabuddhā ekassa sammāsambuddhassa guṇānaṃ neva saṅkhaṃ na kalaṃ na kalabhāgaṃ
atk-s0501a:854_8: upenti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… tathāgato
atk-s0501a:854_9: tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādi. Evaṃ kenaci pariyāyena tathāgatasamaṃ ratanaṃ natthi.
atk-s0501a:854_10: Tenāha bhagavā – “na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenā”ti.
atk-s0501a:855_0: Evaṃ bhagavā buddharatanassa aññehi ratanehi asamataṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0501a:855_1: uppannaupaddavavūpasamatthaṃ neva jātiṃ na gottaṃ na kolaputtiyaṃ na vaṇṇapokkharatādiṃ
atk-s0501a:855_2: nissāya, apica kho avīcimupādāya bhavaggapariyante loke sīlasamādhikkhandhādīhi guṇehi
atk-s0501a:855_3: buddharatanassa asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe ratanaṃ
atk-s0501a:856_0: Tassattho – idampi idha vā huraṃ vā saggesu vā yaṃkiñci atthi vittaṃ vā ratanaṃ vā,
atk-s0501a:856_1: tena saddhiṃ tehi tehi guṇehi asamattā buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ. Yadi hi etaṃ saccaṃ,
atk-s0501a:856_2: atha etena saccena imesaṃ pāṇīnaṃ suvatthi hotu, sobhanānaṃ atthitā hotu arogatā
atk-s0501a:856_3: nirupaddavatāti. Ettha ca yathā “cakkhu kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena
atk-s0501a:856_4: vā”ti evamādīsu attabhāvena vā attaniyabhāvena vāti attho. Itarathā hi cakkhu attā
atk-s0501a:856_5: vā attaniyaṃ vāti appaṭisiddhameva siyā. Evaṃ ratanaṃ paṇītanti ratanattaṃ paṇītaṃ,
atk-s0501a:856_6: ratanabhāvo paṇītoti ayamattho veditabbo. Itarathā hi buddho neva ratananti sijjheyya.
atk-s0501a:856_7: Na hi yattha ratanaṃ atthi, taṃ ratananti na sijjhati. Yattha pana cittīkatādiatthasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0501a:856_8: yena vā tena vā vidhinā sambandhagataṃ ratanaṃ atthi, yasmā taṃ ratanattamupādāya
atk-s0501a:856_9: ratananti paññāpīyati, tasmā tassa ratanassa atthitāya ratananti sijjhati. Atha vā
atk-s0501a:856_10: idampi buddhe ratananti imināpi pakārena buddhova ratananti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:856_11: Vuttamattāya ca bhagavatā imāya gāthāya rājakulassa sotthi jātā, bhayaṃ vūpasantaṃ.
atk-s0501a:856_12: Imissā gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:858_0: 4. Evaṃ buddhaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni nibbānadhammaguṇena vattumāraddho “khayaṃ
atk-s0501a:858_1: virāga”nti. Tattha yasmā nibbānasacchikiriyāya rāgādayo khīṇā honti parikkhīṇā, yasmā
atk-s0501a:858_2: vā taṃ tesaṃ anuppādanirodhakkhayamattaṃ, yasmā ca taṃ rāgādivippayuttaṃ sampayogato
atk-s0501a:858_3: ca ārammaṇato ca, yasmā vā tamhi sacchikate rāgādayo accantaṃ virattā honti vigatā
atk-s0501a:858_4: viddhastā, tasmā khayanti ca virāganti ca vuccati. Yasmā panassa na uppādo paññāyati,
atk-s0501a:858_5: na vayo, na ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ tasmā taṃ na jāyati na jīyati na mīyatīti katvā
atk-s0501a:858_6: amatanti vuccati. Uttamatthena pana atappakaṭṭhena ca paṇītanti. Yadajjhagāti yaṃ
atk-s0501a:858_7: ajjhagā vindi paṭilabhi, attano ñāṇabalena sacchākāsi. Sakyamunīti sakyakulappasutattā
atk-s0501a:858_8: sakyo, moneyyadhammasamannāgatattā muni, sakyo eva muni sakyamuni. Samāhitoti ariyamaggasamādhinā
atk-s0501a:858_9: samāhitacitto. Na tena dhammena samatthi kiñcīti tena khayādināmakena sakyamuninā
atk-s0501a:858_10: adhigatena dhammena samaṃ kiñci dhammajātaṃ natthi. Tasmā suttantarepi vuttaṃ – “yāvatā,
atk-s0501a:858_11: bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādi.
atk-s0501a:859_0: Evaṃ bhagavā nibbānadhammassa aññehi dhammehi asamataṃ vatvā idāni tesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0501a:859_2: asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi dhamme ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ, etena
atk-s0501a:859_3: saccena suvatthi hotū”ti. Tassattho purimagāthāya vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi
atk-s0501a:861_0: 5. Evaṃ nibbānadhammaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni maggadhammaguṇena vattumāraddho “yaṃ
atk-s0501a:861_1: buddhaseṭṭho”ti. Tattha “bujjhitā saccānī”tiādinā nayena buddho, uttamo pasaṃsanīyo
atk-s0501a:861_2: cāti seṭṭho, buddho ca so seṭṭho cāti buddhaseṭṭho, anubuddhapaccekabuddhasutabuddhakhyesu
atk-s0501a:861_3: vā buddhesu seṭṭhoti buddhaseṭṭho. So buddhaseṭṭho yaṃ parivaṇṇayī “aṭṭhaṅgikova
atk-s0501a:861_4: maggānaṃ, khemaṃ nibbānapattiyā”ti ca “ariyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desissāmi
atk-s0501a:861_5: saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti ca evamādinā nayena tattha tattha pasaṃsi pakāsayi. Sucinti
atk-s0501a:861_7: pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phalapadānato “ānantarikasamādhī”ti āhu. Na hi maggasamādhimhi
atk-s0501a:861_8: uppanne tassa phaluppattinisedhako koci antarāyo atthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:862_0: “Ayañca puggalo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno assa, kappassa ca uḍḍayhanavelā
atk-s0501a:862_1: assa, neva tāva kappo uḍḍayheyya, yāvāyaṃ puggalo na sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0501a:862_2: ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ṭhitakappī. Sabbepi maggasamaṅgino puggalā ṭhitakappino”ti.
atk-s0501a:863_0: Samādhinā tena samo na vijjatīti tena buddhaseṭṭhaparivaṇṇitena sucinā ānantarikasamādhinā
atk-s0501a:863_1: samo rūpāvacarasamādhi vā arūpāvacarasamādhi vā koci na vijjati. Kasmā? Tesaṃ bhāvitattā
atk-s0501a:863_2: tattha tattha brahmaloke upapannassāpi puna nirayādīsupi upapattisambhavato, imassa
atk-s0501a:863_4: Tasmā suttantarepi vuttaṃ – “yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā…pe… ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko
atk-s0501a:864_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ānantarikasamādhissa aññehi samādhīhi asamataṃ vatvā idāni purimanayeneva
atk-s0501a:864_1: maggadhammaratanassa asadisabhāvaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi dhamme…pe…
atk-s0501a:864_2: hotū”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0501a:866_0: 6. Evaṃ maggadhammaguṇenāpi saccaṃ vatvā idāni saṅghaguṇenāpi vattumāraddho “ye puggalā”ti.
atk-s0501a:866_1: Tattha yeti aniyametvā uddeso. Puggalāti sattā. Aṭṭhāti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo. Te
atk-s0501a:866_2: hi cattāro ca paṭipannā cattāro ca phale ṭhitāti aṭṭha honti. Sataṃ pasatthāti sappurisehi
atk-s0501a:866_3: buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakehi aññehi ca devamanussehi pasatthā. Kasmā? Sahajātasīlādiguṇayogā.
atk-s0501a:866_4: Tesañhi campakavakulakusumādīnaṃ sahajātavaṇṇagandhādayo viya sahajātā sīlasamādhiādayo
atk-s0501a:866_5: guṇā, tena te vaṇṇagandhādisampannāni viya pupphāni devamanussānaṃ sataṃ piyā manāpā
atk-s0501a:866_6: pasaṃsanīyā ca honti. Tena vuttaṃ “ye puggalā aṭṭhasataṃ pasatthā”ti.
atk-s0501a:867_0: Atha vā yeti aniyametvā uddeso. Puggalāti sattā. Aṭṭhasatanti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0501a:867_1: Te hi ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti tayo sotāpannā. Kāmarūpārūpabhavesu
atk-s0501a:867_2: adhigataphalā tayo sakadāgāmino. Te sabbepi catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena catuvīsati.
atk-s0501a:867_4: uddhaṃsoto, akaniṭṭhagāmīti avihesu pañca. Tathā atappasudassasudassīsu. Akaniṭṭhesu
atk-s0501a:867_5: pana uddhaṃsotavajjā cattāroti catuvīsati anāgāmino. Sukkhavipassako samathayānikoti
atk-s0501a:867_6: dve arahanto. Cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa. Te sabbepi saddhādhurapaññādhurānaṃ
atk-s0501a:867_7: vasena diguṇā hutvā aṭṭhasataṃ honti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0501a:868_0: Cattāri etāni yugāni hontīti te sabbepi aṭṭha vā aṭṭhasataṃ vāti vitthāravasena uddiṭṭhapuggalā
atk-s0501a:868_1: saṅkhepavasena sotāpattimaggaṭṭho phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yugaṃ, evaṃ yāva arahattamaggaṭṭho
atk-s0501a:868_2: phalaṭṭhoti ekaṃ yuganti cattāri yugāni honti. Te dakkhiṇeyyāti ettha teti pubbe
atk-s0501a:868_3: aniyametvā uddiṭṭhānaṃ niyametvā niddeso. Ye puggalā vitthāravasena aṭṭha vā, aṭṭhasataṃ
atk-s0501a:868_4: vā, saṅkhepavasena cattāri yugāni hontīti vuttā, sabbepi te dakkhiṇaṃ arahantīti
atk-s0501a:868_5: dakkhiṇeyyā. Dakkhiṇā nāma kammañca kammavipākañca saddahitvā “esa me idaṃ vejjakammaṃ
atk-s0501a:868_6: vā jaṅghapesanikaṃ vā karissatī”ti evamādīni anapekkhitvā diyyamāno deyyadhammo,
atk-s0501a:868_7: taṃ arahanti nāma sīlādiguṇayuttā puggalā, ime ca tādisā, tena vuccanti “te dakkhiṇeyyā”ti.
atk-s0501a:869_0: Sugatassa sāvakāti bhagavā sobhanena gamanena yuttattā, sobhanañca ṭhānaṃ gatattā,
atk-s0501a:869_1: suṭṭhu ca gatattā, suṭṭhu eva ca gadattā sugato, tassa sugatassa. Sabbepi te vacanaṃ
atk-s0501a:869_2: suṇantīti sāvakā. Kāmañca aññepi suṇanti, na pana sutvā kattabbakiccaṃ karonti, ime
atk-s0501a:869_3: pana sutvā kattabbaṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattiṃ katvā maggaphalāni pattā, tasmā “sāvakā”ti
atk-s0501a:869_4: vuccanti. Etesu dinnāni mahapphalānīti etesu sugatasāvakesu appakānipi dānāni dinnāni
atk-s0501a:869_5: paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhibhāvaṃ upagatattā mahapphalāni honti. Tasmā suttantarepi vuttaṃ –
atk-s0501a:870_0: “Yāvatā, bhikkhave, saṅghā vā gaṇā vā tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho, tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati,
atk-s0501a:870_1: yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe…
atk-s0501a:871_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sabbesampi maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhānaṃ vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0501a:871_1: idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0501a:871_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:873_0: 7. Evaṃ maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhānaṃ vasena saṅghaguṇena saccaṃ vatvā idāni tato ekaccānaṃ
atk-s0501a:873_2: suppayuttā”ti. Tattha yeti aniyamituddesavacanaṃ. Suppayuttāti suṭṭhu payuttā, anekavihitaṃ
atk-s0501a:873_3: anesanaṃ pahāya suddhājīvitaṃ nissāya vipassanāya attānaṃ payuñjitumāraddhāti attho.
atk-s0501a:873_4: Atha vā suppayuttāti suvisuddhakāyavacīpayogasamannāgatā, tena tesaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0501a:873_5: dasseti. Manasā daḷhenāti daḷhena manasā, thirasamādhiyuttena cetasāti attho. Tena
atk-s0501a:873_6: tesaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ dasseti. Nikkāminoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā hutvā paññādhurena
atk-s0501a:873_7: vīriyena sabbakilesehi katanikkamanā. Tena tesaṃ vīriyasampannaṃ paññakkhandhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0501a:874_0: Gotamasāsanamhīti gottato gotamassa tathāgatasseva sāsanamhi. Tena ito bahiddhā nānappakārampi
atk-s0501a:874_1: amaratapaṃ karontānaṃ suppayogādiguṇābhāvato kilesehi nikkamanābhāvaṃ dasseti. Teti
atk-s0501a:874_2: pubbe uddiṭṭhānaṃ niddesavacanaṃ. Pattipattāti ettha pattabbāti patti, pattabbā nāma
atk-s0501a:874_3: pattuṃ arahā, yaṃ patvā accantayogakkhemino honti, arahattaphalassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0501a:874_4: taṃ pattiṃ pattāti pattipattā. Amatanti nibbānaṃ. Vigayhāti ārammaṇavasena vigāhitvā.
atk-s0501a:874_5: Laddhāti labhitvā. Mudhāti abyayena kākaṇikamattampi byayaṃ akatvā. Nibbutinti paṭippassaddhakilesadarathaṃ
atk-s0501a:874_6: phalasamāpattiṃ. Bhuñjamānāti anubhavamānā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Ye imasmiṃ gotamasāsanamhi
atk-s0501a:874_7: sīlasampannattā suppayuttā, samādhisampannattā manasā daḷhena, paññāsampannattā nikkāmino,
atk-s0501a:874_8: te imāya sammāpaṭipadāya amataṃ vigayha mudhā laddhā phalasamāpattisaññitaṃ nibbutiṃ
atk-s0501a:875_0: Evaṃ bhagavā phalasamāpattisukhamanubhavantānaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalānameva vasena saṅgharatanassa
atk-s0501a:875_1: guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a:875_2: Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0501a:877_0: 8. Evaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalānaṃ guṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni bahujanapaccakkhena
atk-s0501a:877_1: sotāpannasseva guṇena vattumāraddho “yathindakhīlo”ti. Tattha yathāti upamāvacanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:877_2: Indakhīloti nagaradvāravinivāraṇatthaṃ ummārabbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathaviṃ
atk-s0501a:877_3: khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa sāradārumayathambhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pathavinti bhūmiṃ. Sitoti
atk-s0501a:877_4: anto pavisitvā nissito. Siyāti bhaveyya. Catubbhi vātehīti catūhi disāhi āgatehi
atk-s0501a:877_5: vātehi. Asampakampiyoti kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo. Tathūpamanti tathāvidhaṃ.
atk-s0501a:877_6: Sappurisanti uttamapurisaṃ. Vadāmīti bhaṇāmi. Yo ariyasaccāni avecca passatīti yo
atk-s0501a:877_7: cattāri ariyasaccāni paññāya ajjhogāhetvā passati. Tattha ariyasaccāni kumārapañhe
atk-s0501a:878_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yathā hi indakhīlo gambhīranematāya pathavissito catubbhi
atk-s0501a:878_1: vātehi asampakampiyo siyā, imampi sappurisaṃ tathūpamameva vadāmi, yo ariyasaccāni
atk-s0501a:878_2: avecca passati. Kasmā? Yasmā sopi indakhīlo viya catūhi vātehi sabbatitthiyavādavātehi
atk-s0501a:878_3: asampakampiyo hoti, tamhā dassanā kenaci kampetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo. Tasmā
atk-s0501a:879_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ayokhīlo vā indakhīlo vā gambhīranemo sunikhāto acalo asampakampī,
atk-s0501a:879_1: puratthimāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi, neva naṃ saṅkampeyya na sampakampeyya
atk-s0501a:879_2: na sampacāleyya. Pacchimāya…pe… dakkhiṇāya, uttarāyapi ce…pe… na sampacāleyya. Taṃ
atk-s0501a:879_3: kissa hetu? Gambhīrattā, bhikkhave, nemassa, sunikhātattā indakhīlassa. Evameva kho,
atk-s0501a:879_4: bhikkhave, ye ca kho keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ‘idaṃ dukkhanti…pe… paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0501a:879_5: pajānanti, te na aññassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā mukhaṃ olokenti ‘ayaṃ nūna bhavaṃ
atk-s0501a:879_6: jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passatī’ti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Sudiṭṭhattā, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ ariyasaccāna”nti.
atk-s0501a:880_0: Evaṃ bhagavā bahujanapaccakkhassa sotāpannasseva vasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0501a:880_1: idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0501a:880_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:882: 9. Evaṃ avisesato sotāpannassa guṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni ye te tayo sotāpannā ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:883_0: “Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti…pe… so ekaṃyeva
atk-s0501a:883_1: bhavaṃ nibbattitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ ekabījī. Tathā dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni
atk-s0501a:883_2: sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo. Tathā sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0501a:883_3: devesu ca manussesu ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo”ti.
atk-s0501a:884_0: Tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭhassa sattakkhattuparamassa guṇena vattumāraddho “ye ariyasaccānī”ti.
atk-s0501a:884_1: Tattha ye ariyasaccānīti etaṃ vuttanayameva. Vibhāvayantīti paññāobhāsena saccappaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-s0501a:884_2: kilesandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā attano pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti. Gambhīrapaññenāti appameyyapaññatāya
atk-s0501a:884_3: sadevakassa lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhapaññena, sabbaññunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:884_4: Sudesitānīti samāsabyāsasākalyavekalyādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0501a:884_5: te honti bhusaṃ pamattāti te vibhāvitaariyasaccā puggalā kiñcāpi devarajjacakkavattirajjādippamādaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:884_6: āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā honti, tathāpi sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-s0501a:884_7: nirodhena ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
atk-s0501a:884_8: tesaṃ niruddhattā atthaṅgatattā na aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ ādiyanti, sattamabhave eva pana
atk-s0501a:885_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sattakkhattuparamavasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:885_1: nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:885_2: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:887_0: 10. Evaṃ sattakkhattuparamassa aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ anādiyanaguṇena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ
atk-s0501a:887_1: vatvā idāni tasseva satta bhave ādiyatopi aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi visiṭṭhena
atk-s0501a:887_2: guṇena vattumāraddho “sahāvassā”ti. Tattha sahāvāti saddhiṃyeva. Assāti “na te bhavaṃ
atk-s0501a:887_4: Sotāpattimaggo hi nibbānaṃ disvā kattabbakiccasampadāya sabbapaṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato
atk-s0501a:887_5: “dassana”nti vuccati, tassa attani pātubhāvo dassanasampadā, tāya dassanasampadāya
atk-s0501a:887_6: saha eva. Tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavantīti ettha assu-iti padapūraṇamatte nipāto
atk-s0501a:887_7: “idaṃ su me, sāriputta, mahāvikaṭabhojanasmiṃ hotī”tiādīsu viya. Yato sahāvassa dassanasampadāya
atk-s0501a:887_8: tayo dhammā jahitā bhavanti pahīnā hontīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0501a:888_1: yadatthi kiñcī”ti. Tattha sati kāye vijjamāne upādānakkhandhapañcakākhye kāye vīsativatthukā
atk-s0501a:888_2: diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, satī vā tattha kāye diṭṭhītipi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, yathāvuttappakāre
atk-s0501a:888_3: kāye vijjamānā diṭṭhīti attho. Satiyeva vā kāye diṭṭhītipi sakkāyadiṭṭhi, yathāvuttappakāre
atk-s0501a:888_4: kāye vijjamāne rūpādisaṅkhāto attāti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhīti attho. Tassā ca pahīnattā
atk-s0501a:888_5: sabbadiṭṭhigatāni pahīnāneva honti. Sā hi nesaṃ mūlaṃ. Sabbakilesabyādhivūpasamanato
atk-s0501a:888_6: paññā“cikicchita”nti vuccati, taṃ paññācikicchitaṃ ito vigataṃ, tato vā paññācikicchitā
atk-s0501a:888_7: idaṃ vigatanti vicikicchitaṃ. “Satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinā nayena vuttāya aṭṭhavatthukāya
atk-s0501a:888_8: vimatiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tassā pahīnattā sabbānipi vicikicchitāni pahīnāni honti.
atk-s0501a:888_9: Tañhi nesaṃ mūlaṃ. “Ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena suddhi vatena suddhī”ti
atk-s0501a:888_10: evamādīsu āgataṃ gosīlakukkurasīlādikaṃ sīlaṃ govatakukkuravatādikañca vataṃ sīlabbatanti
atk-s0501a:888_11: vuccati, tassa pahīnattā sabbampi naggiyamuṇḍikādiamaratapaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti. Tañhi
atk-s0501a:888_12: tassa mūlaṃ, teneva sabbāvasāne vuttaṃ “yadatthi kiñcī”ti. Dukkhadassanasampadāya
atk-s0501a:890_0: 11. Evamassa kilesavaṭṭappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni tasmiṃ kilesavaṭṭe sati yena vipākavaṭṭena
atk-s0501a:890_1: bhavitabbaṃ, tappahānā tassāpi pahānaṃ dīpento āha “catūhapāyehi ca vippamutto”ti.
atk-s0501a:890_2: Tattha cattāro apāyā nāma nirayatiracchānapettivisayaasurakāyā. Tehi esa satta bhave
atk-s0501a:891_0: Evamassa vipākavaṭṭappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni yamassa vipākavaṭṭassa mūlabhūtaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ,
atk-s0501a:891_1: tassāpi pahānaṃ dassento āha “chaccābhiṭhānāni abhabba kātu”nti. Tattha abhiṭhānānīti
atk-s0501a:891_2: oḷārikaṭṭhānāni, tāni esa cha abhabbo kātuṃ. Tāni ca “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso,
atk-s0501a:891_3: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”tiādinā nayena ekakanipāte vuttāni
atk-s0501a:891_5: Tāni hi kiñcāpi diṭṭhisampanno ariyasāvako kunthakipillikampi jīvitā na voropeti,
atk-s0501a:891_6: apica kho pana puthujjanabhāvassa vigarahaṇatthaṃ vuttāni. Puthujjano hi adiṭṭhisampannattā
atk-s0501a:891_7: evaṃmahāsāvajjāni abhiṭhānānipi karoti, dassanasampanno pana abhabbo tāni kātunti.
atk-s0501a:891_8: Abhabbaggahaṇañcettha bhavantarepi akaraṇadassanatthaṃ. Bhavantarepi hi esa attano
atk-s0501a:891_9: ariyasāvakabhāvaṃ ajānantopi dhammatāya eva etāni vā cha pakatipāṇātipātādīni vā
atk-s0501a:891_10: pañca verāni aññasatthāruddesena saha cha ṭhānāni na karoti, yāni sandhāya ekacce
atk-s0501a:891_11: “cha chābhiṭhānānī”tipi paṭhanti. Matamacchaggāhādayo cettha ariyasāvakagāmadārakānaṃ nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:892_0: Evaṃ bhagavā satta bhave ādiyatopi ariyasāvakassa aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi
atk-s0501a:892_1: visiṭṭhaguṇavasena saṅgharatanassa guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ
atk-s0501a:892_2: payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya
atk-s0501a:894_0: 12. Evaṃ satta bhave ādiyatopi aññehi appahīnabhavādānehi puggalehi visiṭṭhaguṇena
atk-s0501a:894_1: saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni na kevalaṃ dassanasampanno cha abhiṭhānāni abhabbo
atk-s0501a:894_2: kātuṃ, kintu appamattakampi pāpakammaṃ katvā tassa paṭicchādanāyapi abhabboti pamādavihārinopi
atk-s0501a:894_3: dassanasampannassa katappaṭicchādanābhāvaguṇena vattumāraddho “kiñcāpi so kamma karoti pāpaka”nti.
atk-s0501a:895_0: Tassattho – so dassanasampanno kiñcāpi satisammosena pamādavihāraṃ āgamma yaṃ taṃ
atk-s0501a:895_1: bhagavatā lokavajjaṃ sañciccātikkamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0501a:895_2: paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kuṭikārasahaseyyādiṃ
atk-s0501a:895_4: vā vācāya, uda cetasā vā katthaci lobhadosuppādanaṃ jātarūpādisādiyanaṃ cīvarādiparibhogesu
atk-s0501a:895_5: apaccavekkhaṇādiṃ vā pāpakammaṃ karoti. Abhabbo so tassa paṭicchadāya na so taṃ “idaṃ
atk-s0501a:895_6: akappiyamakaraṇīya”nti jānitvā muhuttampi paṭicchādeti, taṃkhaṇaṃ eva pana satthari
atk-s0501a:895_7: vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu āvi katvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti, “na puna karissāmī”ti
atk-s0501a:895_8: evaṃ saṃvaritabbaṃ vā saṃvarati. Kasmā? Yasmā abhabbatā diṭṭhapadassa vuttā, evarūpampi
atk-s0501a:895_9: pāpakammaṃ katvā tassa paṭicchādāya diṭṭhanibbānapadassa dassanasampannassa puggalassa
atk-s0501a:897_0: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, daharo kumāro mando uttānaseyyako hatthena vā pādena vā aṅgāraṃ
atk-s0501a:897_1: akkamitvā khippameva paṭisaṃharati, evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhammatā esā diṭṭhisampannassa
atk-s0501a:897_2: puggalassa, kiñcāpi tathārūpiṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, yathārūpāya āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0501a:897_3: Atha kho naṃ khippameva satthari vā viññūsu vā sabrahmacārīsu deseti vivarati uttānīkaroti,
atk-s0501a:897_4: desetvā vivaritvā uttānīkatvā āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.
atk-s0501a:898_0: Evaṃ bhagavā pamādavihārinopi dassanasampannassa katappaṭicchādanābhāvaguṇena saṅgharatanassa
atk-s0501a:898_1: guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi saṅghe”ti.
atk-s0501a:898_2: Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0501a:900_0: 13. Evaṃ saṅghapariyāpannānaṃ puggalānaṃ tena tena guṇappakārena saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:900_1: saccaṃ vatvā idāni yvāyaṃ bhagavatā ratanattayaguṇaṃ dīpentena idha saṅkhepena aññatra
atk-s0501a:900_2: ca vitthārena pariyattidhammo desito, tampi nissāya puna buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ
atk-s0501a:900_4: rukkhānaṃ samūho vanaṃ, mūlasārapheggutacasākhāpalāsehi pavuddho gumbo pagumbo, vanassa,
atk-s0501a:900_5: vane vā pagumbo vanappagumbo. Svāyaṃ “vanappagumbe”ti vutto, evampi hi vattuṃ labbhati
atk-s0501a:900_6: “atthi savitakkasavicāre, atthi avitakkavicāramatte, sukhe dukkhe jīve”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0501a:900_7: Yathāti upamāvacanaṃ. Phussitāni aggāni assāti phussitaggo, sabbasākhāpasākhāsu sañjātapupphoti
atk-s0501a:900_8: attho. So pubbe vuttanayeneva “phussitagge”ti vutto. Gimhānamāse paṭhamasmiṃ gimheti
atk-s0501a:900_9: ye cattāro gimhānaṃ māsā, tesaṃ catunnaṃ gimhamāsānaṃ ekasmiṃ māse. Katarasmiṃ māse
atk-s0501a:900_10: iti ce? Paṭhamasmiṃ gimhe, citramāseti attho. So hi “paṭhamagimho”ti ca “bālavasanto”ti
atk-s0501a:900_11: ca vuccati. Tato paraṃ padatthato pākaṭameva.
atk-s0501a:901_0: Ayaṃ panettha piṇḍattho – yathā paṭhamagimhanāmake bālavasante nānāvidharukkhagahane
atk-s0501a:901_1: vane supupphitaggasākho taruṇarukkhagacchapariyāyanāmo pagumbo ativiya sassiriko
atk-s0501a:901_3: vā nānappakārehi atthappabhedapupphehi ativiya sassirikattā tathūpamaṃ nibbānagāmimaggadīpanato
atk-s0501a:901_4: nibbānagāmiṃ pariyattidhammavaraṃ neva lābhahetu na sakkārādihetu, kevalantu mahākaruṇāya
atk-s0501a:901_5: abbhussāhitahadayo sattānaṃ paramahitāya adesayīti. Paramaṃ hitāyāti ettha ca gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:901_6: anunāsiko. Ayaṃ panattho – paramahitāya nibbānāya adesayīti.
atk-s0501a:902_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imaṃ supupphitaggavanappagumbasadisaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vatvā idāni tameva
atk-s0501a:902_1: nissāya buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0501a:902_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kevalaṃ pana idampi yathāvuttapakārapariyattidhammasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0501a:902_3: buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu
atk-s0501a:904_0: 14. Evaṃ bhagavā pariyattidhammena buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni lokuttaradhammena
atk-s0501a:904_1: vattumāraddho “varo varaññū”ti. Tattha varoti paṇītādhimuttikehi icchito “aho vata
atk-s0501a:904_2: mayampi evarūpā assāmā”ti, varaguṇayogato vā varo uttamo seṭṭhoti attho. Varaññūti
atk-s0501a:904_3: nibbānaññū. Nibbānañhi sabbadhammānaṃ uttamaṭṭhena varaṃ, tañcesa bodhimūle sayaṃ
atk-s0501a:904_4: paṭivijjhitvā aññāsi. Varadoti pañcavaggiyabhaddavaggiyajaṭilādīnaṃ aññesañca devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0501a:904_6: varāharoti vuccati. So hi bhagavā dīpaṅkarato pabhuti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūrento
atk-s0501a:904_7: pubbakehi sammāsambuddhehi anuyātaṃ purāṇamaggavaramāhari, tena “varāharo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:905_0: Apica sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhena varo, nibbānasacchikiriyāya varaññū, sattānaṃ vimuttisukhadānena
atk-s0501a:905_1: varado, uttamapaṭipadāharaṇena varāharo. Etehi lokuttaraguṇehi adhikassa kassaci
atk-s0501a:906_0: Aparo nayo – varo upasamādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varaññū paññādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena,
atk-s0501a:906_1: varado cāgādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varāharo saccādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇena, varaṃ maggasaccamāharīti.
atk-s0501a:906_2: Tathā varo puññussayena, varaññū paññussayena, varado buddhabhāvatthikānaṃ tadupāyasampadānena,
atk-s0501a:906_3: varāharo paccekabuddhabhāvatthikānaṃ tadupāyāharaṇena, anuttaro tattha tattha asadisatāya,
atk-s0501a:906_4: attanā vā anācariyako hutvā paresaṃ ācariyabhāvena, dhammavaraṃ adesayi sāvakabhāvatthikānaṃ
atk-s0501a:906_5: tadatthāya svākkhātatādiguṇayuttassa dhammavarassa desanato. Sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
atk-s0501a:907_0: Evaṃ bhagavā navavidhena lokuttaradhammena attano guṇaṃ vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:907_1: nissāya buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjati “idampi buddhe”ti. Tassattho pubbe
atk-s0501a:907_2: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kevalaṃ pana yaṃ varaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ esa aññāsi, yañca
atk-s0501a:907_3: adāsi, yañca āhari, yañca desesi, idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:907_4: Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:909_0: 15. Evaṃ bhagavā pariyattidhammañca navalokuttaradhammañca nissāya dvīhi gāthāhi
atk-s0501a:909_1: buddhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vatvā idāni ye taṃ pariyattidhammaṃ assosuṃ, sutānusārena
atk-s0501a:909_2: ca paṭipajjitvā navappakārampi lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigamiṃsu, tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānapattiguṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:909_3: nissāya puna saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccaṃ vattumāraddho “khīṇaṃ purāṇa”nti. Tattha khīṇanti
atk-s0501a:909_4: samucchinnaṃ. Purāṇanti purātanaṃ. Navanti sampati vattamānaṃ. Natthi sambhavanti
atk-s0501a:909_5: avijjamānapātubhāvaṃ. Virattacittāti vītarāgacittā. Āyatike bhavasminti anāgatamaddhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:909_6: punabbhave. Teti yesaṃ khīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ navaṃ natthi sambhavaṃ, ye ca āyatike bhavasmiṃ
atk-s0501a:909_7: virattacittā, te khīṇāsavā bhikkhū. Khīṇabījāti ucchinnabījā. Avirūḷhichandāti virūḷhichandavirahitā.
atk-s0501a:909_8: Nibbantīti vijjhāyanti. Dhīrāti dhitisampannā. Yathāyaṃ padīpoti ayaṃ padīpo viya.
atk-s0501a:910_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yaṃ taṃ sattānaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhampi purāṇaṃ atītakālikaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0501a:910_1: taṇhāsinehassa appahīnattā paṭisandhiāharaṇasamatthatāya akhīṇaṃyeva hoti, taṃ purāṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:910_2: kammaṃ yesaṃ arahattamaggena taṇhāsinehassa sositattā agginā daḍḍhabījamiva āyatiṃ
atk-s0501a:910_3: vipākadānāsamatthatāya khīṇaṃ. Yañca nesaṃ buddhapūjādivasena idāni pavattamānaṃ
atk-s0501a:910_4: kammaṃ navanti vuccati, tañca taṇhāpahāneneva chinnamūlapādapapupphamiva āyatiṃ phaladānāsamatthatāya
atk-s0501a:910_5: yesaṃ natthi sambhavaṃ, ye ca taṇhāpahāneneva āyatike bhavasmiṃ virattacittā, te
atk-s0501a:910_6: khīṇāsavā bhikkhū “kammaṃ khettaṃ viññāṇaṃ bīja”nti ettha vuttassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
atk-s0501a:910_7: kammakkhayeneva khīṇattā khīṇabījā. Yopi pubbe punabbhavasaṅkhātāya virūḷhiyā chando
atk-s0501a:910_8: ahosi. Tassapi samudayappahāneneva pahīnattā pubbe viya cutikāle asambhavena avirūḷhichandā
atk-s0501a:910_9: dhitisampannattā dhīrā carimaviññāṇanirodhena yathāyaṃ padīpo nibbuto, evaṃ nibbanti,
atk-s0501a:910_10: puna “rūpino vā arūpino vā”ti evamādiṃ paññattipathaṃ accentīti. Tasmiṃ kira samaye
atk-s0501a:910_11: nagaradevatānaṃ pūjanatthāya jālitesu padīpesu eko padīpo vijjhāyi, taṃ dassento
atk-s0501a:911_0: Evaṃ bhagavā ye taṃ purimāhi dvīhi gāthāhi vuttaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ assosuṃ, sutānusārena
atk-s0501a:911_1: ca paṭipajjitvā navappakārampi lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigamiṃsu, tesaṃ anupādisesanibbānapattiguṇaṃ
atk-s0501a:911_2: vatvā idāni tameva guṇaṃ nissāya saṅghādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccavacanaṃ payuñjanto desanaṃ
atk-s0501a:911_3: samāpesi “idampi saṅghe”ti. Tassattho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Kevalaṃ pana
atk-s0501a:911_4: idampi yathāvuttena pakārena khīṇāsavabhikkhūnaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ saṅghe ratanaṃ
atk-s0501a:911_5: paṇītanti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Imissāpi gāthāya āṇā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesu amanussehi paṭiggahitāti.
atk-s0501a:912: Desanāpariyosāne rājakulassa sotthi ahosi, sabbūpaddavā vūpasamiṃsu, caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0501a:914_0: 16. Atha sakko devānamindo “bhagavatā ratanattayaguṇaṃ nissāya saccavacanaṃ payuñjamānena
atk-s0501a:914_1: nāgarassa sotthi katā, mayāpi nāgarassa sotthitthaṃ ratanattayaguṇaṃ nissāya kiñci
atk-s0501a:914_2: vattabba”nti cintetvā avasāne gāthāttayaṃ abhāsi “yānīdha bhūtānī”ti tattha yasmā
atk-s0501a:914_3: buddho yathā lokahitatthāya ussukkaṃ āpannehi āgantabbaṃ, tathā āgatato yathā ca
atk-s0501a:914_4: tehi gantabbaṃ, tathā gatato yathā ca tehi ājānitabbaṃ, tathā ājānanato, yathā ca
atk-s0501a:914_5: jānitabbaṃ, tathā jānanato, yañca tatheva hoti, tassa gadanato ca “tathāgato”ti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:914_6: Yasmā ca so devamanussehi pupphagandhādinā bahi nibbattena upakārakena, dhammānudhammapaṭipattādinā
atk-s0501a:914_7: ca attani nibbattena ativiya pūjito, tasmā sakko devānamindo sabbaṃ devaparisaṃ attanā
atk-s0501a:914_8: saddhiṃ sampiṇḍetvā āha “tathāgataṃ devamanussapūjitaṃ, buddhaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotū”ti.
atk-s0501a:915_0: 17. Yasmā pana dhamme maggadhammo yathā yuganaddhasamathavipassanābalena gantabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:915_1: kilesapakkhaṃ samucchindantena, tathā gatoti tathāgato. Nibbānadhammopi yathā gato
atk-s0501a:915_2: paññāya paṭividdho sabbadukkhappaṭivighātāya sampajjati, buddhādīhi tathā avagato,
atk-s0501a:915_3: tasmā “tathāgato”tveva vuccati. Yasmā ca saṅghopi yathā attahitāya paṭipannehi gantabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:915_4: tena tena maggena, tathā gatoti “tathāgato”tveva vuccati. Tasmā avasesagāthādvayepi
atk-s0501a:915_5: tathāgataṃ dhammaṃ namassāma suvatthi hotu, tathāgataṃ saṅghaṃ namassāma suvatthi
atk-s0501a:916_0: Evaṃ sakko devānamindo imaṃ gāthāttayaṃ bhāsitvā bhagavantaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā devapurameva
atk-s0501a:916_1: gato saddhiṃ devaparisāya. Bhagavā pana tadeva ratanasuttaṃ dutiyadivasepi desesi,
atk-s0501a:916_2: puna caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, evaṃ yāva sattamadivasaṃ
atk-s0501a:916_3: desesi, divase divase tatheva dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Bhagavā aḍḍhamāsameva vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0501a:916_4: viharitvā rājūnaṃ “gacchāmā”ti paṭivedesi. Tato rājāno diguṇena sakkārena puna tīhi
atk-s0501a:916_5: divasehi bhagavantaṃ gaṅgātīraṃ nayiṃsu. Gaṅgāya nibbattā nāgarājāno cintesuṃ “manussā
atk-s0501a:916_6: tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti, mayaṃ kiṃ na karissāmā”ti suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayā nāvāyo
atk-s0501a:916_7: māpetvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimaye eva pallaṅke paññapetvā pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ
atk-s0501a:916_8: udakaṃ karitvā “amhākaṃ anuggahaṃ karothā”ti bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu. Bhagavā adhivāsetvā
atk-s0501a:916_9: ratananāvamārūḷho, pañca ca bhikkhusatāni pañcasataṃ nāvāyo abhirūḷhā. Nāgarājāno
atk-s0501a:916_10: bhagavantaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena nāgabhavanaṃ pavesesuṃ. Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0501a:916_11: nāgaparisāya dhammaṃ desesi. Dutiyadivase dibbehi khādanīyabhojanīyehi mahādānaṃ
atk-s0501a:917_0: Bhūmaṭṭhā devā “manussā ca nāgā ca tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti, mayaṃ kiṃ na karissāmā”ti
atk-s0501a:917_1: cintetvā vanappagumbarukkhapabbatādīsu chattātichattāni ukkhipiṃsu. Eteneva upāyena
atk-s0501a:917_2: yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmabhavanaṃ, tāva mahāsakkāraviseso nibbatti. Bimbisāropi licchavīhi
atk-s0501a:917_3: āgatakāle katasakkārato diguṇamakāsi. Pubbe vuttanayeneva pañcahi divasehi bhagavantaṃ rājagahaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0501a:918_0: Rājagahamanuppatte bhagavati pacchābhattaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0501a:918_1: ayamantarakathā udapādi “aho buddhassa bhagavato ānubhāvo, yaṃ uddissa gaṅgāya orato
atk-s0501a:918_2: ca pārato ca aṭṭhayojano bhūmibhāgo ninnañca thalañca samaṃ katvā vālukāya okiritvā
atk-s0501a:918_3: pupphehi sañchanno, yojanappamāṇaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ nānāvaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ,
atk-s0501a:918_4: yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanaṃ, tāva chattātichattāni ussitānī”ti. Bhagavā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā
atk-s0501a:918_5: gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā taṅkhaṇānurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā maṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0501a:918_6: nisīdi. Nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0501a:918_7: sannisinnā”ti. Bhikkhū sabbaṃ ārocesuṃ bhagavā etadavoca – “na, bhikkhave, ayaṃ pūjāviseso
atk-s0501a:918_8: mayhaṃ buddhānubhāvena nibbatto, na nāgadevabrahmānubhāvena, apica kho pubbe appamattakapariccāgānubhāvena
atk-s0501a:918_9: nibbatto”ti. Bhikkhū āhaṃsu “na mayaṃ, bhante, taṃ appamattakaṃ pariccāgaṃ jānāma,
atk-s0501a:918_10: sādhu no bhagavā tathā kathetu, yathā mayaṃ taṃ jāneyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0501a:919_0: Bhagavā āha – bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, takkasilāyaṃ saṅkho nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi. Tassa
atk-s0501a:919_1: putto susīmo nāma māṇavo soḷasavassuddesiko vayena. So ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0501a:919_2: abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha taṃ pitā āha “kiṃ, tāta, susīmā”ti? So āha “icchāmahaṃ,
atk-s0501a:919_3: tāta, bārāṇasiṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggahetu”nti. “Tena hi, tāta, susīma, asuko nāma brāhmaṇo
atk-s0501a:919_4: mama sahāyako, tassa santikaṃ gantvā uggaṇhāhī”ti kahāpaṇasahassaṃ adāsi. So taṃ
atk-s0501a:919_5: gahetvā mātāpitaro abhivādetvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā upacārayuttena vidhinā
atk-s0501a:919_6: ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā attānaṃ nivedesi. Ācariyo “mama sahāyakassa putto”ti
atk-s0501a:919_7: māṇavaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sabbaṃ pāhuneyyavattamakāsi. So addhānakilamathaṃ vinodetvā
atk-s0501a:919_8: taṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ ācariyassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā sippaṃ uggahetuṃ okāsaṃ yāci. Ācariyo
atk-s0501a:920_0: So lahuñca gaṇhanto, bahuñca gaṇhanto, gahitagahitañca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittatelamiva
atk-s0501a:920_1: avinassamānaṃ dhārento, dvādasavassikaṃ sippaṃ katipayamāseneva pariyosāpesi. So
atk-s0501a:920_2: sajjhāyaṃ karonto ādimajjhaṃyeva passati, no pariyosānaṃ. Atha ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0501a:920_3: āha “imassa sippassa ādimajjhameva passāmi, no pariyosāna”nti. Ācariyo āha “ahampi,
atk-s0501a:920_4: tāta, evamevā”ti. Atha ko, ācariya, imassa sippassa pariyosānaṃ jānātīti? Isipatane,
atk-s0501a:920_5: tāta, isayo atthi, te jāneyyunti. Te upasaṅkamitvā pucchāmi, ācariyāti? Puccha, tāta,
atk-s0501a:920_6: yathāsukhanti. So isipatanaṃ gantvā paccekabuddhe upasaṅkamitvā pucchi “api, bhante,
atk-s0501a:920_7: pariyosānaṃ jānāthā”ti? Āma, āvuso, jānāmāti. Taṃ mampi sikkhāpethāti. Tena hāvuso,
atk-s0501a:920_8: pabbajāhi, na sakkā apabbajitena sikkhāpetunti. Sādhu, bhante, pabbājetha vā maṃ,
atk-s0501a:920_9: yaṃ vā icchatha, taṃ katvā pariyosānaṃ jānāpethāti. Te taṃ pabbājetvā kammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0501a:920_10: niyojetuṃ asamatthā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ, evaṃ pārupitabba”ntiādinā nayena ābhisamācārikaṃ
atk-s0501a:920_11: sikkhāpesuṃ. So tattha sikkhanto upanissayasampannattā na cireneva paccekabodhiṃ
atk-s0501a:920_13: sampannaparivāro. So appāyukasaṃvattanikassa kammassa katattā na cireneva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0501a:920_14: Tassa paccekabuddhā ca mahājanakāyo ca sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gahetvā nagaradvāre
atk-s0501a:921_0: Atha kho saṅkho brāhmaṇo “putto me ciragato, na cassa pavattiṃ jānāmī”ti puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0501a:921_1: takkasilāya nikkhamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā mahājanakāyaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā
atk-s0501a:921_2: “addhā bahūsu ekopi me puttassa pavattiṃ jānissatī”ti cintento upasaṅkamitvā pucchi
atk-s0501a:921_3: “susīmo nāma māṇavo idha āgato atthi, api nu tassa pavattiṃ jānāthā”ti? Te “āma,
atk-s0501a:921_4: brāhmaṇa, jānāma, imasmiṃ nagare brāhmaṇassa santike tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā
atk-s0501a:921_5: paccekabuddhānaṃ santike pabbajitvā paccekabuddho hutvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0501a:921_6: parinibbāyi, ayamassa thūpo patiṭṭhāpito”ti āhaṃsu. So bhūmiṃ hatthena paharitvā
atk-s0501a:921_7: roditvā ca paridevitvā ca taṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā tiṇāni uddharitvā uttarasāṭakena
atk-s0501a:921_8: vālukaṃ ānetvā paccekabuddhacetiyaṅgaṇe okiritvā kamaṇḍaluto udakena samantato bhūmiṃ
atk-s0501a:921_9: paripphositvā vanapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā uttarasāṭakena paṭākaṃ āropetvā thūpassa upari
atk-s0501a:922_0: Evaṃ atītaṃ desetvā jātakaṃ paccuppannena anusandhento bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0501a:922_1: “Siyā kho pana vo, bhikkhave, evamassa ‘añño nūna tena samayena saṅkho brāhmaṇo ahosī’ti,
atk-s0501a:922_2: na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ahaṃ tena samayena saṅkho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ, mayā susīmassa
atk-s0501a:922_3: paccekabuddhassa cetiyaṅgaṇe tiṇāni uddhaṭāni, tassa me kammassa nissandena aṭṭhayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0501a:922_4: vigatakhāṇukaṇṭakaṃ katvā samaṃ suddhamakaṃsu. Mayā tattha vālukā okiṇṇā, tassa me
atk-s0501a:922_5: nissandena aṭṭhayojanamagge vālukaṃ okiriṃsu. Mayā tattha vanakusumehi pūjā katā,
atk-s0501a:922_6: tassa me nissandena navayojane magge thale ca udake ca nānāpupphehi pupphasantharamakaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:922_7: Mayā tattha kamaṇḍaludakena bhūmi paripphositā, tassa me nissandena vesāliyaṃ pokkharavassaṃ
atk-s0501a:922_8: vassi. Mayā tasmiṃ cetiye paṭākā āropitā, chattañca baddhaṃ, tassa me nissandena
atk-s0501a:922_9: yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā paṭākā ca āropitā, chattātichattāni ca ussitāni. Iti kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0501a:922_10: ayaṃ mayhaṃ pūjāviseso neva buddhānubhāvena nibbatto, na nāgadevabrahmānubhāvena,
atk-s0501a:922_11: apica kho appamattakapariccāgānubhāvena nibbatto”ti. Dhammakathāpariyosāne imaṃ gāthamabhāsi –
atk-s0501a:924: Caje mattāsukhaṃ dhīro, sampassaṃ vipulaṃ sukha”nti. ;
atk-s0501a:929: Idāni “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”tiādinā ratanasuttānantaraṃ nikkhittassa tirokuṭṭasuttassa atthavaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto, tassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ vatvā atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0501a:930_0: Tattha idañhi tirokuṭṭaṃ iminā anukkamena bhagavatā avuttampi yāyaṃ ito pubbe nānappakārena
atk-s0501a:930_1: kusalakammapaṭipatti dassitā, tattha pamādaṃ āpajjamāno nirayatiracchānayonīhi visiṭṭhatarepi
atk-s0501a:930_2: ṭhāne uppajjamāno yasmā evarūpesu petesu uppajjati, tasmā na ettha pamādo karaṇīyoti
atk-s0501a:930_3: dassanatthaṃ, yehi ca bhūtehi upaddutāya vesāliyā upaddavavūpasamanatthaṃ ratanasuttaṃ
atk-s0501a:930_4: vuttaṃ, tesu ekaccāni evarūpānīti dassanatthaṃ vā vuttanti.
atk-s0501a:936: Sukatā hoti tasmāhaṃ, karissāmi tatheva taṃ”.
atk-s0501a:937_0: Kena panetaṃ pakāsitaṃ, kattha kadā kasmā cāti? Vuccate – bhagavatā pakāsitaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0501a:937_1: kho pana rājagahe dutiyadivase rañño māgadhassa anumodanatthaṃ. Imassa catthassa
atk-s0501a:938_0: Ito dvānavutikappe kāsi nāma nagaraṃ ahosi. Tattha jayaseno nāma rājā. Tassa sirimā
atk-s0501a:938_1: nāma devī, tassā kucchiyaṃ phusso nāma bodhisatto nibbattitvā anupubbena sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0501a:938_2: abhisambujjhi. Jayaseno rājā “mama putto abhinikkhamitvā buddho jāto, mayhameva buddho,
atk-s0501a:938_3: mayhaṃ dhammo, mayhaṃ saṅgho”ti mamattaṃ uppādetvā sabbakālaṃ sayameva upaṭṭhahati,
atk-s0501a:939_0: Bhagavato kaniṭṭhabhātaro vemātikā tayo bhātaro cintesuṃ – “buddhā nāma sabbalokahitāya
atk-s0501a:939_1: uppajjanti, na cekassevatthāya, amhākañca pitā aññesaṃ okāsaṃ na deti, kathaṃ nu
atk-s0501a:939_2: mayaṃ labheyyāma bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātu”nti. Tesaṃ etadahosi – “handa mayaṃ kiñci
atk-s0501a:939_3: upāyaṃ karomā”ti. Te paccantaṃ kupitaṃ viya kārāpesuṃ. Tato rājā “paccanto kupito”ti
atk-s0501a:939_4: sutvā tayopi putte paccantavūpasamanatthaṃ pesesi. Te vūpasametvā āgatā, rājā tuṭṭho
atk-s0501a:939_5: varaṃ adāsi “yaṃ icchatha, taṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Te “mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ icchāmā”ti
atk-s0501a:939_6: āhaṃsu. Rājā “etaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Te “mayaṃ aññena anatthikā”ti
atk-s0501a:939_7: āhaṃsu. Tena hi paricchedaṃ katvā gaṇhathāti. Te satta vassāni yāciṃsu, rājā na adāsi.
atk-s0501a:939_8: Evaṃ cha, pañca, cattāri, tīṇi, dve, ekaṃ, satta māsāni, cha, pañca, cattārīti yāva
atk-s0501a:940_0: Te varaṃ labhitvā paramatuṭṭhā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āhaṃsu – “icchāma
atk-s0501a:940_1: mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ, adhivāsetu no, bhante, bhagavā imaṃ
atk-s0501a:940_2: temāsaṃ vassāvāsa”nti. Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena. Tato te attano janapade niyuttakapurisassa
atk-s0501a:940_3: lekhaṃ pesesuṃ “imaṃ temāsaṃ amhehi bhagavā upaṭṭhātabbo, vihāraṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:940_4: bhagavato upaṭṭhānasambhāraṃ karohī”ti. So taṃ sabbaṃ sampādetvā paṭinivedesi. Te
atk-s0501a:940_5: kāsāyavatthanivatthā hutvā aḍḍhateyyehi purisasahassehi veyyāvaccakarehi bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0501a:940_6: sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahamānā janapadaṃ netvā vihāraṃ niyyātetvā vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:941_0: Tesaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko eko gahapatiputto sapajāpatiko saddho ahosi pasanno. So buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0501a:941_1: saṅghassa dānavattaṃ sakkaccaṃ adāsi. Janapade niyuttakapuriso taṃ gahetvā jānapadehi
atk-s0501a:941_2: ekādasamattehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ sakkaccameva dānaṃ pavattāpesi. Tattha keci
atk-s0501a:941_3: jānapadā paṭihatacittā ahesuṃ. Te dānassa antarāyaṃ katvā deyyadhamme attanā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0501a:941_4: bhattasālañca agginā dahiṃsu. Pavārite rājaputtā bhagavato mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0501a:941_5: bhagavantaṃ purakkhatvā pituno sakāsameva agamaṃsu. Tattha gantvā eva bhagavā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0501a:941_6: Rājā ca rājaputtā ca janapade niyuttakapuriso ca bhaṇḍāgāriko ca anupubbena kālaṃ
atk-s0501a:941_7: katvā saddhiṃ parisāya sagge uppajjiṃsu, paṭihatacittajanā nirayesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:941_8: Evaṃ tesaṃ dvinnaṃ gaṇānaṃ saggato saggaṃ, nirayato nirayaṃ upapajjantānaṃ dvānavutikappā vītivattā.
atk-s0501a:942_0: Atha imasmiṃ bhaddakappe kassapabuddhassa kāle te paṭihatacittajanā petesu uppannā.
atk-s0501a:942_1: Tadā manussā attano ñātakānaṃ petānaṃ atthāya dānaṃ datvā uddisanti “idaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0501a:942_2: ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti. Te sampattiṃ labhanti. Atha imepi petā taṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ kassapaṃ
atk-s0501a:942_3: upasaṅkamitvā pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ nu kho, bhante, mayampi evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labheyyāmā”ti?
atk-s0501a:942_4: Bhagavā āha – “idāni na labhatha, apica anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissati, tassa
atk-s0501a:942_5: bhagavato kāle bimbisāro nāma rājā bhavissati, so tumhākaṃ ito dvānavutikappe ñāti
atk-s0501a:942_6: ahosi, so buddhassa dānaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ uddisissati, tadā labhissathā”ti. Evaṃ vutte
atk-s0501a:942_7: kira tesaṃ petānaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ “sve labhissathā”ti vuttaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0501a:943_0: Atha ekasmiṃ buddhantare vītivatte amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajji. Tepi tayo rājaputtā
atk-s0501a:943_1: tehi aḍḍhateyyehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ devalokā cavitvā magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0501a:943_2: uppajjitvā anupubbena isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā gayāsīse tayo jaṭilā ahesuṃ, janapade
atk-s0501a:943_3: niyuttakapuriso, rājā ahosi bimbisāro, bhaṇḍāgāriko, gahapati visākho nāma mahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0501a:943_4: ahosi, tassa pajāpati dhammadinnā nāma seṭṭhidhītā ahosi. Evaṃ sabbāpi avasesā parisā
atk-s0501a:944_0: Amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā sattasattāhaṃ atikkamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ āgamma
atk-s0501a:944_1: dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā pañcavaggiye ādiṃ katvā yāva aḍḍhateyyasahassaparivāre tayo
atk-s0501a:944_2: jaṭile vinetvā rājagahaṃ agamāsi. Tattha ca tadahupasaṅkamantaṃyeva rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ
atk-s0501a:944_3: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi ekādasanavutehi māgadhakehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ.
atk-s0501a:944_4: Atha raññā svātanāya bhattena nimantito bhagavā adhivāsetvā dutiyadivase sakkena
atk-s0501a:947_0: Evamādīhi gāthāhi abhitthaviyamāno rājagahaṃ pavisitvā rañño nivesane mahādānaṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0501a:947_1: Te petā “idāni rājā amhākaṃ dānaṃ uddisissati, idāni uddisissatī”ti āsāya parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:948_0: Rājā dānaṃ datvā “kattha nu kho bhagavā vihareyyā”ti bhagavato vihāraṭṭhānameva cintesi,
atk-s0501a:948_1: na taṃ dānaṃ kassaci uddisi. Petā chinnāsā hutvā rattiṃ rañño nivesane ativiya bhiṃsanakaṃ
atk-s0501a:948_2: vissaramakaṃsu. Rājā bhayasaṃvegasantāsamāpajji, tato pabhātāya rattiyā bhagavato
atk-s0501a:948_3: ārocesi – “evarūpaṃ saddamassosiṃ, kiṃ nu kho me, bhante, bhavissatī”ti. Bhagavā
atk-s0501a:948_4: āha – “mā bhāyi, mahārāja, na te kiñci pāpakaṃ bhavissati, apica kho te purāṇañātakā
atk-s0501a:948_5: petesu uppannā santi, te ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tameva paccāsīsamānā vicaranti ‘buddhassa
atk-s0501a:948_6: dānaṃ datvā amhākaṃ uddisissatī’ti, na tesaṃ tvaṃ hiyyo uddisi, te chinnāsā tathārūpaṃ vissaramakaṃsū”ti.
atk-s0501a:949_0: So āha “idāni pana, bhante, dinne labheyyu”nti? “Āma, mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi me, bhante,
atk-s0501a:949_1: adhivāsetu bhagavā ajjatanāya dānaṃ, tesaṃ uddisissāmī”ti? Bhagavā adhivāsesi. Rājā
atk-s0501a:949_2: nivesanaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi. Bhagavā rājantepuraṃ
atk-s0501a:949_3: gantvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. Tepi kho petā “api nāma ajja
atk-s0501a:949_4: labheyyāmā”ti gantvā tirokuṭṭādīsu aṭṭhaṃsu. Bhagavā tathā akāsi, yathā te sabbeva
atk-s0501a:949_5: rañño pākaṭā ahesuṃ. Rājā dakkhiṇodakaṃ dento “idaṃ me ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti uddisi, taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0501a:949_6: tesaṃ petānaṃ padumasañchannā pokkharaṇiyo nibbattiṃsu. Te tattha nhatvā ca pivitvā
atk-s0501a:949_7: ca paṭippassaddhadarathakilamathapipāsā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā ahesuṃ. Rājā yāgukhajjakabhojanāni
atk-s0501a:949_8: datvā uddisi, taṅkhaṇaññeva tesaṃ dibbayāgukhajjakabhojanāni nibbattiṃsu. Te tāni
atk-s0501a:949_9: paribhuñjitvā pīṇindriyā ahesuṃ. Atha vatthasenāsanāni datvā uddisi. Tesaṃ dibbavatthadibbayānadibbapāsādadibbapaccattharaṇadibbaseyyādialaṅkāravidhayo
atk-s0501a:949_10: nibbattiṃsu. Sāpi tesaṃ sampatti yathā sabbāva pākaṭā hoti, tathā bhagavā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0501a:949_11: Rājā ativiya attamano ahosi. Tato bhagavā bhuttāvī pavārito rañño māgadhassa anumodanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:950: Ettāvatā ca “yena yattha yadā yasmā, tirokuṭṭaṃ pakāsitaṃ, pakāsetvāna taṃ sabba”nti ayaṃ mātikā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca vibhattā hoti.
atk-s0501a:952_0: 1. Idāni imassa tirokuṭṭassa yathākkamaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma. Seyyathidaṃ – paṭhamagāthāya
atk-s0501a:952_1: tāva tirokuṭṭāti kuṭṭānaṃ parabhāgā vuccanti. Tiṭṭhantīti nisajjādippaṭikkhepato
atk-s0501a:952_2: ṭhānakappanavacanametaṃ. Tena yathā pākāraparabhāgaṃ pabbataparabhāgañca gacchantaṃ
atk-s0501a:952_3: “tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchatī”ti vadanti, evamidhāpi kuṭṭassa parabhāgesu
atk-s0501a:952_4: tiṭṭhante “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”ti āha. Sandhisiṅghāṭakesu cāti ettha sandhiyoti
atk-s0501a:952_6: tikoṇaracchā vuccanti, tadekajjhaṃ katvā purimena saddhiṃ saṅghaṭento “sandhisiṅghāṭakesu
atk-s0501a:952_7: cā”ti āha. Dvārabāhāsu tiṭṭhantīti nagaradvāragharadvārānaṃ bāhā nissāya tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0501a:952_8: Āgantvāna sakaṃ gharanti ettha sakaṃ gharaṃ nāma pubbañātigharampi attanā sāmikabhāvena
atk-s0501a:952_9: ajjhāvutthapubbagharampi. Tadubhayampi yasmā te sakagharasaññāya āgacchanti, tasmā
atk-s0501a:954_0: 2. Evaṃ bhagavā pubbe anajjhāvutthapubbampi pubbañātigharaṃ bimbisāranivesanaṃ sakagharasaññāya
atk-s0501a:954_4: udarato uṭṭhāya mukhato viniccharantāya aggijālāya pariḍayhamānasarīre, appekacce
atk-s0501a:954_5: sūcichiddāṇumattakaṇṭhabilatāya pabbatākārakucchitāya ca laddhampi pānabhojanaṃ yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:954_6: bhuñjituṃ asamatthatāya khuppipāsāparete aññaṃ rasamavindamāne, appekacce aññamaññassa
atk-s0501a:954_7: aññesaṃ vā sattānaṃ pabhinnagaṇḍapiḷakamukhā paggharitarudhirapubbalasikādiṃ laddhā
atk-s0501a:954_8: amatamiva sāyamāne ativiya duddasikavirūpabhayānakasarīre bahū pete rañño nidassento –
atk-s0501a:957: Vatvā puna tehi katassa kammassa dāruṇabhāvaṃ dassento “pahūte annapānamhī”ti dutiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:958_0: Tattha pahūteti anappake bahumhi, yāvadatthiketi vuttaṃ hoti. Bha-kārassa hi ha-kāro
atk-s0501a:958_1: labbhati “pahu santo na bharatī”tiādīsu viya. Keci pana “bahūte” iti ca “bahūke”
atk-s0501a:958_2: iti ca paṭhanti. Pamādapāṭhā ete. Anne ca pānamhi ca annapānamhi. Khajje ca bhojje
atk-s0501a:958_3: ca khajjabhojje, etena asitapītakhāyitasāyitavasena catubbidhaṃ āhāraṃ dasseti. Upaṭṭhiteti
atk-s0501a:958_4: upagamma ṭhite, sajjite paṭiyatte samohiteti vuttaṃ hoti. Na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānanti
atk-s0501a:958_5: tesaṃ pettivisaye uppannānaṃ sattānaṃ koci mātā vā pitā vā putto vā na sarati. Kiṃ
atk-s0501a:958_6: kāraṇā? Kammapaccayā, attanā katassa adānadānappaṭisedhanādibhedassa kadariyakammassa
atk-s0501a:958_7: paccayā. Tañhi tesaṃ kammaṃ ñātīnaṃ sarituṃ na deti.
atk-s0501a:960_0: 3. Evaṃ bhagavā anappakepi annapānādimhi paccupaṭṭhite “api nāma amhe uddissa kiñci
atk-s0501a:960_1: dadeyyu”nti ñātī paccāsīsantānaṃ vicarataṃ tesaṃ petānaṃ tehi katassa atikaṭukavipākakarassa
atk-s0501a:960_2: kammassa paccayena kassaci ñātino anussaraṇamattābhāvaṃ dassento –
atk-s0501a:962: Na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammapaccayā”ti. –
atk-s0501a:963: Vatvā puna rañño pettivisayūpapanne ñātake uddissa dinnaṃ dānaṃ pasaṃsanto “evaṃ dadanti ñātīna”nti tatiyagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:964_0: Tattha evanti upamāvacanaṃ. Tassa dvidhā sambandho – tesaṃ sattānaṃ kammapaccayā
atk-s0501a:964_1: asarantepi kismiñci dadanti, ñātīnaṃ, ye evaṃ anukampakā hontīti ca yathā tayā, mahārāja,
atk-s0501a:964_2: dinnaṃ, evaṃ suciṃ paṇītaṃ kālena kappiyaṃ pānabhojanaṃ dadanti ñātīnaṃ, ye honti
atk-s0501a:964_3: anukampakāti ca. Dadantīti denti uddisanti niyyātenti. Ñātīnanti mātito ca pitito
atk-s0501a:964_4: ca sambandhānaṃ. Yeti ye keci puttā vā dhītaro vā bhātaro vā hontīti bhavanti. Anukampakāti
atk-s0501a:964_5: atthakāmā hitesino. Sucinti vimalaṃ dassaneyyaṃ manoramaṃ dhammikaṃ dhammaladdhaṃ.
atk-s0501a:964_6: Paṇītanti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. Kālenāti ñātipetānaṃ tirokuṭṭādīsu āgantvā ṭhitakālena.
atk-s0501a:964_7: Kappiyanti anucchavikaṃ patirūpaṃ ariyānaṃ paribhogārahaṃ. Pānabhojananti pānañca
atk-s0501a:964_8: bhojanañca. Idha pānabhojanamukhena sabbopi deyyadhammo adhippeto.
atk-s0501a:966: 4. Evaṃ bhagavā raññā māgadhena petabhūtānaṃ ñātīnaṃ anukampāya dinnaṃ pānabhojanaṃ pasaṃsanto –
atk-s0501a:969: Vatvā puna yena pakārena dinnaṃ tesaṃ hoti, taṃ dassento “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotū”ti catutthagāthāya pubbaddhamāha taṃ tatiyagāthāya pubbaddhena sambandhitabbaṃ –
atk-s0501a:971: Idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo”ti.
atk-s0501a:972: Tena “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotūti evaṃ dadanti, no aññathā”ti ettha ākāratthena evaṃsaddena dātabbākāranidassanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:973_0: Tattha idanti deyyadhammanidassanaṃ. Voti “kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”ti
atk-s0501a:973_1: ca, “yehi vo ariyā”ti ca evamādīsu viya kevalaṃ nipātamattaṃ, na sāmivacanaṃ. Ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:973_2: hotūti pettivisaye uppannānaṃ ñātakānaṃ hotu. Sukhitā hontu ñātayoti te pettivisayūpapannā
atk-s0501a:975_0: 4-5. Evaṃ bhagavā yena pakārena pettivisayūpapannānaṃ ñātīnaṃ dātabbaṃ, taṃ dassento
atk-s0501a:975_1: “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ hotu, sukhitā hontu ñātayo”ti vatvā puna yasmā “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:975_2: hotū”ti vuttepi na aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññassa phaladaṃ hoti, kevalantu tathā uddissa
atk-s0501a:975_3: diyyamānaṃ taṃ vatthu ñātīnaṃ kusalakammassa paccayo hoti. Tasmā yathā tesaṃ tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0501a:975_4: vatthusmiṃ taṅkhaṇe phalanibbattakaṃ kusalakammaṃ hoti, taṃ dassento “te ca tatthā”ti
atk-s0501a:975_5: catutthagāthāya pacchimaddhaṃ “pahūte annapānamhī”ti pañcamagāthāya pubbaddhañca āha.
atk-s0501a:976_0: Tesaṃ attho – te ñātipetā yattha taṃ dānaṃ dīyati, tattha samantato āgantvā samāgantvā,
atk-s0501a:976_1: samodhāya vā ekajjhaṃ hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti, sammā āgatā samāgatā “ime no ñātayo amhākaṃ
atk-s0501a:976_2: atthāya dānaṃ uddisissantī”ti etadatthaṃ sammā āgatā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Pahūte
atk-s0501a:976_3: annapānamhīti tasmiṃ attano uddissamāne pahūte annapānamhi. Sakkaccaṃ anumodareti
atk-s0501a:976_4: abhisaddahantā kammaphalaṃ avijahantā cittīkāraṃ avikkhittacittā hutvā “idaṃ no dānaṃ
atk-s0501a:976_5: hitāya sukhāya hotū”ti modanti anumodanti, pītisomanassajātā hontīti.
atk-s0501a:978: 5-6. Evaṃ bhagavā yathā pettivisayūpapannānaṃ taṅkhaṇe phalanibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ hoti, taṃ dassento –
atk-s0501a:981_0: Vatvā puna ñātake nissāya nibbattakusalakammaphalaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ tesaṃ ñātī ārabbha
atk-s0501a:981_1: thomanākāraṃ dassento “ciraṃ jīvantū”ti pañcamagāthāya pacchimaddhaṃ “amhākañca katā
atk-s0501a:982_0: Tesaṃ attho – ciraṃ jīvantūti cirajīvino dīghāyukā hontu. No ñātīti amhākaṃ ñātakā.
atk-s0501a:982_1: Yesaṃ hetūti ye nissāya yesaṃ kāraṇā. Labhāmaseti labhāma. Attanā taṅkhaṇaṃ paṭiladdhasampattiṃ
atk-s0501a:982_2: apadisantā bhaṇanti. Petānañhi attano anumodanena, dāyakānaṃ uddesena, dakkhiṇeyyasampadāya
atk-s0501a:982_3: cāti tīhi aṅgehi dakkhiṇā samijjhati, taṅkhaṇe phalanibbattikā hoti. Tattha dāyakā
atk-s0501a:982_4: visesahetu. Tenāhaṃsu “yesaṃ hetu labhāmase”ti. Amhākañca katā pūjāti “idaṃ vo ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:982_5: hotū”ti evaṃ imaṃ dānaṃ uddisantehi amhākañca pūjā katā. Dāyakā ca anipphalāti yamhi
atk-s0501a:982_6: santāne pariccāgamayaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, tassa tattheva phaladānato dāyakā ca anipphalāti.
atk-s0501a:983_0: Etthāha – “kiṃ pana pettivisayūpapannā eva ñātayo labhanti, udāhu aññepi labhantī”ti?
atk-s0501a:983_1: Vuccate – bhagavatā evetaṃ byākataṃ jāṇussoṇinā brāhmaṇena puṭṭhena, kimettha amhehi
atk-s0501a:984_0: “Mayamassu, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā nāma dānāni dema, saddhāni karoma ‘idaṃ dānaṃ petānaṃ
atk-s0501a:984_1: ñātisālohitānaṃ upakappatu, idaṃ dānaṃ petā ñātisālohitā paribhuñjantū’ti, kacci
atk-s0501a:984_2: taṃ, bho gotama, dānaṃ petānaṃ ñātisālohitānaṃ upakappati, kacci te petā ñātisālohitā
atk-s0501a:984_3: taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjantīti. Ṭhāne kho, brāhmaṇa, upakappati, no aṭṭhāneti.
atk-s0501a:985_0: “Katamaṃ pana taṃ, bho gotama, ṭhānaṃ, katamaṃ aṭṭhānanti? Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco
atk-s0501a:985_1: pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nirayaṃ upapajjati.
atk-s0501a:985_2: Yo nerayikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ
atk-s0501a:985_3: kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0501a:986_0: “Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, so kāyassa
atk-s0501a:986_1: bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjati. Yo tiracchānayonikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro,
atk-s0501a:986_2: tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ, yattha
atk-s0501a:987_0: “Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti…pe… sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, so
atk-s0501a:987_1: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati…pe… devānaṃ sahabyataṃ
atk-s0501a:987_2: upapajjati. Yo devānaṃ āhāro, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idampi
atk-s0501a:987_3: kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ na upakappati.
atk-s0501a:988_0: “Idha pana, brāhmaṇa, ekacco pāṇātipātī hoti…pe… micchādiṭṭhiko hoti, so kāyassa
atk-s0501a:988_1: bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisayaṃ upapajjati. Yo pettivesayikānaṃ sattānaṃ āhāro, tena
atk-s0501a:988_2: so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Yaṃ vā panassa ito anupavecchanti mittāmaccā
atk-s0501a:988_3: vā ñātisālohitā vā, tena so tattha yāpeti, tena so tattha tiṭṭhati. Idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0501a:988_4: ṭhānaṃ, yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ upakappatīti.
atk-s0501a:989_0: “Sace pana, bho gotama, so peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti, ko taṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0501a:989_1: paribhuñjatīti? Aññepissa, brāhmaṇa, petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ upapannā honti,
atk-s0501a:990_0: “Sace pana, bho gotama, so ceva peto ñātisālohito taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapanno hoti, aññepissa
atk-s0501a:990_1: petā ñātisālohitā taṃ ṭhānaṃ anupapannā honti, ko taṃ dānaṃ paribhuñjatīti? Aṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:990_2: kho etaṃ brāhmaṇa anavakāso, yaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vivittaṃ assa iminā dīghena addhunā yadidaṃ
atk-s0501a:990_3: petehi ñātisālohitehi. Apica brāhmaṇa dāyakopi anipphalo”ti.
atk-s0501a:992: 6-7. Evaṃ bhagavā rañño māgadhassa pettivisayūpapannānaṃ pubbañātīnaṃ sampattiṃ nissāya thomento “ete te, mahārāja, ñātī imāya dānasampadāya attamanā evaṃ thomentī”ti dassento –
atk-s0501a:993: “Ciraṃ jīvantu no ñātī, yesaṃ hetu labhāmase;
atk-s0501a:994: Amhākañca katā pūjā, dāyakā ca anipphalā”ti. –
atk-s0501a:995_0: Vatvā puna tesaṃ pettivisayūpapannānaṃ aññassa kasigorakkhādino sampattipaṭilābhakāraṇassa
atk-s0501a:995_1: abhāvaṃ ito dinnena yāpanabhāvañca dassento “na hi tattha kasī atthī”ti chaṭṭhagāthāya
atk-s0501a:996_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā – na hi, mahārāja, tattha pettivisaye kasi atthi, yaṃ nissāya
atk-s0501a:996_1: te petā sampattiṃ paṭilabheyyuṃ. Gorakkhettha na vijjatīti na kevalaṃ kasi eva, gorakkhāpi
atk-s0501a:996_2: ettha pettivisaye na vijjati, yaṃ nissāya te sampattiṃ paṭilabheyyuṃ. Vaṇijjā tādisī
atk-s0501a:996_3: natthīti vāṇijjāpi tādisī natthi, yā tesaṃ sampattipaṭilābhahetu bhaveyya. Hiraññena
atk-s0501a:996_4: kayākayanti hiraññena kayavikkayampi tattha tādisaṃ natthi, yaṃ tesaṃ sampattipaṭilābhahetu
atk-s0501a:996_5: bhaveyya. Ito dinnena yāpenti, petā kālagatā tahinti kevalaṃ pana ito ñātīhi vā mittāmaccehi
atk-s0501a:996_6: vā dinnena yāpenti, attabhāvaṃ gamenti. Petāti pettivisayūpapannā sattā. Kālagatāti
atk-s0501a:996_7: attano maraṇakālena gatā, “kālakatā”ti vā pāṭho, katakālā katamaraṇāti attho. Tahinti tasmiṃ pettivisaye.
atk-s0501a:998: 8-9. Evaṃ “ito dinnena yāpenti, petā kālagatā tahi”nti vatvā idāni upamāhi tamatthaṃ pakāsento “unname udakaṃ vuṭṭha”nti idaṃ gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0501a:999_0: Tassattho – yathā unnate thale ussāde bhūmibhāge meghehi abhivuṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ ninnaṃ
atk-s0501a:999_1: pavattati, yo yo bhūmibhāgo ninno oṇato, taṃ taṃ pavattati gacchati pāpuṇāti, evameva
atk-s0501a:999_2: ito dinnaṃ dānaṃ petānaṃ upakappati nibbattati, pātubhavatīti attho. Ninnamiva hi
atk-s0501a:999_3: udakappavattiyā ṭhānaṃ petaloko dānupakappanāya. Yathāha – “idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:999_4: yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ upakappatī”ti. Yathā ca kandarapadarasākhāpasākhakusobbhamahāsobbhasannipātehi
atk-s0501a:999_5: vārivahā mahānajjo pūrā hutvā sāgaraṃ paripūrenti, evampi ito dinnadānaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva
atk-s0501a:1001_0: 10. Evaṃ bhagavā “ito dinnena yāpenti, petā kālagatā tahi”nti imaṃ atthaṃ upamāhi
atk-s0501a:1001_1: pakāsetvā puna yasmā te petā “ito kiñci lacchāmā”ti āsābhibhūtā ñātigharaṃ āgantvāpi
atk-s0501a:1001_2: “idaṃ nāma no dethā”ti yācituṃ asamatthā, tasmā tesaṃ imāni anussaraṇavatthūni anussaranto
atk-s0501a:1001_3: kulaputto dakkhiṇaṃ dajjāti dassento “adāsi me”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1002_0: Tassattho – “idaṃ nāma me dhanaṃ vā dhaññaṃ vā adāsī”ti ca, “idaṃ nāma me kiccaṃ
atk-s0501a:1002_1: attanā uyyogamāpajjanto akāsī”ti ca, “amu me mātito vā pitito vā sambandhattā ñātī”ti
atk-s0501a:1002_2: ca sinehavasena tāṇasamatthatāya “mittā”ti ca, “asuko me saha paṃsukīḷako sakhā”ti
atk-s0501a:1002_3: ca evaṃ sabbamanussaranto petānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dajjā, dānaṃ niyyāteyyāti. Aparo pāṭho
atk-s0501a:1002_4: “petānaṃ dakkhiṇā dajjā”ti. Tassattho – dātabbāti dajjā. Kā sā? Petānaṃ dakkhiṇā,
atk-s0501a:1002_5: teneva “adāsi me”tiādinā nayena pubbe katamanussaraṃ anussaratāti vuttaṃ hoti. Karaṇavacanappasaṅge
atk-s0501a:1004: 11. Evaṃ bhagavā petānaṃ dakkhiṇāniyyātane kāraṇabhūtāni anussaraṇavatthūni dassento –
atk-s0501a:1005: “Adāsi me akāsi me, ñātimittā sakhā ca me;
atk-s0501a:1007_0: Vatvā puna ye ñātimaraṇena ruṇṇasokādiparā eva hutvā tiṭṭhanti, na tesaṃ atthāya
atk-s0501a:1007_1: kiñci denti, tesaṃ taṃ ruṇṇasokādi kevalaṃ attaparitāpanameva hoti, na petānaṃ kiñci
atk-s0501a:1007_2: atthaṃ nipphādetīti dassento “na hi ruṇṇaṃ vā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1008_0: Tattha ruṇṇanti rodanā roditattaṃ assupātanaṃ, etena kāyaparissamaṃ dasseti. Sokoti
atk-s0501a:1008_1: socanā socitattaṃ, etena cittaparissamaṃ dasseti. Yā caññāti yā ca ruṇṇasokehi aññā.
atk-s0501a:1008_2: Paridevanāti ñātibyasanena phuṭṭhassa lālappanā, “kahaṃ ekaputtaka piya manāpā”ti
atk-s0501a:1008_3: evamādinā nayena guṇasaṃvaṇṇanā, etena vacīparissamaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1010_0: 12. Evaṃ bhagavā “ruṇṇaṃ vā soko vā yā caññā paridevanā, sabbampi taṃ petānaṃ atthāya
atk-s0501a:1010_1: na hoti, kevalantu attānaṃ paritāpanamattameva, evaṃ tiṭṭhanti ñātayo”ti ruṇṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:1010_2: niratthakabhāvaṃ dassetvā puna māgadharājena yā dakkhiṇā dinnā, tassā sātthakabhāvaṃ
atk-s0501a:1011_0: Tassattho – ayañca kho, mahārāja, dakkhiṇā tayā ajja attano ñātigaṇaṃ uddissa dinnā,
atk-s0501a:1011_1: sā yasmā saṅgho anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa, tasmā saṅghamhi suppatiṭṭhitā assa
atk-s0501a:1011_2: petajanassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya upakappati sampajjati phalatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Upakappatīti
