atk-s0501a:1011_3: ca ṭhānaso upakappati, taṃkhaṇaṃyeva upakappati, na cirena. Yathā hi taṃkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0501a:1011_4: paṭibhantaṃ “ṭhānasovetaṃ tathāgataṃ paṭibhātī”ti vuccati, evamidhāpi taṃkhaṇaṃyeva
atk-s0501a:1011_5: upakappantā “ṭhānaso upakappatī”ti vuttā. Yaṃ vā taṃ “idaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1011_6: yattha ṭhitassa taṃ dānaṃ upakappatī”ti vuttaṃ, tattha khuppipāsikavantāsaparadattūpajīvinijjhāmataṇhikādibhedabhinne
atk-s0501a:1011_7: ṭhāne upakappatīti vuttaṃ yathā kahāpaṇaṃ dento “kahāpaṇaso detī”ti loke vuccati.
atk-s0501a:1011_8: Imasmiñca atthavikappe upakappatīti pātubhavati, nibbattatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1013: 13. Evaṃ bhagavā raññā dinnāya dakkhiṇāya sātthakabhāvaṃ dassento –
atk-s0501a:1016_0: Vatvā puna yasmā imaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dentena ñātīnaṃ ñātīhi kattabbakiccakaraṇavasena
atk-s0501a:1016_1: ñātidhammo nidassito, bahujanassa pākaṭīkato, nidassanaṃ vā kato, tumhehipi ñātīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:1016_2: evameva ñātīhi kattabbakiccakaraṇavasena ñātidhammo paripūretabbo, na niratthakehi
atk-s0501a:1016_3: ruṇṇādīhi attā paritāpetabboti ca pete dibbasampattiṃ adhigamentena petānaṃ pūjā
atk-s0501a:1016_4: katā uḷārā, buddhappamukhañca bhikkhusaṅghaṃ annapānādīhi santappentena bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0501a:1016_5: balaṃ anupadinnaṃ, anukampādiguṇaparivārañca cāgacetanaṃ nibbattentena anappakaṃ
atk-s0501a:1016_6: puññaṃ pasutaṃ, tasmā bhagavā imehi yathābhuccaguṇehi rājānaṃ sampahaṃsento –
atk-s0501a:1022_0: Atha vā “so ñātidhammo ca ayaṃ nidassito”ti iminā gāthāpadena bhagavā rājānaṃ dhammiyā
atk-s0501a:1022_1: kathāya sandasseti. Ñātidhammanidassanameva hi ettha sandassanaṃ petāna pūjā ca katā
atk-s0501a:1022_2: uḷārāti iminā samādapeti. Uḷārāti pasaṃsanameva hi ettha punappunaṃ pūjākaraṇe samādapanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1022_3: Balañca bhikkhūnamanuppadinnanti iminā samuttejeti. Balānuppadānameva hi ettha evaṃ
atk-s0501a:1022_4: dānaṃ, balānuppadānatāti tassa ussāhavaḍḍhanena samuttejanaṃ. Tumhehi puññaṃ pasutaṃ
atk-s0501a:1022_5: anappakanti iminā sampahaṃseti. Puññappasutakittanameva hi ettha tassa yathābhuccaguṇasaṃvaṇṇanabhāvena
atk-s0501a:1023_0: Desanāpariyosāne ca pettivisayūpapattiādīnavasaṃvaṇṇanena saṃviggānaṃ yoniso padahataṃ
atk-s0501a:1023_1: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Dutiyadivasepi bhagavā devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1023_2: idameva tirokuṭṭaṃ desesi, evaṃ yāva sattamadivasā tādiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0501a:1028: Idāni yadidaṃ tirokuṭṭānantaraṃ “nidhiṃ nidheti puriso”tiādinā nidhikaṇḍaṃ nikkhittaṃ, tassa –
atk-s0501a:1031_0: Tattha idha nikkhepakāraṇaṃ tāvassa evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Idañhi nidhikaṇḍaṃ bhagavatā
atk-s0501a:1031_1: iminā anukkamena avuttampi yasmā anumodanavasena vuttassa tirokuṭṭassa mithunabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1031_2: tasmā idha nikkhittaṃ. Tirokuṭṭena vā puññavirahitānaṃ vipattiṃ dassetvā iminā katapuññānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1031_3: sampattidassanatthampi idaṃ idha nikkhittanti veditabbaṃ. Idamassa idha nikkhepakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1033_0: Aṭṭhuppatti panassa – sāvatthiyaṃ kira aññataro kuṭumbiko aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo.
atk-s0501a:1033_1: So ca saddho hoti pasanno, vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati. So ekasmiṃ
atk-s0501a:1033_2: divase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ deti. Tena ca samayena rājā dhanatthiko
atk-s0501a:1033_3: hoti, so tassa santike purisaṃ pesesi “gaccha, bhaṇe, itthannāmaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ānehī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1033_4: So gantvā taṃ kuṭumbikaṃ āha “rājā taṃ gahapati āmantetī”ti. Kuṭumbiko saddhādiguṇasamannāgatena
atk-s0501a:1033_5: cetasā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisanto āha “gaccha, bho purisa, pacchā
atk-s0501a:1033_6: āgamissāmi, idāni tāvamhi nidhiṃ nidhento ṭhito”ti. Atha bhagavā bhuttāvī pavārito
atk-s0501a:1033_7: tameva puññasampadaṃ paramatthato nidhīti dassetuṃ tassa kuṭumbikassa anumodanatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:1033_8: “nidhiṃ nidheti puriso”ti imā gāthāyo abhāsi. Ayamassa aṭṭhuppatti.
atk-s0501a:1038_0: 1. Tattha nidhiṃ nidheti purisoti nidhīyatīti nidhi, ṭhapīyati rakkhīyati gopīyatīti
atk-s0501a:1038_1: attho. So catubbidho thāvaro, jaṅgamo, aṅgasamo, anugāmikoti. Tattha thāvaro nāma
atk-s0501a:1038_2: bhūmigataṃ vā vehāsaṭṭhaṃ vā hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā khettaṃ vā vatthu vā, yaṃ vā
atk-s0501a:1038_3: panaññampi evarūpaṃ iriyāpathavirahitaṃ, ayaṃ thāvaro nidhi. Jaṅgamo nāma dāsidāsaṃ
atk-s0501a:1038_4: hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ ajeḷakaṃ kukkuṭasūkaraṃ yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ iriyāpathapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1038_5: Ayaṃ jaṅgamo nidhi aṅgasamo nāma kammāyatanaṃ, sippāyatanaṃ, vijjāṭṭhānaṃ, bāhusaccaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1038_6: yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ sikkhitvā gahitaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgamiva attabhāvappaṭibaddhaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1038_7: ayaṃ aṅgasamo nidhi. Anugāmiko nāma dānamayaṃ puññaṃ sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ dhammassavanamayaṃ
atk-s0501a:1038_8: dhammadesanāmayaṃ, yaṃ vā panaññampi evarūpaṃ puññaṃ tattha tattha anugantvā viya
atk-s0501a:1038_9: iṭṭhaphalamanuppadeti, ayaṃ anugāmiko nidhi. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne thāvaro adhippeto.
atk-s0501a:1039_0: Nidhetīti ṭhapeti paṭisāmeti gopeti. Purisoti manusso. Kāmañca purisopi itthīpi paṇḍakopi
atk-s0501a:1039_1: nidhiṃ nidheti, idha pana purisasīsena desanā katā, atthato pana tesampi idha samodhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1039_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Gambhīre odakantiketi ogāhetabbaṭṭhena gambhīraṃ, udakassa antikabhāvena
atk-s0501a:1039_3: odakantikaṃ. Atthi gambhīraṃ na odakantikaṃ jaṅgale bhūmibhāge satikaporiso āvāṭo
atk-s0501a:1039_4: viya, atthi odakantikaṃ na gambhīraṃ ninne pallale ekadvividatthiko āvāṭo viya, atthi
atk-s0501a:1039_5: gambhīrañceva odakantikañca jaṅgale bhūmibhāge yāva idāni udakaṃ āgamissatīti, tāva
atk-s0501a:1039_6: khato āvāṭo viya. Taṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “gambhīre odakantike”ti. Atthe kicce samuppanneti
atk-s0501a:1039_7: atthā anapetanti atthaṃ, atthāvahaṃ hitāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti. Kātabbanti kiccaṃ, kiñcideva
atk-s0501a:1039_8: karaṇīyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Uppannaṃ eva samuppannaṃ, kattabbabhāvena upaṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ
atk-s0501a:1039_9: hoti. Tasmiṃ atthe kicce samuppanne. Atthāya me bhavissatīti nidhānappayojananidassanametaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1039_10: Etadatthañhi so nidheti “atthāvahe kismiñcideva karaṇīye samuppanne atthāya me bhavissati,
atk-s0501a:1039_11: tassa me kiccassa nipphattiyā bhavissatī”ti. Kiccanipphattiyeva hi tassa kicce samuppanne atthoti veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:1041: Evaṃ nidhānappayojanaṃ dassento atthādhigamādhippāyaṃ dassetvā idāni anatthāpagamādhippāyaṃ dassetumāha –
atk-s0501a:1043: Iṇassa vā pamokkhāya, dubbhikkhe āpadāsu vā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1044: Tassattho “atthāya me bhavissatī”ti ca “iṇassa vā pamokkhāyā”ti ca ettha vuttehi dvīhi bhavissatipamokkhāya-padehi saddhiṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā veditabbo.
atk-s0501a:1045_0: Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – na kevalaṃ atthāya me bhavissatīti eva puriso nidhiṃ nidheti,
atk-s0501a:1045_1: kintu “ayaṃ coro”ti vā “pāradāriko”ti vā “suṅkaghātako”ti vā evamādinā nayena paccatthikehi
atk-s0501a:1045_2: paccāmittehi duruttassa me sato rājato vā pamokkhāya bhavissati, sandhicchedādīhi
atk-s0501a:1045_3: dhanaharaṇena vā, “ettakaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ dehī”ti jīvaggāhena vā corehi me pīḷitassa
atk-s0501a:1045_4: sato corato vā pamokkhāya bhavissati. Santi me iṇāyikā, te maṃ “iṇaṃ dehī”ti codessanti,
atk-s0501a:1045_5: tehi me codiyamānassa iṇassa vā pamokkhāya bhavissati. Hoti so samayo, yaṃ dubbhikkhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1045_6: hoti dussassaṃ dullabhapiṇḍaṃ, tattha na sukaraṃ appadhanena yāpetuṃ, tathāvidhe
atk-s0501a:1045_7: āgate dubbhikkhe vā me bhavissati. Yathārūpā āpadā uppajjanti aggito vā udakato vā
atk-s0501a:1045_8: appiyadāyādato vā, tathārūpāsu vā uppannāsu āpadāsu me bhavissatītipi puriso nidhiṃ nidhetīti.
atk-s0501a:1046: Evaṃ atthādhigamādhippāyaṃ anatthāpagamādhippāyañcāti dvīhi gāthāhi duvidhaṃ nidhānappayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva duvidhaṃ payojanaṃ nigamento āha –
atk-s0501a:1048_0: Tassattho – yvāyaṃ “atthāya me bhavissatī”ti ca “rājato vā duruttassā”ti evamādīhi
atk-s0501a:1048_1: ca atthādhigamo anatthāpagamo ca dassito. Etadatthāya etesaṃ nipphādanatthāya imasmiṃ
atk-s0501a:1048_2: okāsaloke yo koci hiraññasuvaṇṇādibhedo nidhi nāma nidhīyati ṭhapīyati paṭisāmīyatīti.
atk-s0501a:1050: Idāni yasmā evaṃ nihitopi so nidhi puññavataṃyeva adhippetatthasādhako hoti, na aññesaṃ, tasmā tamatthaṃ dīpento āha –
atk-s0501a:1052: Na sabbo sabbadā eva, tassa taṃ upakappatī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1053_0: Tassattho – so nidhi tāva sunihito santo, tāva suṭṭhu nikhaṇitvā ṭhapito samānoti
atk-s0501a:1053_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Kīva suṭṭhūti? Gambhīre odakantike, yāva gambhīre odakantike nihitoti
atk-s0501a:1053_2: saṅkhaṃ gacchati, tāva suṭṭhūti vuttaṃ hoti. Na sabbo sabbadā eva, tassa taṃ upakappatīti
atk-s0501a:1053_3: yena purisena nihito, tassa sabbopi sabbakālaṃ na upakappati na sampajjati, yathāvuttakiccakaraṇasamattho
atk-s0501a:1053_4: na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Kintu kocideva kadācideva upakappati, neva vā upakappatīti.
atk-s0501a:1053_5: Ettha ca nti padapūraṇamatte nipāto daṭṭhabbo “yathā taṃ appamattassa ātāpino”ti
atk-s0501a:1053_6: evamādīsu viya. Liṅgabhedaṃ vā katvā “so”ti vattabbe “ta”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ hi vuccamāne
atk-s0501a:1055: Evaṃ “na sabbo sabbadā eva, tassa taṃ upakappatī”ti vatvā idāni yehi kāraṇehi na upakappati, tāni dassento āha –
atk-s0501a:1056: 4. “Nidhi vā ṭhānā cavati, saññā vāssa vimuyhati.
atk-s0501a:1057: Nāgā vā apanāmenti, yasmā vāpi haranti naṃ.
atk-s0501a:1059_0: Tassattho – yasmiṃ ṭhāne sunihito hoti nidhi, so vā nidhi tamhā ṭhānā cavati apeti
atk-s0501a:1059_1: vigacchati, acetanopi samāno puññakkhayavasena aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati. Saññā vā assa
atk-s0501a:1059_2: vimuyhati, yasmiṃ ṭhāne nihito nidhi, taṃ na jānāti, assa puññakkhayacoditā nāgā
atk-s0501a:1059_3: vā taṃ nidhiṃ apanāmenti aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gamenti. Yakkhā vāpi haranti yenicchakaṃ ādāya
atk-s0501a:1059_4: gacchanti. Apassato vā assa appiyā vā dāyādā bhūmiṃ khaṇitvā taṃ nidhiṃ uddharanti.
atk-s0501a:1059_5: Evamassa etehi ṭhānā cavanādīhi kāraṇehi so nidhi na upakappatīti.
atk-s0501a:1060: Evaṃ ṭhānā cavanādīni lokasammatāni anupakappanakāraṇāni vatvā idāni yaṃ taṃ etesampi kāraṇānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ ekaññeva puññakkhayasaññitaṃ kāraṇaṃ, taṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0501a:1062_0: Tassattho – yasmiṃ samaye bhogasampattinipphādakassa puññassa khayo hoti, bhogapārijuññasaṃvattanikamapuññamokāsaṃ
atk-s0501a:1062_1: katvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, atha yaṃ nidhiṃ nidhentena nihitaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādidhanajātaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1064_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tena tena adhippāyena nihitampi yathādhippāyaṃ anupakappantaṃ nānappakārehi
atk-s0501a:1064_1: nassanadhammaṃ lokasammataṃ nidhiṃ vatvā idāni yaṃ puññasampadaṃ paramatthato nidhīti
atk-s0501a:1064_2: dassetuṃ tassa kuṭumbikassa anumodanatthamidaṃ nidhikaṇḍamāraddhaṃ, taṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0501a:1066: Nidhī sunihito hoti, itthiyā purisassa vā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1067_0: Tattha dānanti “dānañca dhammacariyā cā”ti ettha vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ. Sīlanti
atk-s0501a:1067_1: kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo. Pañcaṅgadasaṅgapātimokkhasaṃvarādi vā sabbampi sīlaṃ idha
atk-s0501a:1067_2: sīlanti adhippetaṃ. Saṃyamoti saṃyamanaṃ saṃyamo, cetaso nānārammaṇagatinivāraṇanti
atk-s0501a:1067_3: vuttaṃ hoti, samādhissetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yena saṃyamena samannāgato “hatthasaṃyato,
atk-s0501a:1067_4: pādasaṃyato, vācāsaṃyato, saṃyatuttamo”ti ettha saṃyatuttamoti vutto. Apare āhu “saṃyamanaṃ
atk-s0501a:1067_5: saṃyamo, saṃvaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti, indriyasaṃvarassetaṃ adhivacana”nti. Damoti damanaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1067_6: kilesūpasamananti vuttaṃ hoti, paññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paññā hi katthaci paññātveva
atk-s0501a:1067_7: vuccati “sussūsā labhate pañña”nti evamādīsu. Katthaci dhammoti “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti
atk-s0501a:1067_8: cāgo”ti evamādīsu. Katthaci damoti “yadi saccā damā cāgā, khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatī”tiādīsu.
atk-s0501a:1068_0: Evaṃ dānādīni ñatvā idāni evaṃ imissā gāthāya sampiṇḍetvā attho veditabbo – yassa
atk-s0501a:1068_1: itthiyā vā purisassa vā dānena sīlena saṃyamena damena cāti imehi catūhi dhammehi
atk-s0501a:1068_2: yathā hiraññena suvaṇṇena muttāya maṇinā vā dhanamayo nidhi tesaṃ suvaṇṇādīnaṃ ekattha
atk-s0501a:1068_3: pakkhipanena nidhīyati, evaṃ puññamayo nidhi tesaṃ dānādīnaṃ ekacittasantāne cetiyādimhi
atk-s0501a:1068_4: vā vatthumhi suṭṭhu karaṇena sunihito hotīti.
atk-s0501a:1070: Evaṃ bhagavā “yassa dānenā”ti imāya gāthāya puññasampadāya paramatthato nidhibhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni yattha nihito, so nidhi sunihito hoti, taṃ vatthuṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0501a:1071: 7. “Cetiyamhi ca saṅghe vā, puggale atithīsu vā.
atk-s0501a:1072: Mātari pitari cāpi, atho jeṭṭhamhi bhātarī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1073_0: Tattha cayitabbanti cetiyaṃ, pūjetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti, citattā vā cetiyaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ
atk-s0501a:1073_1: cetiyaṃ tividhaṃ hoti paribhogacetiyaṃ, uddissakacetiyaṃ, dhātukacetiyanti. Tattha
atk-s0501a:1073_2: bodhirukkho paribhogacetiyaṃ, buddhapaṭimā uddissakacetiyaṃ, dhātugabbhathūpā sadhātukā
atk-s0501a:1073_3: dhātukacetiyaṃ. Saṅghoti buddhappamukhādīsu yo koci. Puggaloti gahaṭṭhapabbajitesu
atk-s0501a:1073_4: yo koci. Natthi assa tithi, yamhi vā tamhi divase āgacchatīti atithi. Taṅkhaṇe āgatapāhunakassetaṃ
atk-s0501a:1074_0: Evaṃ cetiyādīni ñatvā idāni evaṃ imissā gāthāya sampiṇḍetvā attho veditabbo – yo
atk-s0501a:1074_1: so nidhi “sunihito hotī”ti vutto, so imesu vatthūsu sunihito hoti. Kasmā? Dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0501a:1074_2: iṭṭhaphalānuppadānasamatthatāya. Tathā hi appakampi cetiyamhi datvā dīgharattaṃ iṭṭhaphalalābhino honti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:1078_1: veditabbo. Yathā ca cetiyādīsu dānassa pavatti phalavibhūti ca dassitā, evaṃ yathāyogaṃ
atk-s0501a:1078_2: sabbattha taṃ taṃ ārabhitvā cārittavārittavasena sīlassa, buddhānussativasena saṃyamassa,
atk-s0501a:1080_0: Evaṃ bhagavā dānādīhi nidhīyamānassa puññamayanidhino cetiyādibhedaṃ vatthuṃ dassetvā
atk-s0501a:1080_1: idāni etesu vatthūsu sunihitassa tassa nidhino gambhīre odakantike nihitanidhito
atk-s0501a:1083_0: Tattha pubbapadena taṃ dānādīhi sunihitanidhiṃ niddisati “eso nidhi sunihito”ti.
atk-s0501a:1083_1: Ajeyyoti parehi jetvā gahetuṃ na sakkā, acceyyotipi pāṭho, tassa accitabbo accanāraho
atk-s0501a:1083_2: hitasukhatthikena upacitabboti attho. Etasmiñca pāṭhe eso nidhi acceyyoti sambandhitvā
atk-s0501a:1083_3: puna “kasmā”ti anuyogaṃ dassetvā “yasmā sunihito anugāmiko”ti sambandhitabbaṃ. Itarathā
atk-s0501a:1083_4: hi sunihitassa acceyyattaṃ vuttaṃ bhaveyya, na ca sunihito accanīyo. Accito eva hi
atk-s0501a:1083_5: soti. Anugacchatīti anugāmiko, paralokaṃ gacchantampi tattha tattha phaladānena na vijahatīti attho.
atk-s0501a:1084_0: Pahāya gamanīyesu etaṃ ādāya gacchatīti maraṇakāle paccupaṭṭhite sabbabhogesu pahāya
atk-s0501a:1084_1: gamanīyesu etaṃ nidhiṃ ādāya paralokaṃ gacchatīti ayaṃ kira etassa attho. So pana
atk-s0501a:1084_2: na yujjati. Kasmā? Bhogānaṃ agamanīyato. Pahātabbā eva hi te te bhogā, na gamanīyā,
atk-s0501a:1084_3: gamanīyā pana te te gativisesā. Yato yadi esa attho siyā, pahāya bhoge gamanīyesu
atk-s0501a:1084_4: gativisesesu iti vadeyya. Tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo – “nidhi vā ṭhānā cavatī”ti
atk-s0501a:1084_5: evamādinā pakārena pahāya maccaṃ bhogesu gacchantesu etaṃ ādāya gacchatīti. Eso hi
atk-s0501a:1085_0: Tattha siyā “gamanīyesūti ettha gantabbesūti attho, na gacchantesū”ti. Taṃ na ekaṃsato
atk-s0501a:1085_1: gahetabbaṃ. Yathā hi “ariyā niyyānikā”ti ettha niyyantāti attho, na niyyātabbāti,
atk-s0501a:1086_0: Atha vā yasmā esa maraṇakāle kassaci dātukāmo bhoge āmasitumpi na labhati, tasmā
atk-s0501a:1086_1: tena te bhogā pubbaṃ kāyena pahātabbā, pacchā vihatāsena cetasā gantabbā, atikkamitabbāti
atk-s0501a:1086_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā pubbaṃ kāyena pahāya pacchā cetasā gamanīyesu bhogesūti evamettha
atk-s0501a:1086_3: attho daṭṭhabbo. Purimasmiṃ atthe niddhāraṇe bhummavacanaṃ, pahāya gamanīyesu bhogesu
atk-s0501a:1086_4: ekamevetaṃ puññanidhivibhavaṃ tato nīharitvā ādāya gacchatīti. Pacchime atthe bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe
atk-s0501a:1086_5: bhummavacanaṃ. Bhogānañhi gamanīyabhāvena etassa nidhissa ādāya gamanīyabhāvo lakkhīyatīti.
atk-s0501a:1088_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imassa puññanidhino gambhīre odakantike nihitanidhito visesaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0501a:1088_1: puna attano bhaṇḍaguṇasaṃvaṇṇanena kayajanassa ussāhaṃ janento uḷārabhaṇḍavāṇijo
atk-s0501a:1088_2: viya attanā desitapuññanidhiguṇasaṃvaṇṇanena tasmiṃ puññanidhimhi devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1090: Kayirātha dhīro puññāni, yo nidhi anugāmiko”ti.
atk-s0501a:1091_0: Tattha asādhāraṇamaññesanti asādhāraṇo aññesaṃ, makāro padasandhikaro “adukkhamasukhāya
atk-s0501a:1091_1: vedanāya sampayuttā”tiādīsu viya. Na corehi āharaṇo acorāharaṇo, corehi ādātabbo
atk-s0501a:1091_2: na hotīti attho. Nidhātabboti nidhi. Evaṃ dvīhi padehi puññanidhiguṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā
atk-s0501a:1091_3: tato dvīhi tattha ussāhaṃ janeti “kayirātha dhīro puññāni, yo nidhi anugāmiko”ti.
atk-s0501a:1091_4: Tassattho – yasmā puññāni nāma asādhāraṇo aññesaṃ, acorāharaṇo ca nidhi hoti. Na
atk-s0501a:1091_5: kevalañca asādhāraṇo acorāharaṇo ca nidhi, atha kho pana “eso nidhi sunihito, ajeyyo
atk-s0501a:1091_6: anugāmiko”ti ettha vutto yo nidhi anugāmiko. So ca yasmā puññāniyeva, tasmā kayirātha
atk-s0501a:1091_7: kareyya dhīro buddhisampanno dhitisampanno ca puggalo puññānīti.
atk-s0501a:1093: Evaṃ bhagavā guṇasaṃvaṇṇanena puññanidhimhi devamanussānaṃ ussāhaṃ janetvā idāni ye ussahitvā puññanidhikiriyāya sampādenti, tesaṃ so yaṃ phalaṃ deti, taṃ saṅkhepato dassento āha –
atk-s0501a:1096: Idāni yasmā patthanāya paṭibandhitassa sabbakāmadadattaṃ, na vinā patthanaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:1097_0: “Ākaṅkheyya ce gahapatayo dhammacārī samacārī ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā
atk-s0501a:1097_1: khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya’nti, ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ so
atk-s0501a:1097_2: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya. Taṃ kissa
atk-s0501a:1097_3: hetu? Tathā hi so dhammacārī samacārī”.
atk-s0501a:1098: Evaṃ “anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Tathā hi so dhammacārī samacārī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1100_0: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhāya samannāgato hoti, sīlena, sutena, cāgena, paññāya
atk-s0501a:1100_1: samannāgato hoti, tassa evaṃ hoti ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1100_2: sahabyataṃ upapajjeyya’nti. So taṃ cittaṃ padahati, taṃ cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, taṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0501a:1100_3: bhāveti. Tassa te saṅkhārā ca vihārā ca evaṃ bhāvitā evaṃ bahulīkatā tatrūpapattiyā
atk-s0501a:1101: Tasmā taṃ tathā tathā ākaṅkhapariyāyaṃ cittapadahanādhiṭṭhānabhāvanāparikkhāraṃ patthanaṃ tassa sabbakāmadadatte hetuṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0501a:1104: 11. Idāni yaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ etena labbhati, taṃ odhiso odhiso dassento “suvaṇṇatā susaratā”ti evamādigāthāyo āha.
atk-s0501a:1105: Tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva suvaṇṇatā nāma sundaracchavivaṇṇatā kañcanasannibhattacatā, sāpi etena puññanidhinā labbhati. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:1106_0: “Yampi, bhikkhave, tathāgato purimaṃ jātiṃ…pe… pubbe manussabhūto samāno akkodhano
atk-s0501a:1106_1: ahosi anupāyāsabahulo, bahumpi vutto samāno nābhisajji na kuppi na byāpajji na patitthīyi,
atk-s0501a:1106_2: na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātvākāsi, dātā ca ahosi sukhumānaṃ mudukānaṃ attharaṇānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1106_3: pāvuraṇānaṃ khomasukhumānaṃ kappāsika…pe… koseyya…pe… kambalasukhumānaṃ. So tassa
atk-s0501a:1106_4: kammassa katattā upacitattā…pe… itthattaṃ āgato samāno imaṃ mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0501a:1107: Susaratā nāma brahmassaratā karavīkabhāṇitā, sāpi etena labbhati. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:1108_0: “Yampi, bhikkhave, tathāgato purimaṃ jātiṃ…pe… pharusaṃ vācaṃ pahāya pharusāya vācāya
atk-s0501a:1108_1: paṭivirato ahosi, yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā…pe… tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā ahosi.
atk-s0501a:1108_2: So tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā…pe… itthattaṃ āgato samāno imāni dve mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni
atk-s0501a:1108_3: paṭilabhati. Pahutajivho ca hoti brahmassaro ca karavīkabhāṇī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1109: Susaṇṭhānāti suṭṭhu saṇṭhānatā, samacitavaṭṭitayuttaṭṭhānesu aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ samacitavaṭṭitabhāvena sannivesoti vuttaṃ hoti. Sāpi etena labbhati. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a:1110_0: “Yampi, bhikkhave, tathāgato purimaṃ jātiṃ…pe… pubbe manussabhūto samāno bahujanassa
atk-s0501a:1110_1: atthakāmo ahosi hitakāmo phāsukāmo yogakkhemakāmo ‘kinti me saddhāya vaḍḍheyyuṃ,
atk-s0501a:1110_2: sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya dhanadhaññena khettavatthunā dvipadacatuppadehi puttadārehi
atk-s0501a:1110_3: dāsakammakaraporisehi ñātīhi mittehi bandhavehi vaḍḍheyyu’nti, so tassa kammassa…pe…
atk-s0501a:1110_4: samāno imāni tīṇi mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paṭilabhati, sīhapubbaḍḍhakāyo ca hoti citantaraṃso
atk-s0501a:1111: Iminā nayena ito paresampi iminā puññanidhinā paṭilābhasādhakāni suttapadāni tato tato ānetvā vattabbāni. Ativitthārabhayena tu saṃkhittaṃ, idāni avasesapadānaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0501a:1112_0: Surūpatāti ettha sakalasarīraṃ rūpanti veditabbaṃ “ākāso parivārito rūpaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1112_1: gacchatī”tiādīsu viya, tassa rūpassa sundaratā surūpatā nātidīghatā nātirassatā nātikisatā
atk-s0501a:1112_2: nātithūlatā nātikāḷatā naccodātatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ādhipaccanti adhipatibhāvo, khattiyamahāsālādibhāvena
atk-s0501a:1112_3: sāmikabhāvoti attho. Parivāroti agārikānaṃ sajanaparijanasampatti, anagārikānaṃ parisasampatti,
atk-s0501a:1112_4: ādhipaccañca parivāro ca ādhipaccaparivāro. Ettha ca suvaṇṇatādīhi sarīrasampatti,
atk-s0501a:1112_5: ādhipaccena bhogasampatti, parivārena sajanaparijanasampatti vuttāti veditabbā. Sabbametena
atk-s0501a:1112_6: labbhatīti yaṃ taṃ “yaṃ yadevābhipatthenti, sabbametena labbhatī”ti vuttaṃ, tattha
atk-s0501a:1112_7: idampi tāva paṭhamaṃ odhiso vuttasuvaṇṇatādi sabbametena labbhatīti veditabbanti dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1114: 12. Evamimāya gāthāya puññānubhāvena labhitabbaṃ rajjasampattito oraṃ devamanussasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni tadubhayarajjasampattiṃ dassento “padesarajja”nti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1115_0: Tattha padesarajjanti ekadīpampi sakalaṃ apāpuṇitvā pathaviyā ekamekasmiṃ padese
atk-s0501a:1115_1: rajjaṃ. Issarabhāvo issariyaṃ, iminā dīpacakkavattirajjaṃ dasseti. Cakkavattisukhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1115_2: piyanti iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ cakkavattisukhaṃ. Iminā cāturantacakkavattirajjaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1115_3: Devesu rajjaṃ devarajjaṃ, etena mandhātādīnampi manussānaṃ devarajjaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1115_4: Api dibbesūti iminā ye te divi bhavattā “dibbā”ti vuccanti, tesu dibbesu kāyesu uppannānampi
atk-s0501a:1115_5: devarajjaṃ dasseti. Sabbametena labbhatīti yaṃ taṃ “yaṃ yadevābhipatthenti, sabbametena
atk-s0501a:1115_6: labbhatī”ti vuttaṃ, tattha idampi dutiyaṃ odhiso padesarajjādi sabbametena labbhatīti
atk-s0501a:1117_0: 13. Evamimāya gāthāya puññānubhāvena labhitabbaṃ devamanussarajjasampattiṃ dassetvā
atk-s0501a:1117_1: idāni dvīhi gāthāhi vuttaṃ sampattiṃ samāsato purakkhatvā nibbānasampattiṃ dassento
atk-s0501a:1118_0: Tassāyaṃ padavaṇṇanā – manussānaṃ ayanti mānussī, mānussī eva mānussikā. Sampajjanaṃ
atk-s0501a:1118_1: sampatti. Devānaṃ loko devaloko. Tasmiṃ devaloke. Yāti anavasesapariyādānaṃ, ramanti
atk-s0501a:1118_2: etāya ajjhattaṃ uppannāya bahiddhā vā upakaraṇabhūtāyāti rati, sukhassa sukhavatthuno
atk-s0501a:1118_3: cetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yāti aniyatavacanaṃ casaddo pubbasampattiyā saha sampiṇḍanattho.
atk-s0501a:1119_0: Ayaṃ pana atthavaṇṇanā – yā esā “suvaṇṇatā”tiādīhi padehi mānussikā ca sampatti devaloke
atk-s0501a:1119_1: ca yā rati vuttā, sā ca sabbā, yā cāyamaparā saddhānusāribhāvādivasena pattabbā nibbānasampatti,
atk-s0501a:1119_2: sā cāti idaṃ tatiyampi odhiso sabbametena labbhatīti.
atk-s0501a:1120_0: Atha vā yā pubbe suvaṇṇatādīhi avuttā “sūrā satimanto idha brahmacariyavāso”ti evamādinā
atk-s0501a:1120_1: nayena niddiṭṭhā paññāveyyattiyādibhedā ca mānussikā sampatti, aparā devaloke ca
atk-s0501a:1120_2: yā jhānādirati, yā ca yathāvuttappakārā nibbānasampatti cāti idampi tatiyaṃ odhiso
atk-s0501a:1122_0: 14. Evamimāya gāthāya puññānubhāvena labhitabbaṃ saddhānusārībhāvādivasena pattabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:1122_2: tameva tassa upāyañca dassento “mittasampadamāgammā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1123_0: Tassāyaṃ padavaṇṇanā – sampajjati etāya guṇavibhūtiṃ pāpuṇātīti sampadā, mitto eva
atk-s0501a:1123_1: sampadā mittasampadā, taṃ mittasampadaṃ. Āgammāti nissāya. Yonisoti upāyena. Payuñjatoti
atk-s0501a:1123_2: yogānuṭṭhānaṃ karoto. Vijānāti etāyāti vijjā, vimuccati etāya, sayaṃ vā vimuccatīti
atk-s0501a:1123_3: vimutti, vijjā ca vimutti ca vijjāvimuttiyo, vijjāvimuttīsu vasībhāvo vijjāvimuttivasībhāvo.
atk-s0501a:1124_0: Ayaṃ pana atthavaṇṇanā – yvāyaṃ mittasampadamāgamma satthāraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ
atk-s0501a:1124_1: sabrahmacāriṃ nissāya tato ovādañca anusāsaniñca gahetvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā
atk-s0501a:1124_2: yoniso payuñjato pubbenivāsādīsu tīsu vijjāsu “tattha katamā vimutti? Cittassa ca
atk-s0501a:1124_3: adhimutti nibbānañcā”ti evaṃ āgatāya aṭṭhasamāpattinibbānabhedāya vimuttiyā ca tathā
atk-s0501a:1124_4: tathā adandhāyitattena vasībhāvo, idampi catutthaṃ odhiso sabbametena labbhatīti.
atk-s0501a:1126_2: yasmā vijjāvimuttivasībhāvappattā tevijjā ubhatobhāgavimuttāpi sabbe paṭisambhidādiguṇavibhūtiṃ
atk-s0501a:1126_3: labhanti, imāya puññasampadāya ca tassā guṇavibhūtiyā padaṭṭhānavasena tathā tathā
atk-s0501a:1126_4: sāpi labbhati, tasmā tampi dassento “paṭisambhidā vimokkhā cā”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1127_0: “Yato sammā katena yā cāyaṃ dhammatthaniruttipaṭibhānesu pabhedagatā paññā paṭisambhidā”ti
atk-s0501a:1127_1: vuccati, ye cime “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādinā nayena aṭṭha vimokkhā, yā cāyaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0501a:1127_2: sāvakehi pattabbā sāvakasampattisādhikā sāvakapāramī, yā ca sayambhubhāvasādhikā
atk-s0501a:1127_3: paccekabodhi, yā ca sabbasattuttamabhāvasādhikā buddhabhūmi, idampi pañcamaṃ odhiso
atk-s0501a:1129_0: 16. Evaṃ bhagavā yaṃ taṃ “yaṃ yadevābhipatthenti, sabbametena labbhatī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1129_1: taṃ imāhi pañcahi gāthāhi odhiso odhiso dassetvā idāni sabbamevidaṃ sabbakāmadadanidhisaññitaṃ
atk-s0501a:1129_2: puññasampadaṃ pasaṃsanto “evaṃ mahatthikā esā”ti imāya gāthāya desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0501a:1130_0: Tassāyaṃ padavaṇṇanā – evanti atītatthanidassanaṃ. Mahanto attho assāti mahatthikā,
atk-s0501a:1130_1: mahato atthāya saṃvattatīti vuttaṃ hoti, mahiddhikātipi pāṭho. Esāti uddesavacanaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1130_2: tena “yassa dānena sīlenā”ti ito pabhuti yāva “kayirātha dhīro puññānī”ti vuttaṃ
atk-s0501a:1130_3: puññasampadaṃ uddisati. Yadidanti abhimukhakaraṇatthe nipāto, tena esāti uddiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1130_4: niddisituṃ yā esāti abhimukhaṃ karoti. Puññānaṃ sampadā puññasampadā. Tasmāti kāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1130_5: Dhīrāti dhitimanto. Pasaṃsantīti vaṇṇayanti. Paṇḍitāti paññāsampannā. Katapuññatanti katapuññabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1131_0: Ayaṃ pana atthavaṇṇanā – iti bhagavā suvaṇṇatādiṃ buddhabhūmipariyosānaṃ puññasampadānubhāvena
atk-s0501a:1131_1: adhigantabbamatthaṃ vaṇṇayitvā idāni tamevatthaṃ sampiṇḍetvā dassento tenevatthena
atk-s0501a:1131_2: yathāvuttappakārāya puññasampadāya mahatthikattaṃ thunanto āha – evaṃ mahato atthassa
atk-s0501a:1131_3: āvahanena mahatthikā esā, yadidaṃ mayā “yassa dānena sīlenā”tiādinā nayena desitā
atk-s0501a:1131_4: puññasampadā, tasmā mādisā sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahāya dhammadesanāya akilāsutāya yathābhūtaguṇena
atk-s0501a:1131_5: ca dhīrā paṇḍitā “asādhāraṇamaññesaṃ, acorāharaṇo nidhī”tiādīhi idha vuttehi ca,
atk-s0501a:1131_6: avuttehi ca “mā, bhikkhave, puññānaṃ bhāyittha, sukhassetaṃ, bhikkhave, adhivacanaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1131_7: yadidaṃ puññānī”tiādīhi vacanehi anekākāravokāraṃ katapuññataṃ pasaṃsanti, na pakkhapātenāti.
atk-s0501a:1132_0: Desanāpariyosāne so upāsako bahujanena saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, rañño ca
atk-s0501a:1132_1: pasenadikosalassa santikaṃ gantvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi, rājā ativiya tuṭṭho hutvā “sādhu,
atk-s0501a:1132_2: gahapati, sādhu kho tvaṃ, gahapati, mādisehipi anāharaṇīyaṃ nidhiṃ nidhesī”ti saṃrādhetvā
atk-s0501a:1137: Idāni nidhikaṇḍānantaraṃ nikkhittassa mettasuttassa vaṇṇanākkamo anuppatto. Tassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ vatvā tato paraṃ –
atk-s0501a:1138: “Yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha, yasmā cetesa dīpanā;
atk-s0501a:1140_0: Tattha yasmā nidhikaṇḍena dānasīlādipuññasampadā vuttā, sā ca sattesu mettāya katāya
atk-s0501a:1140_1: mahapphalā hoti yāva buddhabhūmiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthā, tasmā tassā puññasampadāya upakāradassanatthaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1140_2: yasmā vā saraṇehi sāsane otaritvā sikkhāpadehi sīle patiṭṭhitānaṃ dvattiṃsākārena
atk-s0501a:1140_4: maṅgalasuttena tassa pavattiyā maṅgalabhāvo attarakkhā ca, ratanasuttena tassānurūpā
atk-s0501a:1140_5: pararakkhā, tirokuṭṭena rattanasutte vuttabhūtesu ekaccabhūtadassanaṃ vuttappakārāya
atk-s0501a:1140_6: puññasampattiyā pamajjantānaṃ vipatti ca, nidhikaṇḍena tirokuṭṭe vuttavipattipaṭipakkhabhūtā
atk-s0501a:1140_7: sampatti ca dassitā, dosappahānasamatthaṃ pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ adassitameva, tasmā taṃ
atk-s0501a:1140_8: dosappahānasamatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ mettasuttaṃ idha nikkhittaṃ. Evañhi
atk-s0501a:1140_9: suparipūro hoti khuddakapāṭhoti idamassa idha nikkhepappayojanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1143: “Yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha, yasmā cetesa dīpanā;
atk-s0501a:1145_0: Mātikā nikkhittā, tattha idaṃ mettasuttaṃ bhagavatāva vuttaṃ, na sāvakādīhi, tañca
atk-s0501a:1145_1: pana yadā himavantapassato devatāhi ubbāḷhā bhikkhū bhagavato santikaṃ āgatā, tadā
atk-s0501a:1145_2: sāvatthiyaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ parittatthāya kammaṭṭhānatthāya ca vuttanti evaṃ tāva
atk-s0501a:1145_3: saṅkhepato etesaṃ padānaṃ dīpanā nidānasodhanā veditabbā.
atk-s0501a:1146_0: Vitthārato pana evaṃ veditabbā – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati upakaṭṭhāya
atk-s0501a:1146_1: vassūpanāyikāya, tena kho pana samayena sambahulā nānāverajjakā bhikkhū bhagavato
atk-s0501a:1146_2: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha tattha vassaṃ upagantukāmā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0501a:1146_3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā rāgacaritānaṃ saviññāṇakaaviññāṇakavasena ekādasavidhaṃ asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1147_0: Atha kho pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā sappāyasenāsanañca
atk-s0501a:1147_1: gocaragāmañca pariyesamānāni anupubbena gantvā paccante himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1147_3: sucisātasītalajalāsayaparivāritaṃ pabbatamaddasaṃsu. Atha te bhikkhū tatthekarattiṃ
atk-s0501a:1147_4: vasitvā pabhātāya rattiyā sarīraparikammaṃ katvā tassa avidūre aññataraṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0501a:1147_5: pavisiṃsu. Gāmo ghananivesanasanniviṭṭhakulasahassayutto, manussā cettha saddhā pasannā
atk-s0501a:1147_6: te paccante pabbajitadassanassa dullabhatāya bhikkhū disvā eva pītisomanassajātā
atk-s0501a:1147_7: hutvā te bhikkhū bhojetvā “idheva, bhante, temāsaṃ vasathā”ti yācitvā pañca padhānakuṭisatāni
atk-s0501a:1148_0: Bhikkhū dutiyadivase aññaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu. Tatthapi manussā tatheva upaṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0501a:1148_1: vassāvāsaṃ yāciṃsu. Bhikkhū “asati antarāye”ti adhivāsetvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0501a:1148_2: sabbarattindivaṃ āraddhavīriyā yāmaghaṇḍikaṃ koṭṭetvā yonisomanasikārabahulā viharantā
atk-s0501a:1148_3: rukkhamūlāni upagantvā nisīdiṃsu. Sīlavantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tejena vihatatejā rukkhadevatā
atk-s0501a:1148_4: attano attano vimānā oruyha dārake gahetvā ito cito vicaranti. Seyyathāpi nāma rājūhi
atk-s0501a:1148_5: vā rājamahāmattehi vā gāmakāvāsaṃ gatehi gāmavāsīnaṃ gharesu okāse gahite gharamanussakā
atk-s0501a:1148_6: gharā nikkhamitvā aññatra vasantā “kadā nu gamissantī”ti dūratova olokenti, evameva
atk-s0501a:1148_7: devatā attano attano vimānāni chaḍḍetvā ito cito ca vicarantiyo dūratova olokenti
atk-s0501a:1148_8: “kadā nu bhadantā gamissantī”ti. Tato evaṃ samacintesuṃ “paṭhamavassūpagatā bhikkhū
atk-s0501a:1148_9: avassaṃ temāsaṃ vasissanti, mayaṃ pana tāva ciraṃ dārake gahetvā okkamma vasituṃ
atk-s0501a:1148_10: na sakkoma, handa mayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhayānakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassemā”ti. Tā rattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0501a:1148_11: samaṇadhammakaraṇavelāya bhiṃsanakāni yakkharūpāni nimminitvā purato purato tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0501a:1148_12: bheravasaddañca karonti. Bhikkhūnaṃ tāni rūpāni disvā tañca saddaṃ sutvā hadayaṃ
atk-s0501a:1148_13: phandi, dubbaṇṇā ca ahesuṃ uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā. Tena te bhikkhū cittaṃ ekaggaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0501a:1148_14: nāsakkhiṃsu, tesaṃ anekaggacittānaṃ bhayena ca punappunaṃ saṃviggānaṃ sati sammussi,
atk-s0501a:1148_15: tato tesaṃ muṭṭhasatīnaṃ duggandhāni ārammaṇāni payojesuṃ, tesaṃ tena duggandhena
atk-s0501a:1148_16: nimmathiyamānamiva matthaluṅgaṃ ahosi, gāḷhā sīsavedanā uppajjiṃsu, na ca taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0501a:1149_0: Athekadivasaṃ saṅghattherassa upaṭṭhānakāle sabbesu sannipatitesu saṅghatthero pucchi
atk-s0501a:1149_1: “tumhākaṃ, āvuso, imaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ katipāhaṃ ativiya parisuddho chavivaṇṇo
atk-s0501a:1149_2: ahosi pariyodāto, vippasannāni ca indriyāni, etarahi panattha kisā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā,
atk-s0501a:1149_3: kiṃ vo idha asappāya”nti. Tato eko bhikkhu āha – “ahaṃ, bhante, rattiṃ īdisañca īdisañca
atk-s0501a:1149_4: bheravārammaṇaṃ passāmi ca suṇāmi ca, īdisañca gandhaṃ ghāyāmi, tena me cittaṃ na
atk-s0501a:1149_5: samādhiyatī”ti, eteneva upāyena sabbeva te taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Saṅghatthero āha
atk-s0501a:1149_6: – “bhagavatā, āvuso, dve vassūpanāyikā paññattā, amhākañca idaṃ senāsanaṃ asappāyaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1149_7: āyāmāvuso, bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā aññaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ pucchāmā”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0501a:1149_8: bhante”ti te bhikkhū therassa paṭissuṇitvā sabbeva senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0501a:1149_9: anupalittattā kulesu kañci anāmantetvā eva yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1149_10: Anupubbena sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1150_0: Bhagavā te bhikkhū disvā etadavoca – “na, bhikkhave, antovassaṃ cārikā caritabbāti
atk-s0501a:1150_1: mayā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, kissa tumhe cārikaṃ carathā”ti. Te bhagavato sabbamārocesuṃ.
atk-s0501a:1150_2: Bhagavā āvajjento sakalajambudīpe antamaso catupādapīṭhakaṭṭhānamattampi tesaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ
atk-s0501a:1150_3: nāddasa. Atha te bhikkhū āha – “na, bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ aññaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0501a:1150_4: tattheva tumhe viharantā āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissatha, gacchatha, bhikkhave, tameva
atk-s0501a:1150_5: senāsanaṃ upanissāya viharatha, sace pana devatāhi abhayaṃ icchatha, imaṃ parittaṃ
atk-s0501a:1150_6: uggaṇhatha. Etañhi vo parittañca kammaṭṭhānañca bhavissatī”ti idaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0501a:1151_0: Apare panāhu – “gacchatha, bhikkhave, tameva senāsanaṃ upanissāya viharathā”ti idañca
atk-s0501a:1151_1: vatvā bhagavā āha – “apica kho āraññakena pariharaṇaṃ ñātabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – sāyaṃ
atk-s0501a:1151_2: pātaṃ karaṇavasena dve mettā dve parittā dve asubhā dve maraṇassatī aṭṭhamahāsaṃvegavatthusamāvajjanañca,
atk-s0501a:1151_3: aṭṭha mahāsaṃvegavatthūni nāma jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṃ cattāri apāyadukkhānīti, atha
atk-s0501a:1151_4: vā jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ pañcamaṃ, atīte vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1151_5: anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkha”nti. Evaṃ
atk-s0501a:1151_6: bhagavā pariharaṇaṃ ācikkhitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mettatthañca parittatthañca vipassanāpādakajjhānatthañca
atk-s0501a:1151_7: idaṃ suttamabhāsīti. Evaṃ vitthāratopi “yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha, yasmā ce”ti etesaṃ
atk-s0501a:1152: Ettāvatā ca yā sā “yena vuttaṃ yadā yattha, yasmā cetesa dīpanā. Nidānaṃ sodhayitvā”ti mātikā ṭhapitā, sā sabbākārena vitthāritā hoti.
atk-s0501a:1154_0: 1. Idāni “assa karissāmatthavaṇṇana”nti vuttattā evaṃ katanidānasodhanassa assa suttassa
atk-s0501a:1154_1: atthavaṇṇanā ārabbhate. Tattha karaṇīyamatthakusalenāti imissā paṭhamagāthāya tāva
atk-s0501a:1154_2: ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā – karaṇīyanti kātabbaṃ, karaṇārahanti attho. Atthoti paṭipadā, yaṃ
atk-s0501a:1154_3: vā kiñci attano hitaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ araṇīyato atthoti vuccati, araṇīyato nāma upagantabbato.
atk-s0501a:1154_4: Atthe kusalena atthakusalena atthachekenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yanti aniyamitapaccattaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1154_5: Nti niyamitaupayogaṃ, ubhayampi vā yaṃ tanti paccattavacanaṃ. Santaṃ padanti upayogavacanaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1154_6: tattha lakkhaṇato santaṃ, pattabbato padaṃ, nibbānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Abhisameccāti
atk-s0501a:1154_7: abhisamāgantvā. Sakkotīti sakko, samattho paṭibaloti vuttaṃ hoti. Ujūti ajjavayutto.
atk-s0501a:1154_8: Suṭṭhu ujūti suhuju. Sukhaṃ vaco tasminti suvaco. Assāti bhaveyya. Mudūti maddavayutto.
atk-s0501a:1155_0: Ayaṃ panettha atthavaṇṇanā – karaṇīyamatthakusalena, yantaṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti
atk-s0501a:1155_1: ettha tāva atthi karaṇīyaṃ, atthi akaraṇīyaṃ. Tattha saṅkhepato sikkhattayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1155_2: Sīlavipatti, diṭṭhivipatti, ācāravipatti, ājīvavipattīti evamādi akaraṇīyaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0501a:1155_3: atthi atthakusalo, atthi anatthakusalo. Tattha yo imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā na attānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1155_4: sammā payojeti, khaṇḍasīlo hoti, ekavīsatividhaṃ anesanaṃ nissāya jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0501a:1155_5: Seyyathidaṃ – veḷudānaṃ pattadānaṃ pupphadānaṃ phaladānaṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ mukhodakadānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1155_6: sinānadānaṃ cuṇṇadānaṃ mattikādānaṃ cāṭukamyataṃ muggasūpyataṃ pāribhaṭayataṃ jaṅghapesanikaṃ
atk-s0501a:1155_7: vejjakammaṃ dūtakammaṃ pahiṇagamanaṃ piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍaṃ dānānuppadānaṃ vatthuvijjaṃ
atk-s0501a:1155_8: nakkhattavijjaṃ aṅgavijjanti. Chabbidhe ca agocare carati. Seyyathidaṃ – vesiyāgocare
atk-s0501a:1155_10: rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena, yāni vā
atk-s0501a:1155_11: pana tāni kulāni assaddhāni appasannāni anopānabhūtāni akkosakaparibhāsakāni anatthakāmāni
atk-s0501a:1155_12: ahitaaphāsukayogakkhemakāmāni bhikkhūnaṃ…pe… upāsikānaṃ, tathārūpāni kulāni sevati
atk-s0501a:1156_0: Yo pana imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ sammā payojeti, anesanaṃ pahāya catupārisuddhisīle
atk-s0501a:1156_1: patiṭṭhātukāmo saddhāsīsena pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ satisīsena indriyasaṃvaraṃ vīriyasīsena
atk-s0501a:1156_2: ājīvapārisuddhiṃ, paññāsīsena paccayapaṭisevanaṃ pūreti. Ayaṃ atthakusalo.
atk-s0501a:1157_0: Yo vā sattāpattikkhandhasodhanavasena pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ, chadvāre ghaṭṭitārammaṇesu
atk-s0501a:1158_0: Yo vā yathā ūsodakaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ pariyodāpayati, chārikaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0501a:1158_1: ādāso, ukkāmukhaṃ paṭicca jātarūpaṃ, tathā ñāṇaṃ paṭicca sīlaṃ vodāyatīti ñatvā ñāṇodakena
atk-s0501a:1158_2: dhovanto sīlaṃ pariyodāpeti. Yathā ca kikī sakuṇikā aṇḍaṃ, camarī migo vāladhiṃ,
atk-s0501a:1158_3: ekaputtikā nārī piyaṃ ekaputtakaṃ, ekanayano puriso taṃ ekanayanañca rakkhati, tathā
atk-s0501a:1158_4: ativiya appamatto attano sīlakkhandhaṃ rakkhati, sāyaṃ pātaṃ paccavekkhamāno aṇumattampi
atk-s0501a:1159_0: Yo vā pana avippaṭisārakare sīle patiṭṭhāya kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadaṃ paggaṇhāti,
atk-s0501a:1159_1: taṃ paggaṇhitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ karoti, kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiyo nibbatteti. Ayampi atthakusalo.
atk-s0501a:1160_0: Yo vā pana samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ atthakusalānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1160_1: aggo. Tattha ye ime yāva avippaṭisārakare sīle patiṭṭhānena yāva vā kilesavikkhambhanapaṭipadāyapaggahaṇena
atk-s0501a:1160_2: vaṇṇitā atthakusalā, te imasmiṃ atthe atthakusalāti adhippetā. Tathā vidhā ca te
atk-s0501a:1160_3: bhikkhū. Tena bhagavā te bhikkhū sandhāya ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya “karaṇīyamatthakusalenā”ti āha.
atk-s0501a:1161_0: Tato “kiṃ karaṇīya”nti tesaṃ sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ āha “yantaṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1161_1: Ayamettha adhippāyo – taṃ buddhānubuddhehi vaṇṇitaṃ santaṃ nibbānapadaṃ paṭivedhavasena
atk-s0501a:1161_2: abhisamecca viharitukāmena yaṃ karaṇīyanti. Ettha ca yanti imassa gāthāpadassa ādito
atk-s0501a:1161_3: vuttameva karaṇīyanti adhikārato anuvattati, taṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0501a:1161_4: pana yasmā sāvasesapāṭho attho, tasmā viharitukāmenāti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1162_0: Atha vā santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccāti anussavādivasena lokiyapaññāya nibbānapadaṃ “santa”nti
atk-s0501a:1162_1: ñatvā taṃ adhigantukāmena yantaṃ karaṇīyanti adhikārato anuvattati, taṃ karaṇīyamatthakusalenāti
atk-s0501a:1162_2: evampettha adhippāyo veditabbo. Atha vā “karaṇīyamatthakusalenā”ti vutte “ki”nti
atk-s0501a:1162_3: cintentānaṃ āha “yantaṃ santaṃ padaṃ abhisameccā”ti. Tassevaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo
atk-s0501a:1162_4: – lokiyapaññāya santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca yaṃ karaṇīyaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ karaṇīyaṃ, karaṇārahameva tanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1163_0: Kiṃ pana tanti? Kimaññaṃ siyā aññatra tadadhigamupāyato, kāmañcetaṃ karaṇārahaṭṭhena
atk-s0501a:1163_1: sikkhattayadīpakena ādipadeneva vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tassa atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ avocumhā “atthi
atk-s0501a:1163_2: karaṇīyaṃ, atthi akaraṇīyaṃ. Tattha saṅkhepato sikkhattayaṃ karaṇīya”nti. Atisaṅkhepena
atk-s0501a:1163_3: desitattā pana tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kehici viññātaṃ, kehici na viññātaṃ. Tato yehi na
atk-s0501a:1163_4: viññātaṃ, tesaṃ viññāpanatthaṃ yaṃ visesato āraññakena bhikkhunā kātabbaṃ, taṃ vitthārento
atk-s0501a:1163_5: “sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, suvaco cassa mudu anatimānī”ti imaṃ tāva upaḍḍhagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1164_0: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmo, lokiyapaññāya vā taṃ abhisamecca
atk-s0501a:1164_2: kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkho hutvā saccappaṭivedhāya paṭipajjituṃ sakko assa, tathā
atk-s0501a:1164_3: kasiṇaparikammavattasamādānādīsu attano pattacīvarappaṭisaṅkharaṇādīsu ca yāni tāni
atk-s0501a:1164_4: sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni kiṃ karaṇīyāni, tesu aññesu ca evarūpesu sakko assa dakkho
atk-s0501a:1164_5: analaso samattho. Sakko hontopi ca tatiyapadhāniyaṅgasamannāgamena uju assa. Uju
atk-s0501a:1164_6: hontopi ca sakiṃ ujubhāvena daharakāle vā ujubhāvena santosaṃ anāpajjitvā yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0501a:1164_7: punappunaṃ asithilakaraṇena suṭṭhutaraṃ uju assa. Asaṭhatāya vā uju, amāyāvitāya
atk-s0501a:1164_8: suhuju. Kāyavacīvaṅkappahānena vā uju, manovaṅkappahānena suhuju. Asantaguṇassa vā
atk-s0501a:1164_9: anāvikaraṇena uju, asantaguṇena uppannassa lābhassa anadhivāsanena suhuju. Evaṃ ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānehi
atk-s0501a:1164_10: purimadvayatatiyasikkhāhi payogāsayasuddhīhi ca uju ca suhuju ca assa.
atk-s0501a:1165_0: Na kevalañca uju ca suhuju ca, apica pana suvaco ca assa. Yo hi puggalo “idaṃ na
atk-s0501a:1165_1: kattabba”nti vutto “kiṃ te diṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ te sutaṃ, ko me sutvā vadasi, kiṃ upajjhāyo
atk-s0501a:1165_2: ācariyo sandiṭṭho sambhatto vā”ti vadeti, tuṇhībhāvena vā taṃ viheseti, sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0501a:1165_3: vā na tathā karoti, so visesādhigamassa dūre hoti. Yo pana ovadiyamāno “sādhu, bhante
atk-s0501a:1165_4: suṭṭhu vuttaṃ, attano vajjaṃ nāma duddasaṃ hoti, punapi maṃ evarūpaṃ disvā vadeyyātha
atk-s0501a:1165_5: anukampaṃ upādāya, cirassaṃ me tumhākaṃ santikā ovādo laddho”ti vadati, yathānusiṭṭhañca
atk-s0501a:1165_6: paṭipajjati, so visesādhigamassa avidūre hoti. Tasmā evaṃ parassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0501a:1166_0: Yathā ca suvaco, evaṃ mudu assa. Mudūti gahaṭṭhehi dūtagamanapahiṇagamanādīsu niyujjamāno
atk-s0501a:1166_1: tattha mudubhāvaṃ akatvā thaddho hutvā vattapaṭipattiyaṃ sakalabrahmacariye ca mudu
atk-s0501a:1166_2: assa suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ viya tattha tattha viniyogakkhamo. Atha vā mudūti abhākuṭiko
atk-s0501a:1166_3: uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthāravutti sutitthaṃ viya sukhāvagāho assa. Na kevalañca
atk-s0501a:1166_4: mudu, apica pana anatimānī assa, jātigottādīhi atimānavatthūhi pare nātimaññeyya,
atk-s0501a:1168_0: 2. Evaṃ bhagavā santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjamānassa
atk-s0501a:1168_1: visesato āraññakassa bhikkhuno ekaccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ vatvā puna tatuttaripi vattukāmo
atk-s0501a:1169_0: Tattha “santuṭṭhī ca kataññutā”ti ettha vuttappabhedena dvādasavidhena santosena
atk-s0501a:1169_1: santussatīti santussako. Atha vā tussatīti tussako, sakena tussako, santena tussako,
atk-s0501a:1169_2: samena tussakoti santussako. Tattha sakaṃ nāma “piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāyā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0501a:1169_3: upasampadamaṇḍale uddiṭṭhaṃ attanā ca sampaṭicchitaṃ catupaccayajātaṃ, tena sundarena
atk-s0501a:1169_4: vā asundarena vā sakkaccaṃ vā asakkaccaṃ vā dinnena paṭiggahaṇakāle paribhogakāle
atk-s0501a:1169_5: ca vikāraṃ adassetvā yāpento “sakena tussako”ti vuccati. Santaṃ nāma yaṃ laddhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1169_6: hoti attano ‘vijjamānaṃ, tena santeneva tussanto tato paraṃ na patthento atricchataṃ
atk-s0501a:1169_7: pajahanto “santena tussako”ti vuccati. Samaṃ nāma iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu anunayapaṭighappahānaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1169_8: tena samena sabbārammaṇesu tussanto “samena tussako”ti vuccati.
atk-s0501a:1170_0: Sukhena bharīyatīti subharo, suposoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo hi bhikkhu manussehi sālimaṃsodanādīnaṃ
atk-s0501a:1170_1: patte pūretvā dinnepi dummukhabhāvaṃ anattamanabhāvameva ca dasseti, tesaṃ vā sammukhāva
atk-s0501a:1170_2: taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ “kiṃ tumhehi dinna”nti apasādento sāmaṇeragahaṭṭhādīnaṃ deti, esa
atk-s0501a:1170_3: dubbharo. Etaṃ disvā manussā dūratova parivajjenti “dubbharo bhikkhu na sakkā posetu”nti.
atk-s0501a:1170_4: Yo pana yaṃ kiñci lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā labhitvā attamano vippasannamukho
atk-s0501a:1170_5: hutvā yāpeti, esa subharo. Etaṃ disvā manussā ativiya vissatthā honti, “amhākaṃ bhadanto
atk-s0501a:1170_6: subharo, thokathokenāpi tussati, mayameva naṃ posessāmā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
atk-s0501a:1171_2: attano kesanakhacchedanapattacīvarakammādiṃ katvā samaṇadhammakiccaparo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1172_0: Sallahukā vutti assāti sallahukavutti. Yathā ekacco bahubhaṇḍo bhikkhu disāpakkamanakāle
atk-s0501a:1172_2: pakkamati, evaṃ ahutvā yo appaparikkhāro hoti, pattacīvarādiaṭṭhasamaṇaparikkhāramattameva
atk-s0501a:1172_3: pariharati, disāpakkamanakāle pakkhī sakuṇo viya samādāyeva pakkamati, evarūpo idha
atk-s0501a:1172_4: sallahukavuttīti adhippeto. Santāni indriyāni assāti santindriyo, iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu
atk-s0501a:1172_5: rāgādivasena anuddhatindriyoti vuttaṃ hoti. Nipakoti viññū vibhāvī paññavā, sīlānurakkhaṇapaññāya
atk-s0501a:1173: Na pagabbhoti appagabbho, aṭṭhaṭṭhānena kāyapāgabbhiyena catuṭṭhānena vacīpāgabbhiyena anekena ṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca virahitoti attho.
atk-s0501a:1174_1: kāyena appatirūpakaraṇaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco saṅghamajjhe pallatthikāya vā nisīdati
atk-s0501a:1174_2: pāde pādamodahitvā vāti evamādi. Tathā gaṇamajjhe catuparisasannipāte, tathā vuḍḍhatare
atk-s0501a:1174_3: puggale. Bhojanasālāyaṃ pana vuḍḍhānaṃ āsanaṃ na deti, navānaṃ āsanaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0501a:1174_4: Tathā jantāghare, vuḍḍhe cettha anāpucchā aggijālanādīni karoti. Nhānatitthe ca yadidaṃ
atk-s0501a:1174_5: “daharo vuḍḍhoti pamāṇaṃ akatvā āgatapaṭipāṭiyā nhāyitabba”nti vuttaṃ, tampi anādiyanto
atk-s0501a:1174_6: pacchā āgantvā udakaṃ otaritvā vuḍḍhe ca nave ca bādheti. Bhikkhācāramagge pana aggāsanaaggodakaaggapiṇḍatthaṃ
atk-s0501a:1174_7: vuḍḍhānaṃ purato purato yāti, bāhāya bāhaṃ paharanto. Antaragharappavesane vuḍḍhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1174_8: paṭhamataraṃ pavisati, daharehi kāyakīḷanaṃ karotīti evamādi.
atk-s0501a:1175_1: Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco saṅghamajjhe anāpucchā dhammaṃ bhāsati, tathā pubbe vuttappakāre
atk-s0501a:1175_2: gaṇe vuḍḍhatare puggale ca, tattha manussehi pañhaṃ puṭṭho vuḍḍhataraṃ anāpucchā
atk-s0501a:1175_3: vissajjeti, antaraghare pana “itthannāme kiṃ atthi, kiṃ yāgu udāhu khādanīyaṃ vā
atk-s0501a:1175_4: bhojanīyaṃ vā, kiṃ me dassasi, kiṃ ajja khādissāmi, kiṃ bhuñjissāmi, kiṃ pivissāmī”ti evamādiṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0501a:1176: Anekaṭṭhānaṃ manopāgabbhiyaṃ nāma tesu tesu ṭhānesu kāyavācāhi ajjhācāraṃ anāpajjitvāpi manasā eva kāmavitakkādinānappakāraṃ appatirūpavitakkanaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1177_0: Kulesvananugiddhoti yāni tāni kulāni upasaṅkamati, tesu paccayataṇhāya vā ananulomikagihisaṃsaggavasena
atk-s0501a:1177_1: vā ananugiddho, na sahasokī, na sahanandī, na sukhitesu sukhito, na dukkhitesu dukkhito,
atk-s0501a:1177_2: na uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā vā uyyogamāpajjitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Imissāya ca
atk-s0501a:1177_3: gāthāya yaṃ “suvaco cassā”ti ettha vuttaṃ assāti vacanaṃ, taṃ sabbapadehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0501a:1177_4: santussako ca assa, subharo ca assāti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1179_0: 3. Evaṃ bhagavā santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjitukāmassa
atk-s0501a:1179_1: visesato āraññakassa bhikkhuno taduttaripi karaṇīyaṃ ācikkhitvā idāni akaraṇīyampi
atk-s0501a:1179_2: ācikkhitukāmo “na ca khuddamācare kiñci, yena viññū pare upavadeyyu”nti imaṃ upaḍḍhagāthamāha.
atk-s0501a:1180_0: Tassattho – evamimaṃ karaṇīyaṃ karonto yaṃ taṃ kāyavacīmanoduccaritaṃ khuddaṃ lāmakanti
atk-s0501a:1180_1: vuccati, taṃ na ca khuddaṃ samācare, asamācaranto ca na kevalaṃ oḷārikaṃ, kintu kiñci
atk-s0501a:1180_2: na samācare, appamattakampi aṇumattakampi na samācareti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0501a:1181_0: Tato tassa samācāre sandiṭṭhikamevādīnavaṃ dasseti “yena viññū pare upavadeyyu”nti.
atk-s0501a:1181_1: Ettha ca yasmā aviññū pare appamāṇaṃ. Te hi anavajjaṃ vā sāvajjaṃ karonti, appasāvajjaṃ
atk-s0501a:1181_2: vā mahāsāvajjaṃ. Viññū eva pana pamāṇaṃ. Te hi anuvicca pariyogāhetvā avaṇṇārahassa
atk-s0501a:1181_3: avaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti. Tasmā “viññū pare”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1182_0: Evaṃ bhagavā imāhi aḍḍhateyyāhi gāthāhi santaṃ padaṃ abhisamecca viharitukāmassa
atk-s0501a:1182_1: tadadhigamāya vā paṭipajjitukāmassa visesato āraññakassa, āraññakasīsena ca sabbesampi
atk-s0501a:1182_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharitukāmānaṃ karaṇīyākaraṇīyabhedaṃ kammaṭṭhānūpacāraṃ vatvā
atk-s0501a:1182_3: idāni tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tassa devatābhayassa paṭighātāya parittatthaṃ vipassanāpādakajjhānavasena
atk-s0501a:1182_4: kammaṭṭhānatthañca “sukhinova khemino hontū”tiādinā nayena mettakathaṃ kathetumāraddho.
atk-s0501a:1183_0: Tattha sukhinoti sukhasampannā. Kheminoti khemavanto, abhayā nirupaddavāti vuttaṃ
atk-s0501a:1183_1: hoti. Sabbeti anavasesā. Sattāti pāṇino. Sukhitattāti sukhitacittā. Ettha ca kāyikena
atk-s0501a:1183_2: sukhena sukhino, mānasena sukhitattā, tadubhayenāpi sabbabhayupaddavavigamena vā
atk-s0501a:1183_3: kheminoti veditabbo. Kasmā pana evaṃ vuttaṃ? Mettābhāvanākāradassanatthaṃ. Evañhi
atk-s0501a:1183_4: mettā bhāvetabbā “sabbe sattā sukhino hontū”ti vā, “khemino hontū”ti vā, “sukhitattā hontū”ti vā.
atk-s0501a:1185_0: 4. Evaṃ yāva upacārato appanākoṭi, tāva saṅkhepena mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni vitthāratopi
atk-s0501a:1185_1: taṃ dassetuṃ “ye kecī”ti gāthādvayamāha. Atha vā yasmā puthuttārammaṇe paricitaṃ
atk-s0501a:1185_2: cittaṃ na ādikeneva ekatte saṇṭhāti ārammaṇappabhedaṃ pana anugantvā anugantvā kamena
atk-s0501a:1185_3: saṇṭhāti, tasmā tassa tasathāvarādidukatikappabhede ārammaṇe anugantvā anugantvā
atk-s0501a:1185_4: saṇṭhānatthampi “ye kecī”ti gāthādvayamāha. Atha vā yasmā yassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vibhūtaṃ
atk-s0501a:1185_5: hoti, tassa tattha cittaṃ sukhaṃ tiṭṭhati, tasmā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yassa yaṃ vibhūtaṃ
atk-s0501a:1185_6: ārammaṇaṃ, tassa tattha cittaṃ saṇṭhāpetukāmo tasathāvarādidukatikārammaṇabhedadīpakaṃ
atk-s0501a:1186_0: Ettha hi tasathāvaradukaṃ diṭṭhādiṭṭhadukaṃ dūrasantikadukaṃ bhūtasambhavesidukanti
atk-s0501a:1186_1: cattāro duke, dīghādīhi ca chahi padehi majjhimapadassa tīsu aṇukapadassa ca dvīsu
atk-s0501a:1186_3: tayo tike ca dīpeti. Tattha ye kecīti anavasesavacanaṃ. Pāṇā eva bhūtā pāṇabhūtā.
atk-s0501a:1186_4: Atha vā pāṇantīti pāṇā, etena assāsapassāsappaṭibaddhe pañcavokārasatte gaṇhāti.
atk-s0501a:1186_5: Bhavantīti bhūtā, etena ekavokāracatuvokārasatte gaṇhāti. Atthīti santi saṃvijjanti.
atk-s0501a:1187: Evaṃ “ye keci pāṇabhūtatthī”ti iminā vacanena dukatikehi saṅgahetabbe sabbasatte ekato dassetvā idāni sabbepi te tasā vā thāvarā va navasesāti iminā dukena saṅgahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1188_0: Tattha tasantīti tasā, sataṇhānaṃ sabhayānañcetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tiṭṭhantīti thāvarā,
atk-s0501a:1188_1: pahīnataṇhābhayānaṃ arahataṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Natthi tesaṃ avasesanti anavasesā,
atk-s0501a:1188_2: sabbepīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yañca dutiyagāthāya ante vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbadukatikehi sambandhitabbaṃ
atk-s0501a:1188_3: “ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi tasā vā thāvarā vā anavasesā, imepi sabbe sattā bhavantu sukhitattā.
atk-s0501a:1188_4: Evaṃ yāva bhūtā vā sambhavesī vā, imepi sabbe sattā bhavantu sukhitattā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1189_0: Idāni dīgharassamajjhimāditikattayadīpakesu dīghā vātiādīsu chasu padesu dīghāti
atk-s0501a:1189_1: dīghattabhāvā nāgamacchagodhādayo. Anekabyāmasatappamāṇāpi hi mahāsamudde nāgānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1189_2: attabhāvā anekayojanappamāṇā ca macchagodhādīnaṃ attabhāvā honti. Mahantāti mahantattabhāvā
atk-s0501a:1189_3: jale macchakacchapādayo, thale hatthināgādayo, amanussesu dānavādayo. Āha ca “rāhuggaṃ
atk-s0501a:1189_4: attabhāvīna”nti. Tassa hi attabhāvo ubbedhena cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni,
atk-s0501a:1189_5: bāhū dvādasayojanasataparimāṇā, paññāsayojanaṃ bhamukantaraṃ, tathā aṅgulantarikā,
atk-s0501a:1189_6: hatthatalāni dve yojanasatānīti. Majjhimāti assagoṇamahiṃsasūkarādīnaṃ attabhāvā.
atk-s0501a:1189_7: Rassakāti tāsu tāsu jātīsu vāmanādayo dīghamajjhimehi omakappamāṇā sattā. Aṇukāti
atk-s0501a:1189_8: maṃsacakkhussa agocarā dibbacakkhuvisayā udakādīsu nibbattā sukhumattabhāvā sattā
atk-s0501a:1189_9: ūkādayo vā. Apica ye tāsu tāsu jātīsu mahantamajjhimehi thūlamajjhimehi ca omakappamāṇā
atk-s0501a:1189_10: sattā, te aṇukāti veditabbā. Thūlāti parimaṇḍalattabhāvā sippikasambukādayo sattā.
atk-s0501a:1191: 5. Evaṃ tīhi tikehi anavasesato satte dassetvā idāni “diṭṭhā vā ye va adiṭṭhā”tiādīhi tīhi dukehipi te saṅgahetvā dasseti.
atk-s0501a:1192_0: Tattha diṭṭhāti ye attano cakkhussa āpāthamāgatavasena diṭṭhapubbā. Adiṭṭhāti ye
atk-s0501a:1192_1: parasamuddaparaselaparacakkavāḷādīsu ṭhitā. “Ye vā dūre vasanti avidūre”ti iminā
atk-s0501a:1192_2: pana dukena attano attabhāvassa dūre ca avidūre ca vasante satte dasseti, te apadadvipadavasena
atk-s0501a:1192_3: veditabbā. Attano hi kāye vasantā sattā avidūre, bahikāye vasantā sattā dūre. Tathā
atk-s0501a:1192_4: antoupacāre vasantā avidūre, bahiupacāre vasantā dūre. Attano vihāre gāme janapade
atk-s0501a:1192_5: dīpe cakkavāḷe vasantā avidūre, paracakkavāḷe vasantā dūre vasantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0501a:1193_0: Bhūtāti jātā abhinibbattā. Ye bhūtā eva, na puna bhavissantīti saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0501a:1193_1: tesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sambhavamesantīti sambhavesī. Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā
atk-s0501a:1193_2: āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Atha vā catūsu yonīsu
atk-s0501a:1193_3: aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti, tāva sambhavesī nāma,
atk-s0501a:1193_4: aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma. Saṃsedajā opapātikā
atk-s0501a:1193_5: ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesī nāma, dutiyacittakkhaṇato pabhuti bhūtā nāma. Yena
atk-s0501a:1193_6: vā iriyāpathena jāyanti, yāva tato aññaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tāva sambhavesī nāma, tato paraṃ bhūtāti.
atk-s0501a:1195_0: 6. Evaṃ bhagavā “sukhino vā”tiādīhi aḍḍhateyyāhi gāthāhi nānappakārato tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0501a:1195_1: hitasukhāgamapatthanāvasena sattesu mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni ahitadukkhānāgamapatthanāvasenāpi
atk-s0501a:1195_2: taṃ dassento āha “na paro paraṃ nikubbethā”ti. Esa porāṇo pāṭho, idāni pana “paraṃ
atk-s0501a:1196_0: Tattha paroti parajano. Paranti parajanaṃ. Na nikubbethāti na vañceyya. Nātimaññethāti
atk-s0501a:1196_1: na atikkamitvā maññeyya. Katthacīti katthaci okāse, gāme vā gāmakhette vā ñātimajjhe
atk-s0501a:1196_2: vā pūgamajjhe vātiādi. Nanti etaṃ. Kañcīti yaṃ kañci khattiyaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā gahaṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1196_3: vā pabbajitaṃ vā sukhitaṃ vā dukkhitaṃ vātiādi. Byārosanā paṭighasaññāti kāyavacīvikārehi
atk-s0501a:1196_4: byārosanāya ca manovikārena paṭighasaññāya ca. “Byārosanāya paṭighasaññāyā”ti hi
atk-s0501a:1196_5: vattabbe “byārosanā paṭighasaññā”ti vuccati, yathā “sammadaññāya vimuttā”ti vattabbe
atk-s0501a:1196_8: aññamaññassa dukkhaṃ na iccheyya. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Na kevalaṃ “sukhino vā khemino
atk-s0501a:1196_9: vā hontū”tiādimanasikāravaseneva mettaṃ bhāveyya, kintu “ahovata yo koci parapuggalo
atk-s0501a:1196_10: yaṃ kañci parapuggalaṃ vañcanādīhi nikatīhi na nikubbetha, jātiādīhi ca navahi mānavatthūhi
atk-s0501a:1196_11: katthaci padese kañci parapuggalaṃ nātimaññeyya, aññamaññassa ca byārosanāya vā paṭighasaññāya
atk-s0501a:1196_12: vā dukkhaṃ na iccheyyā”ti evampi manasikaronto bhāveyyāti.
atk-s0501a:1198: 7. Evaṃ ahitadukkhānāgamapatthanāvasena atthato mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni tameva upamāya dassento āha “mātā yathā niyaṃputta”nti.
atk-s0501a:1199_0: Tassattho – yathā mātā niyaṃ puttaṃ attani jātaṃ orasaṃ puttaṃ, tañca ekaputtameva
atk-s0501a:1199_1: āyusā anurakkhe, tassa dukkhāgamappaṭibāhanatthaṃ attano āyumpi cajitvā taṃ anurakkhe,
atk-s0501a:1199_2: evampi sabbabhūtesu idaṃ mettākhyaṃ mānasaṃ bhāvaye, punappunaṃ janaye vaḍḍhaye,
atk-s0501a:1199_3: tañca aparimāṇasattārammaṇavasena ekasmiṃ vā satte anavasesapharaṇavasena aparimāṇaṃ bhāvayeti.
atk-s0501a:1201: 8. Evaṃ sabbākārena mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni tasseva vaḍḍhanaṃ dassento āha “mettañca sabbalokasmī”ti.
atk-s0501a:1202_0: Tattha mijjati tāyati cāti mitto, hitajjhāsayatāya siniyhati, ahitāgamato rakkhati
atk-s0501a:1202_1: cāti attho. Mittassa bhāvo mettaṃ. Sabbalokasmīti anavasese sattaloke. Manasi bhavanti
atk-s0501a:1202_2: mānasaṃ. Tañhi cittasampayuttattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhāvayeti vaḍḍhaye. Na assa parimāṇanti
atk-s0501a:1202_3: aparimāṇaṃ, appamāṇasattārammaṇatāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Uddhanti upari, tena arūpabhavaṃ
atk-s0501a:1202_4: gaṇhāti. Adhoti heṭṭhā, tena kāmabhavaṃ gaṇhāti. Tiriyanti vemajjhaṃ, tena rūpabhavaṃ
atk-s0501a:1202_5: gaṇhāti. Asambādhanti sambādhavirahitaṃ, bhinnasīmanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sīmā nāma paccatthiko
atk-s0501a:1202_6: vuccati, tasmimpi pavattanti attho. Averanti veravirahitaṃ, antarantarāpi veracetanāpātubhāvavirahitanti
atk-s0501a:1202_7: attho. Asapattanti vigatapaccatthikaṃ. Mettāvihārī hi puggalo manussānaṃ piyo hoti,
atk-s0501a:1202_8: amanussānaṃ piyo hoti, nāssa koci paccatthiko hoti, tenassa taṃ mānasaṃ vigatapaccatthikattā
atk-s0501a:1202_9: asapattanti vuccati. Pariyāyavacanañhi etaṃ, yadidaṃ paccatthiko sapattoti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0501a:1203_0: Ayaṃ panettha adhippetatthadīpanā – yadidaṃ “evampi sabbabhūtesu mānasaṃ bhāvaye
atk-s0501a:1203_1: aparimāṇa”nti vuttaṃ, tañcetaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ sabbalokasmiṃ bhāvaye vaḍḍhaye,
atk-s0501a:1203_2: vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ gamaye pāpaye. Kathaṃ? Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyañca, uddhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1203_3: yāva bhavaggā, adho yāva avīcito, tiriyaṃ yāva avasesadisā. Uddhaṃ vā āruppaṃ, adho
atk-s0501a:1203_4: kāmadhātuṃ, tiriyaṃ rūpadhātuṃ anavasesaṃ pharanto. Evaṃ bhāventopi ca taṃ yathā
atk-s0501a:1203_5: asambādhaṃ averaṃ asapattañca hoti, tathā sambādhaverasapattānaṃ abhāvaṃ karonto
atk-s0501a:1203_6: bhāvaye. Yaṃ vā taṃ bhāvanāsampadaṃ pattaṃ sabbattha okāsalokavasena asambādhaṃ,
atk-s0501a:1203_7: attano paresu āghātappaṭivinayanena averaṃ, attani ca paresaṃ āghātavinayanena asapattaṃ
atk-s0501a:1203_8: hoti. Taṃ asambādhamaveramasapattaṃ aparimāṇaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāti
atk-s0501a:1205: 9. Evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vaḍḍhanaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa viharato iriyāpathaniyamābhāvaṃ dassento āha “tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ…pe… adhiṭṭheyyā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1206_0: Tassattho – evametaṃ mettaṃ mānasaṃ bhāvento so “nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ
atk-s0501a:1206_1: kāyaṃ paṇidhāyā”tiādīsu viya iriyāpathaniyamaṃ akatvā yathāsukhaṃ aññataraññatarairiyāpathabādhanavinodanaṃ
atk-s0501a:1206_2: karonto tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatā vigatamiddho assa, atha etaṃ
atk-s0501a:1207_0: Atha vā evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vaḍḍhanaṃ dassetvā idāni vasībhāvaṃ dassento āha “tiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0501a:1207_1: cara”nti. Vasippatto hi tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatā iriyāpathena
atk-s0501a:1207_2: etaṃ mettājhānasatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo hoti, atha vā tiṭṭhaṃ vā caraṃ vā…pe… sayāno
atk-s0501a:1207_3: vāti na tassa ṭhānādīni antarāyakarāni honti, apica kho yāvatā etaṃ mettājhānasatiṃ
atk-s0501a:1207_4: adhiṭṭhātukāmo hoti, tāvatā vigatamiddho hutvā adhiṭṭhāti, natthi tassa tattha dandhāyitattaṃ.
atk-s0501a:1207_5: Tenāha “tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ nisinno va, sayāno yāvatāssa vitamiddho. Etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti.
atk-s0501a:1208_0: Tassāyamadhippāyo – yaṃ taṃ “mettañca sabbalokasmi, mānasaṃ bhāvaye”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0501a:1208_1: yathā bhāveyya, yathā ṭhānādīsu yāvatā iriyāpathena ṭhānādīni vā anādiyitvā yāvatā
atk-s0501a:1208_2: etaṃ mettājhānasatiṃ adhiṭṭhātukāmo assa, tāvatā vigatamiddhova hutvā etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyāti.
atk-s0501a:1209: Evaṃ mettābhāvanāya vasībhāvaṃ dassento “etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti tasmiṃ mettāvihāre niyojetvā idāni taṃ vihāraṃ thunanto āha “brahmametaṃ vihāramidhamāhū”ti.
atk-s0501a:1210_0: Tassattho – yvāyaṃ “sukhino vā khemino vā hontū”tiādi katvā yāva “etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyyā”ti
atk-s0501a:1210_1: vaṇṇito mettāvihāro. Etaṃ catūsu dibbabrahmaariyairiyāpathavihāresu niddosattā attanopi
atk-s0501a:1210_2: paresampi atthakarattā ca idha ariyassa dhammavinaye brahmavihāramāhu seṭṭhavihāramāhūti,
atk-s0501a:1210_3: yato satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ nisinno vā sayāno vā yāvatāssa vigatamiddho,
atk-s0501a:1212_0: 10. Evaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nānappakārato mettābhāvanaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā
atk-s0501a:1212_1: mettā sattārammaṇattā attadiṭṭhiyā āsannā hoti, tasmā diṭṭhigahananisedhanamukhena
atk-s0501a:1212_2: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tadeva mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ariyabhūmippattiṃ dassento “diṭṭhiñca
atk-s0501a:1213_0: Tassattho – yvāyaṃ “brahmametaṃ vihāramidhamāhū”ti saṃvaṇṇito mettājhānavihāro, tato
atk-s0501a:1213_1: vuṭṭhāya ye tattha vitakkavicārādayo dhammā, te tesañca vatthādianusārena rūpadhamme
atk-s0501a:1213_3: evaṃ diṭṭhiñca anupaggamma anupubbena lokuttarasīlena sīlavā hutvā lokuttarasīlasampayutteneva
atk-s0501a:1213_4: sotāpattimaggasammādiṭṭhisaññitena dassanena sampanno, tato paraṃ yopāyaṃ vatthukāmesu
atk-s0501a:1213_5: gedho kilesakāmo appahīno hoti, tampi sakadāgāmianāgāmimaggehi tanubhāvena anavasesappahānena
atk-s0501a:1213_6: ca kāmesu gedhaṃ vineyya vinayitvā vūpasametvā na hi jātu gabbhaseyyaṃ puna reti
atk-s0501a:1213_7: ekaṃseneva puna gabbhaseyyaṃ na eti. Suddhāvāsesu nibbattitvā tattheva arahattaṃ
atk-s0501a:1214_0: Evaṃ bhagavā desanaṃ samāpetvā te bhikkhū āha – “gacchatha, bhikkhave, tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0501a:1214_1: vanasaṇḍe viharatha, imañca suttaṃ māsassa aṭṭhasu dhammassavanadivasesu ghaṇḍiṃ
atk-s0501a:1214_2: ākoṭetvā ussāretha, dhammakathaṃ karotha sākacchatha anumodatha, idameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0501a:1214_3: āsevatha bhāvetha bahulīkarotha, tepi vo amanussā taṃ bheravārammaṇaṃ na dassessanti,
atk-s0501a:1214_4: aññadatthu atthakāmā hitakāmā bhavissantī”ti. Te “sādhū”ti bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0501a:1214_5: uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tattha gantvā tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0501a:1214_6: Devatāyo ca “bhadantā amhākaṃ atthakāmā hitakāmā”ti pītisomanassajātā hutvā sayameva
atk-s0501a:1214_7: senāsanaṃ sammajjanti, uṇhodakaṃ paṭiyādenti, piṭṭhiparikammaṃ pādaparikammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0501a:1214_8: ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahanti. Tepi bhikkhū tameva mettaṃ bhāvetvā tameva ca pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0501a:1214_9: vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā sabbe tasmiṃyeva antotemāse aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā mahāpavāraṇāya
atk-s0501a:1229_1: navappabhedassa khuddakapāṭhassa tāva atthavaṇṇanā katā hoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0501a:1233: Vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ, pāpuṇātu ayaṃ jano”ti.
atk-s0501a:1234_6: vipulavisuddhabuddhinā buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ
